column2: Burundi - Miriyaridi 7 ziranyuruzwa buri mwaka mu matagisi y'amasoko ya Bujumbura
column3: Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati, umutekano n'iterambere rusangi mu Burundi agabisha abatoza amakori (taxes) mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ko bagiye gufatirwa ingingo hamwe bobandanya kuba intambamyi mu kwinjiza mu kigega c'igisigara amafaranga yose ategegerezwa gutozwa mu masoko. Ingingo ya mbere ija imaze gufatwa. Inyuma y'inama bagirishijwe mu gisagara ca Bujumbura na General Gervais Ndirakobuca, hafashwe ingingo yo guhagarika abari bajejwe gutoza amakori n'ama taxe mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura. General Ndirakobuca yavuze ko  ubushikiranganji bwo nyene bwitoreje ayo mafaranga buca burenzako miriyoni 121 ku ndwi, ''kandi aba commaissaires b'amasoko ntibigeze batworohereza''. Ati: "Mwonsigurira gute ko amafaranga atozwa muri mairie mu ndwi imwe, turavye n'inzitizi twahuye nazo, ubushikiranganji buriko buratoza burenzako miriyoni 121? Ntimwumva ko igihugu capfuye?" Yavuze ko ashobora no gushika miriyoni 150 ku ndwi, bisiguye ku mwaka ko arenga  miriyaridi ndwi (ashika miliyoni $3.5). Mu ma komine yo hagati mu gihugu ho ,  umushikiranganji Ndirakubuca yavuze ko basanze muri rusangi reta itakaza miriyaridi 40  ku mwaka. Yabwiye ibitavye iyo nama harimwo abajejwe gutoza amakori mu masoko y'igisagara ca Bujumbura ati: "Inyuma y'iyi nama, uwusubira kuvyivangamwo, ibimushikira ntagire ngo n'ubushikiranganji…..ntavuge ngo reta mvyeyi itwara abantu ku Musaga'', imvugo iciye hirya yo kubagabisha ko bazofatwa, bagapfungwa-ku  Musaga niho hari ibohero rikuru rya Mpimba. Reta y'Uburundi isanzwe ishigikira imirimo y'amakomine ku mafaranga angana na miriyaridi 63  ku mwaka. Umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca  avuga ko hamwe ama komine yokwinjiza amafaranga yose ategerezwa kuboneka, ayo reta itanga yoheza agakora ibindi. Uburundi buri mu bihugu vya mbere kw'isi birangwamwo ibiturire cane, hakurikijwe icegeranyo c'uwu mwaka ca Transparency International, ikigo gikurikirana ibijanye n'ibiturire mu bihugu vyose vyo kw'isi.

column2: South Korea: Kompanyi y'amata yasavye imbazi kubera yerekanye abagore nk'inka
column3: Kompanyi ya mbere nini y'amata muri Korea y'Epfo vyabaye ngombwa ko isaba imbabazi kubera video yo kwamamaza (publicité, advert) yerekana abagore nk'inka. Iyo video ya Seoul Milk yerekana umugabo ariko afata rwihishwa amashusho y'abagore bari mu murima, mu nyuma baca bahinduka inka. Imaze kunegurwa cane, iyo kompanyi yaciye ivana iyo publicité kuri YouTube, ariko kuva ico gihe imaze guhererekanywa cane inyuma yo gusubizwa  ku mbuga n'abakoresha internet. Bamwe bagereranije kandi inyifato y'uwo mugabo na "molka", ingeso itemewe yo gufata amashusho abantu rwihishwa. Ishami rya Seoul Milk, Seoul Dairy Cooperative ryavuze mu mbabazi ryashize kuri internet riti: "Turasavye imbabazi bivuye ku mutima ku muntu wese yababajwe n'iyo publicité y'amata yasohotse itariki 29 mu kwezi guheze". "Twemera ko iki kibazo gikomeye kandi tozokwisuzuma, hanyuma turushirizeho kwiyubara kugira ibintu nk'ibi ntibisubire gushika muri kazoza. Turicishije bugufi mu gusaba imbabazi". Iyo video itangura yerekana umugabo afise camera ariko yitembereza mu gahinga. Ijwi ry'umugabo ryumvikana rivuga ngo: "Amaherezo twashoboye kubafata amashusho na camera mu kibanza ciza cane". Aho haca hakurikira uwo mugabo yinyegeje mu bisaka, ariko afata amashusho rwihishwa umugwi w'abagore bariko baranywa amazi mu mugezi bongera bagira yoga. Hagera aho uwo mugabo ahonyora atabishaka kw'ishami ry'igiti, abo bagore bagaca bikanga buno nyene bagaca bahinduka inka. Iyo publicité irangizwa n'aya majambo: "Amazi meza, indya nziza, amata ya Seoul Milk ni  100%. Amata atagira akanenge, avuye mw'iraro ritagira akanenge mu murima uteye igomwe wa Cheongyang." Iyo publicité/advert yatumye haba impari zikomeye mu gihugu ku bijanye n'ivangura n'ibindi bibazo bishingiye ku bitsina ariko ibineguro ntivyagarukiye ku kwerekana abagore nk'inka gusa. Bamwe barerekanye amakenga yo kuba umugabo afata rwishishwa amashusho y'abagore, mu gihe ivyaha vyo gufata amashusho rwishishwa vyagwiriye cane muri Korea y'Epfo muri iyi myaka. Molka, bisigura "camera yinyegeje", ubu yabaye ikibazo kidasanzwe ku bagore muri Korea y'Epfo. Si ubwa mbere Seoul Milk ivugwa mu binyamakuru kubera imvo zitari nziza. Mu 2003, iyo kompanyi yatunganije agakino aho abanyamideri bari gusa basukanako ikivuguto   (yoghurt). Umukuru w'igisata co kwamamaza muri Seoul Milk hamwe n'abagize uruhara muri ako gakino baratangishijwe ihadabu kubera kwerekana ibiterasoni.

column2: U﻿mushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha Gen Gervais Ndirakobuca ni nde?
column3: Lieutenant G﻿eneral de Police  Gervais Ndirakobuca yahoze ari umugwanyi mu muhari wa CNDD-FDD ni we yasubiriye Gen Alain Guillaume Bunyoni mu mabanga y'umushikiranganji wa mbere. A﻿shinzwe ayo mabanga inyuma y'imyaka ibiri aramutswa ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu n'umutekano. G﻿en Ndirakobuca azwi cane mu bikorwa vyo kugwanya abari mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza ikiringo ca gatatu c'uwahoze ari umukuru w'igihugu, umuhisi Pierre Nkurunziza mu 2015. Ico gihe, u﻿wo mupolisi batazira Ndakugarika yari umujanama  mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu ajejwe ibibazo vy'igipolisi. Yashizwe ku rutonde rw'abantu bafatiwe ibihano n'ishirahamwe ry'Ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, yagirizwa kuba intambamyi ku nyishu ya politike ku bibazo vyo mu Burundi, mu gutanga amategeko yo gukoresha inguvu z'umurengera. Yagirizwa ahanini ivyabaye itariki 26, 27 na 28 mu makaratiye ya Nyakabiga na Musaga. G﻿en Ndirakobuca ari mu barokotse ubwicanyi bw'abanyeshure b'abahutu kuri kaminuza y'Uburundi mu 1995, aho yiga mu mwaka wa kabiri mu gisata ca Chimie. A﻿riko mu nyuma yarasubiye mw'ishure, yiga amategeko kuri kaminuza Hope y'i Bujumbura aho yaronse urupapuro rw'umutsindo rwa Licence mu 2013. I﻿co gihe niho yaca agenda kugwana mu muhari CNDD FDD. I﻿nyuma y'imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare, yaciye ku mapeta yose gushika ku rwego rwo kurongora ingabo nka komanda ku rugamba. A﻿zwi kandi nk'umuntu bemera cane mu bikorwa vyo kugendereza. G﻿en Ndirakobuca ari mu mugwi w'abasirikare ba CNDD-FDD yarungitse gukorana n'abo mu ngabo za reta y'ico gihe, FAB, mu gikorwa co kuvanga ingabo z'izo mpande zibiri zari zimaze imyaka 10 zitana mu mitwe. Y﻿agiye aja mu nzego zitandukanye z'igipolisi: G﻿en Gervais Ndirakobuca afise umuryango ugizwe n'umupfasoni wiwe n'abana 7, abahungu batatu n'abakobwa bane. Y﻿avutse mu 1970 ku musozi wa Kibaya, komine Bukinanyana mu ntara ya Cibitoke.

column2: Umugwizatunga Rujugiro ashima icemezo ca sentare kuri UTC ngo ariko ntibikwiye
column3: Umugwizatunga w'Umunyarwanda Tribert Rujugiro avuga ko ashima icemezo ca sentare y'akarere ka Afrika y'Ubuseruko ku vyerekeye inyubako yagurishijwe na leta y'u Rwanda. Ariko uwo mugwizatunga atakiba mu Rwanda kubera kutumvikana na leta y'ico gihugu, avuga ko kumuha amafaranga atari vyo yashaka kuko adashaka kugurisha. Iyo nyubako ivugwa ni inyubako izwi nka Union Trade Centre (UTC) iri mu muji wa Kigali iberamwo ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji, izi zizwi mu Congereza nka Shopping Mall. Sentare y'Ubutungane ya Afrika y'Ubuseruko yafashe icemezo c'uko Bwana Rujugiro ahabwa amafaranga iyo nyubako yagurishijwe akanahabwa ayo yari imaze kwinjiza igihe yari imaze ikora kuva yagurishwa. Ariko we avuga ko naho ashima ingingo ya sentare, ivyo adashobora kuvyemera kuko agaciro k'iyo nyubako ari kanini cane ugereranije n'ayo yoba ahawe. Yagize ati: "Umwanzuro narawushimye kuko weretse amakungu ko rirya tegeko bakoresheje na birya vyo kugurisha bitajanye n'amategeko. "... ngirango umuntu wese azi guharura, inzu yinjiza $1,500,000 ku mwaka, yobona agaciro kayo. Kandi amafaranga bayigurishije ni $6,800,000". Mu 2017 ikigo kijejwe amakoli mu Rwanda cafashe ingingo yo kugurisha inyubako UTC ya Bwana Rujugiro kimwagiraza ko agiheraniye amakoli. Ikigo Kigali Investment Company ni co cegukanye iyo nyubakwa cemeye gutanga amahera arusha ay'abandi (6,877,150,000). Ku vyerekeye kumwagiriza kutariha iryo koli, Bwana Rujugiro avuga ko sentare yabisiguye neza. Yagize ati: "Bwa mbere iyo nzu bari bayifise (urwego rushinzwe amakoli) kuva mu 2013. Iryo deni ry'ikoli bavuga ko mfise barizanye mu 2017, bamaranye inzu imyaka ine. "Noneho waraba amafaranga bafashe yagera ku miriyoni $5 zirenga. Kandi itegeko bagendeyeko ryavuga ko amafaranga yose avuye mu nzu bafashe, 50% bizoja bija muri Banki Nkuru akazohabwa nyene umutungo igihe yoboneka. "Urumva yuko nibaba bari bafise $2.800.000, ideni rikaba ryari $1.100.000, kuki batafashe muri ayo ngo barihe?" Abajijwe niba azokwunguruza ku ngingo ya sentare mu gihe we avuga ko adashaka kugurisha inzu yiwe, yavuze ko yabihaye abashingwamanza biwe nihafatwa ingingo akazoyitangaza. BBC yagerageje kuvugana n'uruhande rwa leta y'u Rwanda ariko batubwira ko ata co bashobora kuvuga kuri ico kibazo.

column2: Vatican: Kardinali Becciu yategetswe gutanga imihoho, ibitari bimenyerewe
column3: Umukardinali yari mu bari bafise amabanga akomeye i Vaticano kwa Papa, Giovanni Angelo Becciu, yatanze imihoho giturumbuka ariko akavuga ko yategetswe na Papa Francis. Avuga ko yiketswe gukoresha umutungo wa Ekleziya yihera benewabo, agahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Kardinali Becciu yari umwe mu begereye cane Papa, akaba yarigeze kuba ajejwe amabanga mu bunyamabanga bwa leta ya Vaticano. Yagiye kugira uruhara mu masezerano yateye impari yo gushora imitahe mu nyubakwa nziza ya Londres mu mafaranga ya Ekleziya. Iki gikorwa kuva ico gihe kiriko kirakorwako amatohoza. Ntibikunze kuboneka aho abantu bo ku rwego rwo hejuru i Vaticano batanga imihoho, kandi na Vaticano nta vyinshi yabivuzeko mw'itangazo ryasohowe ku wa kane. Ariko uyu mu kardinali w'imyaka 72 yabwiye ikinyamakuru co ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi Domani co mu Butaliyano ko yategetswe gutanga imihoho kuko yiketswe ko yahaye benewabo amafaranga ya Ekleziya. Avuga ati: "Nta n'urufaranga na rumwe jewe nigeze niba. Nta matohoza ndiko ndakorwako, ariko ari nka hamwe bonshira imbere y'ubutungane, nokwisigura". Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru yagiye gushikiriza mu nyuma, uyu mukardinali avuga ko ibogozwa ryiwe ryabaye giturumbuka. Avuga ko na Papa "atari agononokewe" igihe yatangaza iyi nkuru. Ati: "Ni ibisigabwenge. Gushika ejo…niyumvira ko nari umugenzi pfa mpfe wa Papa, intumwa yiwe y'umwizigirwa". "Mu nyumn rero niho Papa yambwira ko atakinyizeye kuko yaronse amakuru yahawe n'abacamanza bamubwira ko nakoze icaha co kunyuruza umutungo". Kardinali Becciu ashimangira ko habaye "ukutumvikana", akongera kandi ati: "Nditeguye gusigurira Papa vyose. Nta caha na kimwe nakoze". Uyu mukardinali Giovanni Angelo Becciu ni umutaliyano yamaze imyaka ya mbere akora mu gisata kijejwe imigenderanire i Vaticano. Papa Francis niwe yamugize umukardinali mu 2018, igihe aherewe amabanga mashasha yo kurongora igisata kijejwe ibijanye n'ubweranda. Yasubiwemwo n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano avuga ati: "Ni uruhombo kuri jewe, umuryango wanje, abanyagihugu b'igihugu canje. Navyemeye ku bugamburutsi n'urukundo mfitiye Ekleziya na Papa". N'aho mu vyo yagirijwe harimwo ibijanye n'amasezerano ajanye n'inyubakwa ya Londres ivugwa ko yaguzwe mu mutungo wa Ekleziya, Kardinali Becciu wewe siko abibona. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa gatanu, uyu mukardinali yavuze ko Papa yamwagirije ko yakoresheje nabi umutungo wa Ekleziya akawushira mu ma koperative n'urucuruza vya benewabo. Ibinyamakuru vy'Ubutaliyano kandi bivuga ko Papa atanezerejwe n'ingene imperezwa yo gufashisha abakene yiswe Peter's Pence yagiye gukoreshwa mu bindi bitari biyigenewe. Kardinali Becciu azobandanya afise iki giti n'aho yatanze imihoho. Hagati aho, nta ruhara azogira mu gutora uwundi mu Papa.

column2: Africa-Ukraine: Ingaruka z'intambara ziguma zigaragaza uko bukeye uko bwije
column3: Gaz (umwuka)  yo gutekesha (Liquified Petroleum  Gas, LPG)  yaduze igiciro muri Kenya  gushika kuri 11 kw'ijana mu ndwi imwe gusa, mu gihe intambara Uburusiya bwateye muri Ukraine iriko iragira ingaruka ku biciro v'ibitoro kw'isi. Ubu igiciro ca gaz yo gutekesha muri Kenya kimaze kuduga gushika kuri 50 kw'ijana mu kiringo c'umwaka, ubu kikaba congeye umuzigo ku banyagihugu bari bahanzwe  n'uburyo bwagabanutse kubera ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ubu igiciro co kwuzuza icupa rya gaz ry'ibiro 13 ciyongeyeko 11 kw'ijana muri iyi ndwi n'ukuvuga ko bica bisaba amafaranga angana n'ama dorari ($) 29.30 (hafi 60.000 mu marundi canke 30.000 mu manyarwanda) rivuye ku ma dorari 26.26 ku ndwi iheze. Ubu icupa ry'ibiro 6 ryuzuzwa kuri $13.68 kare ryari kuri $12.43. Ni  ikimenyetso ko ibihe biri imbere bitagiye kworoha ku bantu b'uburyo bubayabaye basanzwe bari bahanzwe n'ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya vyaduze cane. Bitandukanye n'ibindi bikomoka ku bitoro  nka essence, amazutu na kerosene, muri Kenya ibiciro vya gaz yo gutekesha ntibishingwa na reta, bisigura ko abaguzi baca bahura n'ingaruka uko ibiciro bihindutse kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Kuri uyu wa mbere igiciro c'ibitoro bitayunguruye caduze gushika ku $140 ku kagunguru (barril)  kw'isoko mpuzamakungu. Ibihugu vyinshi vya Afrika biramaze kuduza ibiciro vy'ibitoro. Mu Rwanda havugwa kuduga kw'igiciro c'ibitoro... No mu Rwanda kuva kuri uyu wa mungu hari ibiciro bishasha vy'ibitoro. Mazutu yavuye kuri 1.140Frw ija kuri 1.201Frw, essence iva kuri 1.225Frw ija kuri 1.256Frw. Itangazo ry'ubuyobozi bubijejwe rivuga ko n'aho ryirinze kuduza igiciro uko vyategerezwa kugenda kugirango ibiciro  muri rusangi ntibice biduga cane ngo vyonone umurindi wo kwivyukiranya ingaruka z'ikiza ca Covid. Ariko abaraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko  ibintu bishobora kwunyuka hamwe ihererekanywa ry'ivyo bitoro ryohungabana. Rolake  Akingube-Filani wo muri  Africa Energy Chamber avuga ati: "Amaherezo ingaruka zizova i Buraya zishike muri Afrika  aho ibiciro bishobora kuduga kurusha aho bigeze ubu." Yongerako ati: "Dukeneye kurondera uburyo bwo kwikwiza ku bitoro muri Afrika. Aho niho dushobora kwihagararako habaye ihungrana nk'iryo muri kazoza."

column2: Burundi: Ibiharuro vya Covid-19 vyongerekanye
column3: Reta y’Uburundi itera akamo abanyagihugu kubandanya bakurikiza amabwirizwa yo kwirinda ikiza karanda ca Covid-19 kuko “ibiharuro vy’abantu batorwa Covid-19 vyongerekanye”. Inyuma y’inama yahuje abajejwe kurwanya iki kiza ejo ku wa kabiri 26 Mukakaro (7) 2022, umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu Sylvie Nzeyimana yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko haheze “ikiringo nk’ico indwi zitatu … dusanga nko ku musi hatorwa abantu bashika 200” baba baranduye mu baba bipimishije. Ati: “Ico kiza kiracariho, kirirabika ariko iyo dusamaye ntidukurikize impanuro zo kwigikngira, gica kigaruka kikaduhwibira, abantu bakandura”. Umushikiranganji Nzeyimana ntatanga ibiharuro vy’abapimwa buri musi ariko avuga ko ibiharuro vy’abandura vyiyongereye ugereranije n’ingene vyari bimeze inyuma y’amezi atari make vyari vyaragabanutse cane. Mu ntara ntara zigeramiwe nk’uko abimenyesha harimwo igisagara ca Bujumbura, intara za Bujumbura, Gitega, Bururi mu bunamuko bw’igihugu, Muyinga na Kirundo mu buraruko. Sylvie Nzeyimana avuga kandi ko hari n’abinjira bavuye hanze bapimwa bagasanga baranduye. Ati: “Muri ino misi, abapimwa ku mipaka Uburundi busangiye n’ibindi bihugu, harimwo no ku kibuga c’indege, twasanze ko ingenzi ziza ziciye mu ndege harimwo abatari bake baza barwaye … aho nk’akarorero mu ndwi yose iheze, abashika 80 barapimwe basanga bararwaye uwo mugera”. Abinjiye mu gihugu bategerezwa gupimwa. Abasaba kwihutira kuraba inyishu hanyuma basanze barwaye bakitura amavuriro bwango. Nta ngingo ruhasha zifatirwa abinjira bavuye hanze nk’uko vyigeze kuba muri kahise. Igicapo cerekana ingene iki kiza cifashe mu gihugu cerekana ko ku bantu 7.483 bapimwe ku magenekerezo ya 23, 24 na 25 uku kw’indwi, 423 basanze baranduye, muri bo 39 bakaba bari bavuye hanze. Ibiharuro bitangwa n’ishami rijejwe amagara y’abantu kw’isi OMS/WHO vyerekana ko mu Burundi abantu 44.437 aribo bamaze kwandura,  kuva iki kiza gishika mu gihugu mu 2020, 15  bakaba ari co gitigiri OMS yahawe c'abamaze  gupfa. Ibi biharuro vyarakemanzwe n’ammwe mu shirahamwe ategamiye kuri leta ko bitavuga ukuri kw’ingene Covid yari yifashe mu gihugu. Ibiharuro kandi vyerekana ko abagera kuri 0,1 % bonyene nibo bamaze kwicandagisha mu gihugu.

column2: Vladimir Putin yiyumvira iki agategura iki?
column3: N﻿a Steve Rosenberg Umwanditsi mukuru mu gisata c'Ikirusiya, i Moscow Iki ni ikibazo tumaze igihe kitari gito tubaza, n’imbere y’uko Uburusiya butera Ukraine. Vladimir Putin yoba yiyumvira iki agategura iki? Ariko reka mbe ndabibamenyesha. Nta sindagura. Kandi sinavuganye na Putin. Uwahoze ari umukuru w’igihugu ca Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika George W Bush igihe kimwe niho yigeze kuvuga ko yaravye Vladimir Putin mu maso aca abona akari ku mutima wiwe. Raba ingene vyarangiye neza mu migenderanire hagati y’Uburusiya n’Uburengero. Rero, kwinjira mu mutwe w’uyu mutegetsi wa Kremlin si igikorwa coroshe. Ariko ni vyiza kugerageza. Kumbure iki gihe nico gikomeye co kugerageza gusumba ibindi vyose, dufatiye kw’ikangisha riheruka kugirwa na Moscou ku bigwanisho nikleyeri. Nta gukekeranya cane ko umukuru w’igihugu c’Uburusiya ubu atorohewe. Ico yita “igikorwa ca gisirikare kidasanzwe” muri Ukraine ntikiriko kimugendera neza. Cari citezwe kumara imisi mike. Ariko ubu turi mu mezi hafi umunani kandi nta kimenyetso ko kigiye kurangira. Kremlin iremera ko yatakaje “bikomeye”; mu ndwi nkeya za vuba, igisirikare c’Uburusiya cagiye gitakaza ubutaka cari carigaruriye muri Ukraine. Mu ntumbero yo kwongereza igitigiri c’ingabo, mu kwezi guheze Perezida Putin yateye akamo ko guhamagaza ingabo, ico yahora avuga ashimitse ko atari gukora. Ni mu gihe ibihano bibandanya bigira ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw’Uburusiya. Reka tugaruke ku coba kiri mu mutwe wa Putin. Ubwo yoba yibaza ko yihenze cane? Ko ingingo yo gutera Ukraine ryabaye ikosa rikomeye? Ntuhave uvyemeza gutyo. Konstantin Remchukov, umwanditsi mukuru akongera akaba nyene ikinyamakuru co mu Burusiya Nezavisimaya Gazeta, avuga ati: "Ivyo Putin yiyumvira ni vyo vyerekana ingene ibintu bimeze muri ino ntambara”. "Ni umutegetsi atwaza umukazo igihugu rutura ca nikleyeri. Ni umutegetsi atavuguruzwa muri kino gihugu. Arafise ivyiyumviro n’ibintu bikomeye yemera bimusarisha. Yatanguye kwemeza ko ari ku nyungu zo kubaho. Atari kuri we gusa. Ariko kuri kazoza k’Uburusiya”. Mu gihe ino ntambara yoba ari iyo kurwanira ukubaho kw’igihugu, Putin yoba yiteguye gute kuyitsinda? Mu mezi ya vuba, abategetsi b’Uburusiya (na Putin we nyene ubwiwe arimwo) bagiye bumvikana mu buryo budatomoye berekana ko uyu mukuru wa Kremlin ashobora kuba yiteguriye gukoresha ibirwanisho vya nikleyeri muri ino ntambara. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika abwira CNN ati: "Sinibaza ko azohava abikoresha. Ariko nibaza ko kubona avuga ibintu nk’ibi ko ata mutima agira”. Amabombe y’urutavanako yacucagiwe mu gihugu cose mu ndwi iheze yerekana ko nibura Kremlin yiteguye kwunyura ibintu hagati y'Ubususiya na Ukraine. N'uburengero nyene? Grigory Yavlinsky, inararibonye muri poritike nk’uwigenga, avuga ati: "Ariko aragerageza kwirinda ko hatoba ugutana mu mitwe amaso mu yandi n’Uburengero, ariko akaba anavyiteguriye”. "Mfise ubwoba ko hohava haduka intambara ya nikleyeri. Hanyuma ubwa kabiri, ntinya intambara itagira iherezo”. Ariko "intambara itagira iherezo" isaba uburyo butagira iherezo. Iki ni ikintu Uburusiya busa n’ubudafise. Igihuhusi c’ibisasu vya misire vyacucagiwe ku bisagara vya Ukrane ni ukwerekana inguvu zidasanzwe, ariko none Moscou yobibandanya mu gihe kingana iki? Remchukov ati: "None woshobora kubandanya utera izi misire mu kiringo c’imisi, c’amayinga, c’amezi? Abahinga benshi bafise amakenga ko tutoba dufise misire zikwiye. "Hanyuma kandi, turavye ku ruhande rwa gisirikare, nta n’umwe gushika ubu arerekana icoba ikimenyetso kirengeye vyose c’intsinzi [y’Uburusiya]? Ni ikihe kimenyetso c’intsinzi? Mu 1945 cabaye ibendera hejuru ya Berlin. None ubu icokwerekana intsinzi ni igiki? [Ibendera] hejuru ya Kyiv? Hejuru ya Kherson? Hejuru ya Kharkiv? Si nzi. Nta n’umwe abizi”. Nta n’uwuzi nimba na Vladimir Putin we nyene ubwiwe abizi. Mu kwa kabiri, intumbero ya Kremlin  yasa n’ugutsinda Ukraine vuba bwango, hanyuma uyu mubanyi w’Uburusiya agasubira mu muryango w’ibihugu bicuditse na Moscou ata ntambara ndende ihabaye. Aha yaharuye nabi. Uretse ko atiyumviriye ko igisirikare ca Ukrane n’abanyagihugu bayo bari biyemeje kurwanira igihugu cabo gushika ku ka nyuma, ntiyibaza ko igisirikare cayo cari gifise uburyo bwo guhangana n’Uburusiya. None ubu yoba yiyumvira iki? Ubwo ubu Vladimir Putin yoba  afise integuro yo gutsimbataza igenzura ry’ubutaka bwa Ukraine avuga ko aherutse kwihagira hanyuma agahagarika intambara? Canke ubwo yoba yariyemeje kubandanya asatira gushika Ukraine yose ayigarukanye mu ruhongore rw’ibihugu bigenzurwa na Kremlin? Mu ndwi iheze, Dmitry Medvedev  yahoze arongoye Uburusiya yanditse ati: "Igihugu ca Ukraine, uravye ukungene cubatse  ubu...kizokwama ari intambamyi ikomeye ku Burusiya. Mbona ko intego y’ibikorwa vyacu vya kazoza yoba ugusenyura burundu ubutegetsi bwa poritike bwa Ukraine”. Mu gihe amajambo ya Medvedev ari yo yoba ari mu mutwe wa Putin, aha rero mwitege intambara ndende cane kandi izosesekamwo amaraso menshi. Ariko, vyanka bikunda, ivyo Putin akora hanze biriko bigira ingaruka mu gihugu.  Kuva mu myaka itari mike, Kremlin yarubatse ishusho ya Putin nka "Mr Stability" (ni ukuvuga “Umugabo-buragamo"), ihimiriza Abarusiya kwizera ko igihe cose azoba arongoye igihugu ko bazoba bari mu mutekano utagira agahonzi. Ubu biragoye kwumvisha abantu ko ari vyo. Remchukov ati: "Amasezerano yari hagati ya Putin n’abanyagihugu yari ‘Ndagukingira’. "Mu kiringo c’imyaka itari mike, icivugo nyamukuru cari ‘ukubona kure’. None ukwo kubona kure muri kino gihe ni ukuhe? Ico carataye igihe. Nta kintu na kimwe co kwizera muri kazoza. Uno musi abanyamakuru banje ntibazi nimba badashika muhira basanga urwandiko rubahamagarira kwinjira mu gisirikare”. Ingingo ya Vladimir Putin yo gutera Ukraine yatangaje benshi. Ariko Yavlinsky ntarimwo. Yavlinsky  ati: "Nibaza ko [Putin] yamaze igihe yitegurira iyo nzira – umwaka ku mwaka yariko yubaka ivyo turimwo ubu”. "Akarorero, gusambura ibinyamakuru vyingenga. Ivyo yabitanguye mu 2001. Gusambura igisata c’abikorera utwabo. Yabitanguye mu 2003. Hanyuma mu 2014 ivyabaye muri Crimea na Donbas. Umuntu atabibona ni uko yari impumyi. "Ingorane z’Uburusiya ni intwaro yacu. Intwaro yashinzwe hano ikarema uyu muntu  [nka Putin]. Ikibazo c’uruhara rw’Uburengero mu gushinga iyi ntwaro ni ikibazo gikomeye cane. "Ikibazo ni uko iyi ntwaro itaremye abantu. Hari abantu benshi cane b’intungane mu Burusiya. Ariko mu bantu nta gatima ko guharanira uburenganzira  kahari. Nico gituma Uburusiya bunanirwa kwihagararako”.

column2: Covid-19: US yemeje Moderna nk’urucanco rugira kabiri
column3: Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zemeje urucanco rugira kabiri rwa Covid-19, Moderna, ubu hakaba hagiye gusohoka amamiriyoni y'amadoze yarwo. Igisata kijejwe imfungurwa n'imiti muri Amerika (FDA) catanze uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uru rucanco rwakorewe muri ico gihugu inyuma y'indwi imwe gusa yemeje urwa Pfizer/BioNTech ruriko ruratangwa mu gihugu. Amerika yaciye yiyemeza kugura doze imiriyoni 200 za Moderna, muri zo imiriyoni zitandatu zishobora kuba ziri aho, zirindiriye gutangwa umwanya n'umwanya. Amerika nico gihugu ca mbere kw'isi gifise ibitigiri binini vy'abanduye n'abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19. Ishure kaminuza Johns Hopkins risanzwe rikurikiranira hagufi ingene iki kiza karanda cifashe kw'isi rivuga ko muri Amerika abamaze kwandura Covid-19 ari imiriyoni 17.5, ikaba imaze guhitana abarenga 313.500. Umukuru w'ikigo FDA Stephen Hahn avuga ko iyemezwa ry'uru rundi rucanco nijoro ku wa gatanu ari intambwe ikomeye cane mu kurwanya iki kiza karanda gihanze isi. Umukuru w'ico gihugu aherutse gutorwa, Joe biden, yiteze gucandagwa ku wa mbere, avuga ko izi ncanco zibiri Pfizer na Moderna "zitanga umwizero  ko imbere ari heza", ariko akagabisha ko "intambara yo kurwanya Covid-19 itararangira". Mw'itangwa rya Moderna bisaba ko ishirwa mu vyuma bikanyisha gushika ku bushuhe bwa degré 20 musi y'ubusa (-20C) - vyumvikana ko ishobora kubikwa muri firigo isanzwe. Ariko Pfizer ni ngombwa ko ishirwa ku bushuhe bungana na degré 75 musi y'ubusa (-75C), ibi bigatuma bitoroha kuyishikana aho itegerezwa gushikanwa. Co kimwe na Pfizer, urucanco rwa Moderna na rwo nyene rukenera ko umuntu aterwa urundi rushinge rugira kabiri kugira rugire inguvu. Kuri Pfizer, umuntu atewe urwa mbere, bisaba imisi 21 kugira aterwe urwa kabiri, ariko kuri Moderna  uru rwa kabiri umuntu ategerezwa kurutera haciye imisi 28.

column2: Burundi: Girumuco Téline atambukira inzu y'imideli Yves St Laurent ati: 'Nakunze umudeli kubera dawe'
column3: Umurundikazi Girumuco Téline Féerie afitaniye amasezerano y'umudeli n'inzu rurangiranwa yo mu Bufaransa Yves Saint Laurent, avuga ko yabikunda kuva akiri umwana. Uwo mwigeme avuga ko yatanguye umwuga w'umudeli mu 2016 mu nzu [agence] yitwa Winners' fashion. Agira ati:" Nabikunze nkiri umwana. Ngira aho nabirabira cane hari ku muvyeyi wanje, dawe; yakora mu bintu vy'impuzu." Indoto za Téline ngo zari izo kwambika abantu, agakora impuzu mu Burundi abantu ntibabe bakizikura mu mahanga. Uwo mwigeme yiga mu gisata co gutumatumanako amakuru ngo afise umugambi wo kuva muri ico gisata aje gutangura kwiga gushona imideli. Agitangura ivyerekeye imideli mu Burundi ngo abantu ntibabibona neza. Agira ati:" Abantu babona umenga ndiko ndata akaranga. Abavyeyi banje naragize Imana barantahura bakaza baranshigikira, ariko nk'abandi babibona mu mibano, ntibabibona neza, ariko ubu bariko barabitahura kubera babona urwego maze gushikako." Abandanya avuga ko akiri mu Burundi yagize ivyigwa nkarisha bwenge vyo gushona impuzu, abantu bakabifata nabi, kuko ntibatahura ingene yari azi ubwenge mw'ishure ariko akaja mu vyo gushona impuzu. Yaragira kandi n'ibindi vyigwa bijanye no gushona ku buhinga bwa internet, abamwigisha bakaba bari mu gihugu c'Ubufaransa. Téline afise uburebure bwa metero 1.76, akaba apima ibiro 48. Atera akamo urwaruka na cane cane abigeme gukora cane kuko kenshi mu Burundi imyuga itamenyerewe badakunze kuyishigikira, bigasaba kugira inguvu nyinshi. Nta Mwuga Udakiza ni ikiganiro c'uruhererekane (Series) kizajya gihita kuri radio buri wa gatatu, no ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuzamiryango. BBC Gahuzamiryango ihaye ikaze ibitekerezo vyanyu kuri iki kiganiro.

column2: Aurlus Mabele: Rurangiranwa mu muziki wa Congo (Brazzaville) 'yahitanywe na coronavirus'
column3: Umunyamuzika rurangiranwa wo muri Kongo (Brazzaville) Aurlus Mabele yaguye mu bitaro ku murwa mukuru w'Ubufaransa, Paris, afise imyaka 67. Ubutumwa bwashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro n'abagenzi hamwe n'umuryango wiwe buvuga ko yahitanywe na coronavirus ariko ibi ntibiremezwa. Abafana biwe bamwita umwami wa soukous - umuziki w'umudiho unyaruka wo muri Kongo ukundwa hose muri Afrika. Umukobwa wiwe, umuririmvyi w'umufaransakazi Liza Monet, yanditse ubutumwa kuri twitter kuwa kane avuga ko se yahitanywe na coronavirus. Yanditse ati "nishwe n'amarira." Uwari mu mugwi umwe nawe wa Loketo, Mav Cacharel, nawe yanditse kuri Facebook ko yahitanywe na coronavirus. Umutunganya-bikorwa wiwe (manager), Kimmy Ouetenou, ariko yabariye BBC Afrique ko  bitaremezwa ko yahitanywe na coronavirus kandi ko yari afise ibibazo vy'amagara amaranye igihe. Yinjijwe ibitaro ejo kuwa kane aca acikana uwo munsi nyene. Mabele, azina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aurélien Miatshonama, yavukiye Brazaville aca yimukira mu Bufaransa mu myaka y'1980. Indirimbo ziwe zakunzwe zirimwo iyitwa Embargo. Bwana Ouetenou yavuze ko batanguye kuganira na leta ya Kongo kugira barabye ko yoshingurwa mu gihugu ciwe. Hagati aho, isandugu yiwe izoshirwa mu kibanza izobikwamwo gushika ingendo zahagaritswe kubera coronavirus zisubiriye, nk'uko bivugwa na Rose-Marie Bouboutou wa BBC Afrique. Mabele yashikanye injana ya soukous kw'isi yose Vyashikirijwe na Gaïus Kowene, BBC News, Kinshasa Akoresheje izina ryiwe Aurélien Miatshonama, Mabele yashinze umugwi Les Ndimbola Loketo ari kumwe n'abagenzi biwe i Brazaville basohora zimwe mu ndirimbo zakunzwe cane muri Afrika mu myaka 1970, nk'indirimbo Embargo, Zebola na Waka Waka. Mu nyuma, yaje kwimukira i Paris aho yashinze uwundi mugwi, Loketo, bisigura amafyinga mw'ilingala - ururima bakoresha kenshi mu ndirimbo za soukous, rukanavugwa cane mu burengero bwa Kongo-Kinsasa na Kongo-Brazzaville. Mu gihe yagurishije inkurikirane z'indirimbo (albums) zirenga imiriyoni 10 mu mwuga yari amazemwo imyaka irenga 30, Aurlus Mabele yashikanye soukous hanze y'imbibe za Afrika, ayishikana kure kw'isi.

column2: Rwanda: Abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi basaba leta guhagarika ingingo y'ugukata umushahara w'abakozi
column3: Amashyaka (imigambwe) abiri atavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bw'u Rwanda, ariyamiriza ingingo ya leta y'ico gihugu yo gukata umushahara w'abakozi, ibice bingana na 0.5% buri kwezi aja mu kigega c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi muri ico gihugu kizwi nka RSSB. Victoire Ingabire, umukuru w'umugambwe DALFA-Umurinzi,  hamwe na Bernard  Ntaganda w'umugambwe PS-Imberakuri, bakorera mu Rwanda, bagiriza umugambwe FPR uri ku butegetsi mu Rwanda ko ugomba kunyaga abakozi ku nyungu zawo. Leta yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe mu ntumbero yo gushigikira umusanzu w'ubwisungane mu kwivuza, ikanavuga ko yafashwe habanje kuba ibiganiro bitandukanye. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC Gahuzamiryango, Victoire Ingabire avuga ko iyo ngingo ya leta yafashwe hahonyanzwe ibwirizwashingiro ry'ico gihugu hamwe n'itegeko rigenga akazi "kuko umushahara w'umuntu ni umutungo wiwe bwite, ni ntavogerwa, ntabwo umuntu apfa kuwufataho uko yishakiye". Yagiriza ikigega  RSSB c'ugutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi ko cabaye igikoresho c'umugambwe FPR/RPF uri ku butegetsi. Ati: "Kiriya kigo gishirwamwo amafaranga y'ubwishingizi n'ayo gutegekaniriza abakozi RSSB, ni ikigo cabaye nk'inka y'imvyeyi ririya shyaka rivomamo". Umupfasoni Ingabire avuga ko atarwanya uwo mugambi wa leta wo kwunganira umusanzu w'ukwivuza, akabona ko ahubwo leta  ikwiye kuronderera mu bindi bisata maze amafaranga agashobora kuboneka. Avuga ko ingorane nyamukuru ari ingene ayo mafaranga yegeranywa akoreshwa, akabona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: "Ntabwo ari ikibazo c'ibura ry'amafaranga, ikibazo ni uburyo amafaranga yo mu bwisungane bwo kwivuza acungwa. Imbere y'uko baja kurondera amafaranga ni babanze bacunge neza n'ayahari". "Iyaba ayahari bayacunga neza, ntabwo uyu munsi baba bariko baja gusonga abakozi bababwira ngo barabakata amafaranga". Leta y'u Rwanda yoyo ivuga ko iyo ngingo yafashwe ku nyungu z'umunyagihugu muri rusangi. Gaspard Musonera,  umunyamabanga uhoraho (ntayegayezwa mu Kirundi) mu bushikiranganji bw'abakozi n'akazi mu Rwanda, avuga ko amafaranga asanzwe atangwa n'umukozi hamwe n'ayo umukoresha amutangira ari ayo kwivuza be n'umuryango wiwe gusa. Avuga ko hakenewe ubundi buryo kugira ngo abanyagihugu bandi nabo bashobore kuvurwa, ari co ayo mafaranga bazokatwa azokora. Ati: "Ayo 0.5 % ku mushahara wabo bwite batahana ku kwezi ni inkunga yabo ku kigega c'ubwishingizi mu kwivuza kuko ayo abaturage basanzwe batanga ni make cane ugereranije n'ayakenewe kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza mu buryo bukwiriye". "Rero ni ngombwa ko hashakwa izindi nzira zo kwunganira ico kikega kugira ngo abaturage bashobore guhabwa serivisi z'ubuzima zikwiriye, inzego z'ubuzima nazo zishobore kugira ubushobozi bwo kubafasha neza". Avuga ko ibivugwa n'abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi y'uko ikigo RSSB gikora gihomba kandi ko iyo ntererano isanzwe ikoreshwa nabi, bidafise ishingiro "kuko nta bindi bari kuvuga". Ati: "Ikigo c'ubwisungane RSSB nta kibazo gifise, aho ikibazo kiri, ni uko abaturage basabwa amafaranga makeya ugereranyije n'ayo bategerezwa gutanga kugira ngo bashobore kwivuza". Bwana Musonera avuga ko imbere y'uko iyo ngingo ifatwa habaye ibiganiro bitandukanye vyari bifise intumbero yo kurondera inzira zo kwegeranya ubwo buryo harimwo n'abakozi, akabonako ata mpamvu y'uko yojamwo impari. Ati: "Ivyo ari vyo vyose jewe ico numva abantu bashira imbere ni ukumva akamaro bifitiye buri Munyarwanda wese ndetse n'uyo mukozi". Ku wa 26 z'ukwezi guheze, ni ho umushikiranganji w'abakozi ba leta n'umurimo mu Rwanda yasohora itangazo risaba abakoresha bo mu nzego za leta n'abikorera utwabo gukata 0.5% ku mushahara wa buri kwezi ku bakozi babo  maze bakawushikiriza ikigo c'Ubwisungane mu Rwanda (RSSB). Ni ingingo ishingiye kw'itegeko ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere c'ico gihugu ryo ku wa 13 z'ukwa mbere uno mwaka nyene, ryerekeye ubwisungane mu kwivuza, rikanerekana inzira zitandukanye uburyo bushobora kuvamwo.

column2: U﻿kraine ibandanya gushora intete n'aho Uburusiya bwikuye mu masezerano
column3: Ikigo gihagarariwe na UN/ONU kigenzura ingene intete zishorwa ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura ki vuga ko u﻿bundi bwato butatu bwahagurutse muri Ukraine ku musi wa kabiri, n'aho uburusiya bwafashe ingingo yo kwivana muri ayo amasezerano. I﻿co kigo kivuga ko ubwo bwato 'bwemerewe kugenda na Ukraine, Turkia na Onu, mu gihe uburusiya na bwo "bwabimenyeshejwe". K﻿u musi wa mbere, amato 12 atwaye amatone 354.500 y'ibifungurwa yarahagurutse muri Ukraine. U﻿burusiya bwahagaritse gushigikira ayo masezerano ku musi wa gatandatu, bwagiriza Ukraine gukoresha inzira ubwato bucamwo mu gutera  amato yabwo y'intambara. O﻿nu ivuga ko ata bwato na bumwe bwariko buraca muri iyo nzira muri iryo joro. U﻿kraine ntiyigeze yemanga kugira uruhara muri ico gitero ca Crimme  - izinga rya Ukraine riri mu bumanuko ryigaruriwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. P﻿rezida wa Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky yagiriza Uburusiya "gukangisha inzara amakungu" - ivyo Uburusiya buhakana. I﻿co kigo gifise icicaro I Istanbul ntikiramenyesha ivyo ubwo bwato butatu bwavuye muri Ukraine ku wa kabiri bwikoreye. U﻿burusiya nta co buravuga kuri ivyo. U﻿muzigo wo kuri uyu wa mbere ni wo wambere munini utwaye ku musi umwe kuva ayo masezerano yo gutwara intete atanguye gushirwa mu bikorwa, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi w'ubutegetsi bwa gisirikare bwa Odesa aho yasubiwemwo na Reuters. Ubwo butegetsi bwongeyeko ko bumwe mu bwato butwaye amatoni 40.000 y'intete bwari bugenewe igihugu ca Ethiopia, aho "hashobora gutera amapfa." I﻿nyuma y'aho Uburusiya butereye Ukraine mu kwezi kwa kabiri, amato yabwo yaciye yugariza ibivuko vya Ukraine vyo ku kiyaga cirabura, bwugaranirayo imiliyoni 20 z'intete zigenewe gutwarwa hagati mu gihugu, harimwo n'ibindi bifungurwa nk'ibigori n'amavuta y'ibihoke. A﻿riko mu kwezi kw'indwi harabonetse amasezerano hagati y'Uburusiya na Ukraine bafashijwe na Turkia na Onu, bituma hashobora gusubira gushorwa intete ziciye mu kiyaga cirabura. A﻿riko ku musi wa mbere, prezida w'Uburusiya Vladimir Putin yavuze ko ayo masezerano yahagaritswe , avuga ko ari kubera ibitero "vyinshi" vy'indege zitagira umudereva ku mato yabwo ku bivuko vya Sevastopol aho yavuze ko Ukraine ibifisemwo uruhara. Y﻿avuze ko hategerezwa kubanza kubaho umutekano wo mu mazi, ko kwubahiriza amasezerano yo gushora intete bikimeze uko koba ari ukwigerezako. M﻿w'ijambo ryiwe ku mboneshakure, prezida Putin yagize ati:"Ukraine itegerezwa kubanza kwemeza ko ubwato butwara abantu butazogeramigwa." U﻿kraine ntiyemeje ko yagize uruhara muri ivyo bitero, ikavuga ko Uburusiya bwateguye kuva kera kwivana muri ayo masezerano mpuzamakungu, mu kugira icitwazo ivyo bitero. U﻿muvugizi w'ibiro vya prezida w'Uburusiya, Dmitry Peskov yagize ati:"Mu gihe Uburusiya buvuga ko bidashoka kwemanga umutekano wo muri ako karere, ayo masezerano aragoye gushirwa mu bikorwa, yafashe iyindi ntumbero - harimwo ukwigerezako kurengeje. U﻿kwikura muri ayo masezerano kw'Uburusiya kwatewe ivyatsi na Amerika, yavuze ko ico ico gihugu "kiriko kirakoresha imfungurwa nk'ikigwanisho". J﻿oseph Borrell ajejwe imigenderanire y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya EU n'amakungu, yateye akamo Uburusiya kwisubirako, avuga ko kubuza urudandazwa rw'intete n'umwavu bishobora gutera ikibazo c'inzara kw'isi. U﻿wuserukira Uburusiya muri Amerika yamiriye kure ivyo vyagiriji ko igihugu ciwe kiriko kiratuma haba inzara kw'isi, yemeza ko ari akarenganyo kunebagura igihugu ciwe. U﻿burusiya bwafashe iyo ngingo mu gihe bwemeza ko bwaguye igikorwa co gukura abantu mu karere bwigaruriye ka Kherson, n'aho bwari bwavuze, mu mpera z'iyinga, bwari bwarangije ico gikorwa.

column2: Amakenga ajanye n'ubuhinga bwo kwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro (menopause)
column3: Abahinga bakomeje kwerekana amakenga, ajanye n'ubuhinga bushasha  bwo kuvura, bwemeza ko bishoboka kwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro ku bakenyezi canke menopause, gushika ku myaka irenga 10. Abakenyezi bamwe baramaze kuriha amafranga angana hafi ibihumbi 6 vy'amapoundi yo kwivuza muri ubwo buryo. Umwigisha wo muri Kaminuza Simon Fishel, arongoye umugwi w'abaganga ujejwe ubuhinga bwo guhuza intanga y'umugabo n'igi ry'umugore bibereye hanze y'igitereko bita IVF, avuga ko uyo mugambi utuma amahirwe yo kuronka ikibondo mu buzima bw'abakenyezi, yiyongera. Utuma kandi ibibazo bishikira amagara bivuye ku guca imvyaro - nk'indwara ziva ku mero y'umutima n'amagufa adakomeye - zigwanywa. Ubuhinga Ubwo buhinga burimwo kubaga agace gatoyi k'akagi kamwe kari mu gitereko - kagizwe n'agace gatoyi cane, kandi gakanyishwa ahakanye cane. Dushobora gukanyishwa cane,  mu nyuma tugaterwa mu mubiri. Inkuru zitangwa n'abaganga bigenga bakora ubwo buvuzi  zivuga ko iyo umukenyezi akeneye ko bamubaga kugira ako kagi gasubire mu mubiri, ashobore kuronka ikibondo, gashobora gusubizwa mu karingoti kajamwo igi mu gitereko, igihe kigeze. Iyo intumbero yiwe ari  ukwigiza inyuma guca imvyaro, kugira bishoboke ngo gashobora gushirwa mu kibanza kirimwo amaraso akwiye gashobora gukenera - akenshi  ni mu kwaha. Uko ukurayo ako kagi hakiri kare, biciye ku bikorwa vyo kwa muganga,  nk'uko Fishel abivuga, niko gashobora kugira akamaro cane - kandi niko haba n'imisemburo myinshi. Ariko gushika ubu abakenyezi 11 gusa nibo bamaze kuvugwa biciye muri ubu buryo. Muganga Fishel aremera ko ubu buhinga bukiriko burageragezwa uko buri bwose, ariko  ko  ibice bimwe bimwe vyabwo bitariko birigwa. Ubundi buhinga bwo kuvura bwashoboye gukoreshwa n'abaganga mu gufasha abakanyezi ngo amagi yo mu gitereko yabo ntareke gukora kubera kuvurwa ingwara ya kanseri. Ubu rero hariho amakuru akwiye yerekana ko  uburyo bwo kuvura nk'ubu budafise ingaruka mbi. Ariko Muganga Melanie Davies ajejwe kubungabunga  umugambi wo kurondoka mu Bwongereza,  aragabisha abakenyezi bafise amagara meza, ko kugenda kwibagisha mugihe bidakenewe,  mu ntumbero yo kwizera kugumana ubushobozi bwo kurondoka muri kazoza,  no gusubiriza imisemburo. Avuga ati: ''Turazi ko gusubizaho ubushobozi bwo kurondoka bishoboka, mu rugero rw'abakenyezi bagwaye indwara ya kanseri''. ''Ariko, nta mukenyezi n'umwe arahura n'iki kibazo gushika ubu, kandi nta vyemezo ko aho hantu babaze hazoguma hameze neza gushika ku myaka irenga 10. Rero bizofasha gakeyi cane  gusubiriza imisemburo. ''Ugusubiriza imisemburo bisanzwe biriho kwa muganga,  birakorerwa ubushakashatsi cane,  kandi biri henshi kugira abakenyezi bemere gutora gufata iyo misemburo''. Muganga Davies, umukuru w'umugwi w'ubuhanuzi  bujejwe imiti ijanye no guca imvyaro mu Bwongereza, avuga ko ingaruka zijanye no gushobora gukura akagi, n'ivyo kabitswemwo mu kibanza cako, mu ntumbero yo kudukoresha haheze igihe kinini, harimwo ukurondoka, bisaba ukundi gusuzumwa Si abakenyezi bose bakeneye imiti igabanya ibimenyetso vyo guca imvyaro, ariko hari inzira zitandukanye zishoboka. Ukuvyivuza neza ni ugusubiriza imisemburo, bigabanya ibimenyetso vyinshi bifitaniye isano, na cane cane ubushuhe mw'ijoro, n'ukugira utuvyimbe mu maso - naho bitohanurwa kuri bamwe. column2: Perezida Nkurunziza w'u Burundi hari ivyo asaba amadini kwirinda, rimwe rivuga ko 'rizovuga ukuri'
column3: Perezida Petero Nkurunziza w'Uburundi asaba abarongoye amadini ko bokwirinda kugwa mu mutego muri kino gihe u Burundi buriko bwitegurira amatora yo mu mwaka uza wa 2020. Amwe mu madini nka Ekleziya Katolika yoyo ivuga ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo. Mw'ijambo ryiwe yashikirije yibuka imyaka ine amaze atowe n'abanyagihugu ubwabo ku ncuro ya kabiri, Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ko bokwirinda "kugwa mu mutego w'abahanuzi b'ibinyoma n'inyigisho zikomoka hanze" avuga ko zitajanye n'ivy'Imana. Bwana Nkurunziza avuga ati: "Si ivy'imbeshere, bamwe mu bakozi b'Imana baraguye, abandi barakomereka bongera bakomeretsa abayoboke babo; babera umuzimagiza abo bajejwe aho kubabera urumuri n'icitegererezo". Ntadoma urutoke kw'idini iri canke ririya, gusa Ekleziya Katolika ni yo ikunze kwagirizwa ko yivanga mu vya politike. Bavuga ko ibi ibikora cane cane mu gihe ishikiriza aho ihagaze ku biraba ubuzima bw'igihugu mu butumwa bukunda gusomwa mu masengero yose ya Katolika mu gihugu. Abasenyeri ba Katolika bobo bamenyesha ko ata nyigisho za politike batanga, ahubwo ko bigisha iyobokamana ariko ryerekeye n'ivyo abantu barimwo "kuko iyobokamana rirangukira mu buzima bw'abantu". Mu ndwi iheze, mu birori vy'uguhimbaza umunsi mukuru wa Assomption, Pascal Nyabenda arongoye inama nshingamateka, yasavye abarongoye Ekleziya Katolika kuguma hagati na hagati, ntiberekane aho bahagaze mu vya politike kuko ngo bitsitaza abakirisu. Mu kumwishura, Umuvugizi w'inama y'abepiskopi mu Burundi, Yohakimu Ntahondereye, yamenyesheje ko bazovuga ijambo ry'Imana uko riri ata gucisha iruhande, "n'aho hari aho rigera rikababaza".

column2: Coronavirus: Iki kiza kiriko gikora ibara mu turere tw’abirabure b’Abanyamerika
column3: Ibiharuro biteye agahinda bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago vyerekana ibitigiri vy'umurengera vya coronavirus mu banyamerika b'abirabure. Abirabure bo muri Chicago bangana hafi igice c'abamaze kwandura coronavirus muri ico gisagara, hamwe n'ibice birenga 70% vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, n'aho bangana n'ibice 30% vy'abanyagihugu baba muri ico gisagara. Eka n'ibindi bisagara bifise abirabure benshi, harimwo Detroit, Milwaukee, Nouvelles Orléans na New York, navyo nyene vyabaye ikiririmbiro rya coronavirus. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziharurwamwo hafi abantu 370.000 bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, hamwe n'abashika 11.OOO bamaze gupfa. Gushika ku wa 05 z'uku kwa kane, abantu 1824 kuri 4680 bari bamaze kwandura Covid-19 muri Chicago, bari abirabure, nk'uko vyashikirijwe n'abarongoye ico gisagara ejo ku wa mbere. Aho ni mu gihe abazungu bari bamaze kwandura ari 847, aba Hispanic (abanyamerika bava muri Amerika y'Epfo bavuga iki Espagnole) 478, hamwe na 126 bakomoka muri Aziya. Gushika ku wa Mungu, Chicago yari imaze guharurwamwo abantu 98 bamaze gupfa, muri bo ibice 72% bakaba ari abirabure. Ubwo busumbane buribonekeza mu ntara yose ya Illinois, aho abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 ibice 41% ari abirabure, mu gihe bagize ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose baba muri iyo ntara. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago, Dr Allison Arwady, avuga ko abirabure bari basanzwe babayeho mu buzima bubayabaye ugereranije na bagenzi babo b'abazungu. Umukuru w'ico gisagara, Lori Lightfoot, avuga ko coronavirus "ibandanya  yiha inkumbi mu birabure ba Chicago". Avuga ko abagenzuzi b'igisagara bashobora kuzunguruka mu maduka kugira ngo barabe ko bose bakurikiza ingingo zo kutegerana. Umupfasoni Lightfoot, avuga y'uko bibaye ngombwa bashobora gutera umukwabu bagahagarika uruja n'uruza mu turere abantu bakoraniramwo bihereza inzoga zikaze cane, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru gikorera aho muri Chicago, Sun-Times. N'aho coronavirus ivugwa ko "itarenganya", ibiharuro birerekana ko uburere bwose butabangamiwe ku rugero rumwe. Muri Michigan, Abanyamerika b'abirabure bangana ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose, ariko mu bantu bose bamaze kwandura abirabure bangana n'ibice 33%, nayo mu bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima abirabure bangana n'ibice 41%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri iyo ntara ejo ku wa mbere. Muri abo bamaze kwandura muri iyo ntara nyene, abazungu ni ibice 23% , hamwe na 28% vy'abamaze gupfa, nk'uko ivyo biharuro bivyerekana. Mu gisagara ca Detroit muri iyo ntara ya Michigan, abirabure bangana n'ibice 80%, abashizwe ukwabo muri ico gisagara no mu micungararo yaco bakaba ari ibice 80%. Ubwo busumbane kandi buribonekeza mu gisagara ca Milwaukee c'intara ya Wisconsin, kiri mu bisagara vyashizwe inyuma cane muri Amerika. Mu bantu hafi 1000 banduye ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze muri Amerika, hafi inusu y'abanduye mu gisagara ca Milwaukee bari abirabure, bakaba kandi bangana n'ibice 81% muri 27 bapfuye muri ico gisagara, n'aho abirabure baba muri co bangana n'ibice 26%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe n'ikigo ProPublica. Mu ntara ya Louisiana, ibice hafi 40% vy'abamaze guhitanwa na coronavirus biri mu karere ka Nouvelle-Orléans gasanzwe gatuwemwo n'abirabure benshi gusumba abandi. Muri Amerika, ico kiza kiriko kirunyura ubusumbasumbane bufatiye ku butunzi n'amoko, nk'uko Dr Cameron Webb, umunyamerika w'umwirabure ariko yiyamamariza ubukenguzamateka mu ntara ya Virginia yabibwiye BBC. Ati: "Ni ukuri kiriko kiragaragaza ubusumbasumbane buri mu gihugu cacu".

column2: Burundi - Rwanda: Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi yashikanye ubutumwa bwa Kagame kuri Ndayishimiye
column3: Intumwa zidasanzwe z'Urwanda zirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe kwivuna abansi ziri mu rugendo mu gihugu c'Uburundi, nk'uko umuvugizi wa prezida w'Uburundi abivuga. Maj Gen Albert Murasira n'abo bagendanye kuri uyu wa Kabiri bakiriwe n'umukuru w'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye i Gitega, umurwa mukuru. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye, Evelyne Butoyi, umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizanye ubutumwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Kuva prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi mu 2020, hari utwigoro tw'uko Uburundi n'Urwanda bisubira kugira imigenderanire nmyiza inyuma yo gutituka cane kuva mu 2015. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye , Evelyne Butoyi , umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizaniye ubutumwa bwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Si ubwa mbere intumwa z'Urwanda zigendeye Uburundi. Mu kwezi kw'indwi mu mwaka uheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Urwanda, Edouard Ngirente niwe yaserukiye Urwanda  mu kwifatanya n'abarundi mu guhimbaza imyaka 59 yari iheze igihugu cabo kironse intahe yo kwikukira. 'Ihwa ritarashinguka' N'Uburundi bumaze kurungika akatari gake intumwa mu Rwanda. Mu minsi hariyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe  ubutungane. Rwanda - Burundi: Ba minisitiri b'ubutabera bahuriye i Kigali "Ni nk'igitangaza abarundi babonye" - Evariste Ndayishimiye Imbere yiwe hari hagiyeyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ECA,  zakirwa n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Urwanda, Paul Kagame. Ariko gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi iguma ivuga ko hakiri ikitarakorwa kugira imigederanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu imere neza uko vyahora. Reta y'Uburundi isaba reta y'Urwada kuyirungikira abo irondera bahungiye hakurya y'Akanyaru  inyuma y'uruhara boba baragize mu kugeregeza gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2015. Zaba iz'Urwanda zigendera Uburundi, canke iz'Uburundi zigendera Urwanda, nta ntumwa na zimwe ziremeza ko iryo hwa risigaye muri iyo migenderanire rigiye gushinguka. Inyuma y'umubonano na prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye  muri uru rundi rugendo rw'intumwa z'Urwanda mu Burundi, umuvugizi w'umukuru  w'igihugu , Evelyne Butoyi, yavuze ko izo ntumwa zaganiriye   "ibijanye n'imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu uko ari bibiri". Yongeyeko ati: "Murazi ko ivyo bihugu vyompi uko ari bibiri biriko birakora kugira imigenderanire isubire kugenda neza, ku neza y'Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda, ku neza y'ibihugu vyacu uko ari bibiri."

column2: U Burundi bugiye guhura na Nigeria muri CAN2019, abakinyi ngo baratekanye
column3: Robert Patrick Misigaro, BBC. Ikipe nserukiragihugu y'u Burundi, Intamba Mu Rugamba, ejo kuwa gatandatu izokina na Nigeria mu rukino rwayo rwa mbere rw'igikombe ca Afrika 2019, abayigize bavuga nta bwoba bafitiye ico gihangange mu mupira w'amaguru. Mu zuba rimena imbwa agahanga kuri Alexandria Stadium mu muji wa Alexandria mu Misiri, umumenyereza w'Intamba ahejeje kugenzura ikibuga zizokinirako na Nigeria, yemeza ko ata bwoba bafise. Olivier Niyungeko yabwiye BBC ko ica nkenerwa ari uko Abarundi benewabo babafata mu mugongo aho bari hose, naho batoshika i Alexandria. Yagize ati: "Nka kurya bamenyereye gushigikira umurwi wabo w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, twobasaba ko babandanya badushigikira aho bari hose, kuko iyo umuntu ashigikiwe aravyiyumvamwo agakora cane. "Twaje ngaha kuduza ibendera ry'igihugu cacu kandi abakinyi baravyumva, hasigaye ko umuntu wese yumva ko ari Umurundi avuga ati 'ndashigikiye Intamba Mu Rugamba'". Abajijwe niba ikibazo c'ubushuhe bose bikugura ata ngorane kibateye, bwana Niyungeko yavuze ko abona ivyo gukina mu ma saa kumi bobireka bagakina ku kagoroba izuba ritanguye kurenga,  kanatsinda ngo amatara arahari ku bibuga ngo rero ntabona igituma batobigenza uko. Kizigenza w'Intamba Mu Rugamba, Saido Berahino, yatanguye gukinira iyi kipe igaca inaronka itike yayo ya mbere yo kuja muri iri higanwa, ari mu bakinyi bazeweko vyinshi. Kiretse ko ari muri bake bamaze gukina mu mahiganwa akomeye, nk'ihiganwa ryo mu Bwongereza Premier League, ni nawe azwi cane ku rwego mpuzamakungu. Yavuze ko ari amahirwe adasanzwe kuba akinira ikipe y'igihugu ciwe, ibintu yamye yipfuza kuva kera. Agira ati: "Naragize amahirwe yo gukina mu Bwongereza kandi vyarahinduye ubuzima bwanje. Ariko nk'uko namye ndabivuga, u Burundi niko gataka kanje, namye nshaka gukinira u Burundi. "Kuba noneho ndi  na kapitene w'u Burundi mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri ni iteka rihambaye kuri jewe." Naho icizere ari cose, u Burundi ntibworohewe na gato kuko Nigeria atari ikipe yo gupfa guta mu ndasa. Imaze kuja muri iri higanwa inshuro nyinshi mbere iranaritwara, eka mbere ikaba imaze no guserukira Afrika mu gikombe c'isi. Ariko naho biri uko, umumenyereza wa Nigeria, Gernot Rohr, avuga ko adashobora gufata minenerwe ikipe y'u Burundi naho ari ubwa mbere igiye mw'ihiganwa rikomeye nk'iri. Bwana Rohr yagize ati: "Twiteguriye u Burundi nk'uko twitegurira ikipe iyo ari yo yose. Twitegurana ukwicisha bugufi, ata gukengera uwo tuza gukina nawe. "U Burundi ni ikipe itigeze itsindwa mu nkino zose zo guhiganirwa itike yo kuza muri iki gikombe. Yaba Gabon, yaba Mali, nta n'imwe yigeze ishobora gutsinda iyi kipe y'u Burundi. "Twarabaravye kuri za video, turabaraba kandi mu rukino rwa nyuma rwo kwitegura, aho bari banganije na Tuniziya ikaza gutsinda mu minota yanyuma."
