column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Man U: Ralf Rangnick avuga ko ivyo kuwanira ubukapiteni hagati ya Maguire na Ronaldo ari 'ibinyoma'
column3: Umumenyereza mfatakibanza wa Manchester United Ralf Rangnick avuga ko amakuru y'ukutumvikana kuri hagati ya kizigenza Harry Maguire na Cristiano Ronaldo ari "ikinyoma ceruye". Inkuru yanditswe n'ikinyamakuru Mirror ivuga ko aba bakinyi babiri "bai mu rugamba rukomeye" barwanira kuba kizigenza. Rangnick avuga ko yabwiwe ivy'iyo nkuru yanditswe ariko ko itamuhagaritse umutima "kuko ndazi ko atari iy'ukuri". Uyu Mudagi ati: "Iki ni ikinyoma ceruye - sindigera mvugana n'aba bakinyi ibijanye n'ikibanza ca kizigenza". "Ico nta ngorane cigeze kintera. Harry ni we kizigenza wacu kandi azobandanya ari kizigenza wacu". Maguire yagenywe kuba kizigenza n'uwahoze ari umumenyereza w'uyu murwi Ole Gunnar Solskjaer. haraciye imyaka ibiri, ariko iyo nkuru yanditswe muri ico kinyamakuru ivuga ko igaruka rya Ronaldo w'imyaka 27 muri uyu murwi ritamworohereje. Aciye ku mbuga hwaniro, uyu mukinyi w'inyuma w'Ubwongereza avuga ko iyi nkuru atari yo kandi ko we na bagenziwe "banama rimwe kandi bafise intumbero imwe" yo kwitegurira urukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu na Leeds United. Rangnick yongerako ati: "Ni ukuri nta mutima usimba kuko ndazi ko ari ikinyoma. Ivyo sinigera navyumviriza kuko ikindaje ishinga ari ugutegura umurwi wanje". "Numvise ivyanditswe. Ni vyo, hariho abakinyi batanezerejwe n'ingene akadirisha k'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi ryaheze. Ibi vyararenganye kandi icuka mu murwi ni ciza ugereranije no mu ndwi nkeya ziheze". "Ikituraje ishinga ni ugukina neza kandi tukerekana ubumwe ku kibuga. Ico ni co twokwitaho". Rangnick avuga ko yari aherutse kubwirwa ibijanye n'ubushamirane busanzwe buri hagati ya Manchester United na Leeds kandi ko arindiranye igishika no gukinira kuri Elland Road (ikibuga ca Leeds United) yuzuye. "Twari dufise imirwi mikeya ihangana bikomeuye mu Budagi. Ariko, umurwi wacu ufise uburambe bukomeye  bwo buhangana n'imrwi mu bihe nk'ibi. "Uko ndabizi, ni rwo rukino rwa mbere [kuri Manchester United] ikibuga ca Elland Road  cuzuye, haraciye igihe. tuarurindiranye igishika".

column2: Ashley ati: ‘Nari nzi ko SIDA ari indwara ifata abakiri bato’
column3: Igihe Ashley, umugore w'imyaka 59, yinjizwa ibitaro afise ingorane y'urura, yaba we canke abaganga nta n'umwe yibaza ko wari umugera wa SIDA. Mu vyo yibuka, avuga ati: "Bambwiye ko ata ngorane n'imwe mfise, ariko ko nari mfise umugera - gusa sinamenye ko nari mfise umugera ukomeye ushobora kubaho". Haciye imyaka itatu Ashley apimwe bagasanga yaranduye umugera wa SIDA,  inyuma y'aho akoreye imibonano mpuzabitsina atikingiye. Ariko kubona bawutoye baratevye bivuga ko uwo mugera wari wamaze gutangura kwonona ubushobozi bw'umubiri bwo gushibira kwikingira indwara. Ivyashikiye Ashley si ibintu bidasanzwe kuko abantu batandatu kuri cumi bafise imyaka irenga 50 banduye umugera wa SIDA ni abagiye kumenya ko banduye batevye mu 2018, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu Bwongereza, PHE. Abahinga muvyo amagara y'abantu hamwe n'amashirahamwe y'abagiraneza bavuga ko kubera batitabwaho, kandi bagafatwa ko atamibonano mpuzabitsina bakora, bituma batamenya ko banduye. Ashley ati: "Abantu barengeje imyaka 50, canke abahukanye, bobo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura". "Kubera bazi ko badashobora kwibungenga, bavuga bati 'nta ngorane' canke bati 'izi ni indwara z'abakiri bato'. Ariko sivyo, uwo ari we wese arashobora kuyandura". Ibiharuro bitangwa n'ikigo PHE vyerekana ko igitigiri c'abanduye indwara zifatira mu bihimba vy'irondoka kuva ku myaka 45 kuduga vyiyongereye gushika hafi ku bice 35% mu myaka itanu iheze. Icigwa casohowe mu kinyamakuru c'amagara yabantu The Lancet mu 2017, cerekana ko umuntu umwe kuri batandatu bagendana umugera wa SIDA i Bulaya ari kuva ku myaka 50 kuduga, kandi ko ibitigiri vy'abawandura vyaduze mu bihugu 16 vy'i Bulaya mu myaka cumi iheze. Norah O'Brien, umuhinga mu bijanye n'irondoka rijanye n'amagara meza mu kigo PHE, avuga ko abafise imyaka yitereye na bo nyene ubwabo bibaza ko badashobora kwandura. Nivyo vyari mu mutwe wa Karen Norton w'imyaka 63, yanduye umugera mu myaka mike iheze muri Afrika. Ati: "Abenshi twibaza ko ivyo kwandura bidashobora kudushikira". "N'abaganga basa n'abibaza ko umuntu arenza imyaka 50 adashobora kwandura uwu mugera". "Twese dusa n'uko twiyumvira gutyo ku bantu barenza imyaka 50. Ntushobora kwibaza ko nyoko wawe canke so wawe ashobora kuwandura - ariko ni ikintu gishoboka cane". Vyafashe igihe kirekire kugira ngo Karen yimenyekanishe ko yanduye, kuko yatinya ko bohava bamucira urubanza. Ati: "Wumva umengo wikoreye umucafu utegerezwa kunyegeza". "Mu gihe ukoze imibonano mpuzabitsina utikingiye, ushobora kwandura. Akarorero ni jewe". Mu kwezi guheze, ibiharuro vyerekanye ko igitigiri c'abanduye umugera wa SIDA mu Bwongereza cagabanutse bimwe biboneka kuva mu 2012 - cane cane mu bantu bahuza ibitsina babisangiye. Ishirahamwe ry'abagiraneza ryo mu Bwongereza, Terrence Higgins Trust, rivuga ko igikenewe ubu ari uko igice c'abantu batitaweho, nk'abo barengeje imyaka 50, bokwitabwaho gusumba. Aled Osborne nawe wo mw'ishirahanwe Brigstowe ryo mu Bwongereza nyene avuga ko abantu bafise imyaka yitereye bagifise mu mutwe ivyavugwa ku mugera wa SIDA mu myaka ya 1980 na 90, akabona ko bashobora kuba batashoboye kuronswa amakuru nyayo kuva ico gihe. Ati: "Kugendana umugera wa SIDA si igihano c'urupfu nk'uko vyari bimeze mu myaka ya 80 na 90. Ubu imiti ikora neza iriho". "Abantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti ntibashobora kwanduza uwo mugera". Imyaka yo kubaho ku bantu bagendana umugera wa SIDA ariko basanzwe bafata iyo miti nico kimwe n'iy'abandi bose muri rusangi. Hagati aho, ugereranije n'abatanguye kuyifata bakimenya ko banduye uwo mugera, amahirwe si menshi ku bacerewe kuyifata. Ashley vyaramugoye kuko yagiye kumenya ko yanduye yatevye. Ati: "Jewe nta ngorane vyantera kugendana umugera wa SIDA. Nta ngorane bintera n'ukuri. Gusa kubona batashotse bawutora, vyatumye nteba kubimenya". " Vyafashe igihe kirekire…kandi umubiri wanje warononekaye - numva bimbabaje".

column2: Ni nde yanditse Bibiliya ?
column3: Na Edison Veiga BBC News Brazil Kuba Katolika, Bibiliya igizwe n’ibitabo 73. Ku baporoti hari 66, nayo aba-orthodoxe bavuga ko hari 78. Ni mu gihe Abayahudi bemera ibitabo 39 gusa, ibi bikaba ari ivyo abakirisu bavuga ko ari ivyo mw’isezerano rya kera. Aha turiko tuvuga igitabo kigurishwa cane gusumba ibindi vyose muri kahise k’isi, Bibiliya Nyeranda, ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo vyahinduwe mu ndimi zababa 3.000 – aho ibirenga imiriyaridi 3.9 bimaze kugurishwa kw’isi yose, nk’uko bivugwa n’umuryango wa Bibliya wa Brezili (Société biblique du Brésil). Ariko none, ni bande banditse ibi bitabo? Dufashe ko ari ibitabo vya kera cane, imbere y’uko abanditsi ba none batangura kwandika uko bandika, biragoye kuronkera iki kibazo inyishu nyayo. Intango y’iki kiyago ni ukubanza kumenya nimba ari ukugifatira ku bijanye n’idini gusa, canke nimba gikwiye gufatira ku buhinga n’ubumenyi. Umuhinga mu vya kahise no mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana Gerson Leite de Moraes asanzwe yigisha kuri kaminuza Mackenzie Presbyterian University avuga ati: "Ni ikibazo kitoroshe kubera hari imbono zibiri. Imbono ya mbere ishingiye ku kwemera Imana gushingiye ku masengero, aha tukaba dufise abiga ibijanye no kwemera Imana kubera bashaka kuba abapasitori/abapatiri mu muryango kanaka, imbono kama ». Kubw’iwe, inyigisho z’amasabamana ziganisha ku busaseredoti/ubupasitori, zitegerezwa « kugendera ku nyigisho z’uko ivyanditswe vyavugishijwe, ni ukuvuga ko ari ivyavuzwe n’Imana yo nyene ubwayo, iciye kuri Mutima Mweranda/Mpwemu Yera ». Avuga ati : "Ku rundi ruhande, inyigisho ku bijanye no kwemera Imana zishingiye ku buhinga ntizirajwe ishinga n’iyo mbono, ahubwo zozo zirondera kwihweza uko izi nyandiko zaje ufatiye ku bihe vya kahise ». Muri iyi nzira, turashobora gutahura ibitabo vya mbere vya Bibiliya, ibigize vya bitabo bitanu vya mbere bizwi nka Pentateuque (canke nka Torah y’Abayahudi), ko ari icegeranyo c’inyandiko zanditswe ubwa mbere imyaka hafi 1.000 imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Ibi ni Amamuko/Itanguriro, Ihunga, Abalewi, Guharura/Kubara  hamwe na Gutegeka kwa Kabiri  (Deuteronome)  - ibitabo bivuga ivyerekeye kuva kw’irema ry’isi gushika ku rupfu rwa Musa. Kubera ari ivya kera, abahinga bavuga ko bigoye kumenya neza na neza abavyanditse. Kubw’amayagwa y’idini, ibi bitabo bitanu vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe, Musa. José Luiz Goldfarb, umwigisha wa kaminuza ya Katorika y’i São Paulo akaba arongoye n’igisata c’imico y’ikiyahudi mu murwi A Hebraica, avuga ati : "Nsomye nkongera nkavugana n’umusiguzi akongera akaba n’umukinyi w’ivyese, Haroldo de Campos (1929-2003), nahakuye icigwa ko hari inzira zibiri zishoboka. Iyo yo mw’isinagoga ivuga ko Musa ari we yanditse Torah. Tubifata nk’uko twama ‘twumviriza’ Musa buri ndwi [ibisomwa], kandi ibi bifise agaciro mu mico y’abantu ». Ihengama ry’abahinga ntiryemera ibivugwa ko ibi bitabo vyanditswe n’umuntu umwe. Ati : "Ku bijanye n’inyigisho za Bibiliya, tuvuga ibitabo vyanditswe mu myaka irenga 600 ». "Uku niko umwihwezo wa Harold urangira hampande y’ubushakashatsi yagize kuri Bibiliya, kubisigarira vy’ivya kera (archeoloie), ku bisigarira no ku nzandiko zo guhayagiza ». Avuga ko umwihwezo wimbitse w’izi nzandiko ufasha kubitadukanya ufatiye ku nyubako, amajambo azigize, n’ibirimwo ufatiye ku banditsi mu bihe bitandukanye vyo muri kahise. Ni iciyumviro cemerwa neza. Uri Lam wo mu muryango Templo Beth-El w’abanya-Israel muri São Paulo asigura ati: "Biragoye cane kuvuga ivy’ibihe canke abanditsi kuko umuntu atakara. Amatohoza y’abahinga yemeza ko izi nyandiko zifise imyaka iri hagati ya 2.700 na 3.000 canke gusumba aho kubera vyahererekanwa ku munwa ». Kubw’iwe, izo nyandiko zaratagatifujwe – ni ukuvuga ko zegeranijwe hanyuma zifatwa ko ari izigize Bibiliya y’Abahebreyi– amaja mu kinjana ca IV imbere y’umuzo wa Yezu/Yesu. Lam yemera ati : "Ariko n’aho nyene, hari impari nyinshi, kandi ntidushobora kurangiza iki kibazo ». Goldfarb abona akarusho muri ibi vyo gufatira hamwe izi nyandiko hamwe no kuzifatira mu mice itandukanye. Yibaza ati : "Nimba ari inyandiko zamaze imyaka 600, ibi ni vyiza ku bantu bakunda ibikorwa. Ni bangahe bashoboye gusohora inyandiko mu karere kamwe canke akandi ? ». Muri ico gihe nyene ivy’abanditsi bitandukanye n’ivy’ubu, ingorane nk’izi nyene zo kumenya koko uwanditse zirabandanya mu bindi bitabo biri muri Bibiliya y’Abayahudi – ikonganirizo ry’ibitabo bigize isezerano rya kera muri bibliya ya gikirisu. Goldfarb ati: "Nk’akarorero, zaburi za Dawudi. Ni agatabo gato abantu bakoresha cane mu bisabisho n’indirimbo vya misi yose kegeranya indirimbo Dawudi yakunda kuririmba mw’isinagoga. "Tuvuga ko yari umuririmvyi kandi ko ibi bisabisho vyaririmbwa. Ni nde abizi ? Ni ikibazo ciza:  ku vyo nize ngasoma, jewe ntavyo nokwemeza… ». Moraes nawe ati: "Ikiri ukuri ni uko habaye benshi banditse ibiri muri Bibiliya ». "Igishoboka cane ni uko inkuru ziri mu vyanditswe muri bibiliya muri kino gihe imbere y’aha vyahanahanwa ku munwa igisekuru ku kindi. Kandi iri ryagumye ari itunga karanga ry’idini ry’aba bantu ». Uyu mwigisha wa kaminuza ati: "Ni ukumenya kandi ko ivyo abitirirwa inyandiko mu gihe ca kera bitandukanye n’ivyo dufise ubu. Ico gihe, vyari bikunze kuba ko inyandiko kanaka yitirirwa umutware mukuru, umutegetsi akundwa, umuntu akomeye ». Aha niho rero, abanywanyi b’inyigisho zimwe zimwe, iyo bahinduye ivyo bazi bakabishira mu nyandiko, bakunda kuzitunganya nk’uko umengo ni ikintu canditswe na ba shebuja. Moraes  yongerako ati : "Kubiraba Torah, ushaka kuvuga ko izi nzandiko zanditswe na Musa? Bishobora kuba atari vyo. Kumbure afise kuba yarabigizemwo uruhara. Hari bamwe bavuga ko ata ruhara na rutoya yagize. "Ariko ni inyandiko zitirirwa Musa." Kubw’iwe, igikenewe ni uko izi nyandiko nyeranda birangira zitiriwe amadini. Moraes yibaza ko ari ibintu vyumvikana ko ibitabo vyeranda vyanditswe, nk’akarero, inyuma y’ishingwa ry’igihugu ca Israel gusumba ibihe bivugwamwo, nk’ibijanye n’ihunga ry’Abayahudi bava mu Misiri, barongowe na Musa. Ati: "Iyumvire igico c’abantu bayerera mu bugaragwa. Ivyo kwicara ngo bandike si vyo bibaraza ishinga. Ikiraje ishinga uwuriko arayerera mu bugaragwa ni ukurondera ingene abaho. Mu myaka itari mike, vyabaye ngombwa ko bategura intambara kugira ngo baronke ubutaka…nta n’umwe yari anezwe ivyo kwandika ibitabo." Uyu mushakashatsi ati: "Ikintu kinini gishoboka, ni uko ibi vyagiye kuba hashinzwe umuryango wiyubatse neza." Ariko zari inkuru zidakomeye cane, z’ubwoko butandukanye, vyarangiye zegeranijwe zigashirwa  hamwe n’umwanditsi umwe canke benshi. Umuhinga mu nyandiko nyeranda, Thiago Maerki akaba n’umushakashatsi kw’ishure kaminuza rya São Paulo (Unifesp), akaba kandi ari mw’ishirahamwe Hagiography Society, muri Amerika, arashima cane iciyumviro co gukoresha ubumenyi bwa none mu vy’indimi mu kugerageza gushira hamwe canke gutandukanya inyandiko zigize Bibiliya. Kubw’iwe, abanditsi nk’umwigisha wa kaminuza Robert Alter, umunyamerika yigisha kw’ishure kaminuza ya California, "babivuga neza ", nk’igihe avuga ko ari vyiza "gukoresha uburyo bumwe bumwe bukoreshwa mu kwiga ibijanye n’ivya kahise k’indimi n’inyandiko mu kwiga inyandiko za Bibiliya". Maerki ati: "Arihweza ubuhinga bw’inyandiko, impinyanyuro z’amajambo yakoreshejwe, ubudasa mu gushikiriza ivyiyumviro, imyumvikano ikurikizwa mu bwoko bumwe bumwe bw’inyandiko ya Bibiliya, na buri mwanditsi. "Igihe cose kugira ngo ntihabe kuzana ivyataye igihe." Indinganizo y’amayagwa nayo nyene ishobora kwisungwa mu mwihwezo w’ibitabo bine vy’injili, ibitabo bivuga ubuzima bwa Yezu, bikaba vyitirirwa Matayo, Mariko, Luka na Yohani. Umushakashatsi kuri kahise k’idini rya Gikristu kw’ishure kaminuza Université pontificale grégorienne i Rome akongera akaba n’umuhinga ku bijanye na Vaticano Mirticeli Medeiros, arabishingira intahe ko, ata gukekeranya, abanditse ibi bitabo bine ari abo bagabo bane. Asigura ati : "Ku vy’Injili, nta mpari zihari [kuba zitirirwa], n’imiburiburi ufatiye ku bushakashatsi bwa vuba. Aha ni ukwibuka ko babiri mu banditsi bazo, Matayo na Yohani, bari abatumwa ba Yezu/Yesu. Aba bandi babiri, Mariko na Luka, ku ruhande rwabo, bateguye inyandiko zabo bisunze ivyo abatumwa bashingiye intahe." Maerki arasangamwo ubudasa mu mpinyanyuro z’amajambo muri ibi bitabo bine. Asigura ati : "Matayo afatwa nk’umwanditsi adakoresha impinyanyuro itaziguye, akoresha impinyanyuro isanzwe. Yohani akoresha ururimi rugoye, rwuzuye imizunguruko, imvugo ngereranyo. Luka akoresha imvugo inonosoye, ihanitse." Nimba mw’isezerano rya kera hari ibibazo vyinshi gusumba ibizwi ku bijanye n’abitirirwa ibitabo, inyandiko zo mw’isezerano rishasha, n’aho ari iza vuba kandi n’abazitirirwa bavugwa hafi muri zose, naho nyene harimwo ibibazo. Birazwi ko bimwe muri vyo vyatanguye kwandikwa imyaka 30 canke 40 inyuma y’urupfu rwa Yezu. Moraes avuga ko "bishoboka cane ko aya mazina yose [y’aba banditsi b’Injili bane] yaje biciye mu mico n’imigenzo." Ashimangira ati : "Nta zina ry’umuntu yitirirwa ibi bitabo vya kera cane." Igisa n’uko ata mpari gitera ni uko iya mbere muri izi njili ari iya Mariko. Ati: "Mu gihe hari igisekuru, igisekuru cakurikiranye ubuzima bwa Yezu gushika apfe, ni ngombwa ko kigumana inyandiko ku vyabaye. Rero nico gitangura ubwoko bushasha bw’impinyanyuro y’amajambo, ari yo Njili." Mu gushira hamwe imico n’imigenzo hamwe n’ivyahanahanwa ku munwa, uyu mwanditsi w’injili arandika neza ivy’ubuzima bwa Yezu. Ariko ahagarara cane ku gice yashaka guhagararako ico gihe: aha ni ukuvuga ko ata kigoro agira ko kuvuga ku vyerekeye ivuka canke ubwana bwa Yezu, ahagarara cane cane ku gikorwa ciwe, ku rupfu rwiwe, ku butumwa bwiwe bwa Pasika. None uyu Mariko yari umuntu ki ? Umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana (théologien) arerekana ko yari umwigishwa w’intumwa Petero. Ati: "Ariko abandi bazokubwira ko yari umwigishwa wa Paulo. Ivyo ari vyo vyose, ico tuzi ni uko atari umwigishwa wa Yezu." Injili ya Yohani nayo nyene irimwo amakenga. Ahari amakenga ni aho avuga  «umwigishwa yakundwa cane», aha amayagwa akerekana ko yari Yohani. Moraes ati : "Ariko hariho abahinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana babona ahubwo ko yashobora kuba ari Lazaro, kuko mu njili harimwo umurongo [mu gice kivuga urupfu rwa Lazaro] uvuga ko Yezu yarize,  ‘hanyuma raba ingene yamukunda." Mu kinjana ca 20 ni ho abakristu batanguye kmwemeza ko Yohani ari we yanditse iyi Njili. "Amayagwa yabigize uko nyene, tubandanya tumwita Yohani. Ariko ntivyoroshe kumenya uwayanditse, ishobora mbere kuba yanditswe n’umurwi wa benshi." Kubw’uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana, ni vyiza ko tugumana iciyumviro c’uko ari « Injili zanditswe na» ugaca ushirako izina rimwe rimwe muri ayo, hakubafata nk’abanditsi b’ibitabo nk’uko bafatwa mu gihe ca none. Ariko nimba ikibazo ari Isezerano rishasha, ni ukwerekana uruhaha rwa Paulo, intumwa yandikiye amabaruwa menshi imiryango ya mbere ya gikristu. Medeiros avuga ati : "Amabaruwa ya Paulo, nk’uko iri zina ribivuga, [yanditswe] na Paulo hamwe n’abigishwa biwe. Nk’akarorero, ibaruwa ryandikiwe Timoteyo, rishobora kuba ryanditswe na Paulo, rero abahinga bamwe baryita Deutéro-Paulin". "Hagati aho, hari impari ku vyerekeye amabaruwa yitirirwa Petero, kandi ashobora kuba atanditswe na we nyene ubwiwe. Co kimwe kandi n’irya Paulo yandikiye abahebreyi, rishobora cane kuba ryagiye kurangizwa n’umwe mu bigishwa biwe ». Paulo yumvikana ko ari we yatanguye kwandika kuri Yezu, kuva mu mwaka wa 57 canke 58. Moraes  avuga ati : "Ikibazo nyamukuru ni ukumenya nimba yari azi ko yariko yandika inyandiko nyeranda. Ashobora kuba atari abizi." "Hari uburyo yakoresha mu kuvugana n’amasengero hanyuma agasiga amakete. Amwe muri yo yaratakaye, amwe muyo twita ko ari amabaruwa yiwe yanditswe kumbure n’abigishwa biwe, ariko ashirwa mu murwi w’ayanditswe na Paulo." Uyu muhinga mu vyigwa bijanye no kwemera Imana avuga ati: "Iyo tuvuga amabaruwa ya Petero, kumbure yanditswe n’abamwegereye, kuko Petero ntiyari azi kwandika, kandi arabitomora mw’ibaruwa ryiwe [rya mbere].  Yakoresha umwanditsi mu kwandika. Kumbure afise kuba yabwira icegera ciwe, yitwa Silvano, ivyo yandika."

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa kane 01/08/201: Dybala, Pepe, Coutinho, Rugani, Koscielny, Sane
column3: Manchester United  irabandanya yihweza ingene yoronka umunya Argentine Paulo Dybala, w'imyaka 25, yitezwe gushika muri iyi ndwi mu murwi Juventus asanzwe akinamwo kugira avugane nawo kuri kazoza kiwe. (Manchester Evening News) Dybala yabwiye Manchester ko itegerezwa kumuha umushahara ungana n'ibihumbi 350 vy'ama pawundi mu gihe yoba imwipfuza.  (Mail) Umukuru w'umurwi Lille wo mu Bufaransa, Gerard Lopez, aremeza ko umukinyi wa Côte d'Ivoire Nicolas Pépé w'imyaka 24 azogurishwa muri Arsenal ku miliyoni 80 z'ama euro (angana na pawundi 73). (RMC Sport - in French) Umurwi Napoli  uriteguye gutanga imiliyoni 60 z'amapawundi  ku mukinyi wa Côte d'Ivoire Wilfried Zaha asanzwe akina muri Crystal Palace, inyuma y'aho vyankiye ko uronka umukinyi Pepe. (Mail) Umurwi Barcelona uripfuza kugurisha umukinyi wo hagati w'umunya Brezili, Philippe Coutinho w'imyaka 27, ariko ingorane ukaba utarabona umurwi umurondera. (ESPN) Everton iriko ikora hasi hejuru kugira ngo ironke umukinyi w'umunya Côte d'Ivoire, Jean-Phillipe Gbamin w'imyaka 23, asanzwe akina mu murwi Mainz. (Liverpool Echo) Arsenal  iriko irarondera ko yotizwa mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri umukinyi w'inyuma w'umutaliyano Daniele Rugani w'imyaka 25 asanzwe akina mu murwi Juventus. (Gazzetta dello Sport, via Sun) Kizigenza w'umurwi Arsenal, umufaransa Laurent Koscielny w'imyaka 33, aracahagaze ku cipfuzo ciwe co kugenda n'aho hari ibiganiro hagati yiwe n'uyo murwi.  (Independent) Arsenal iriteguye muri rino ci kugurisha umukinyi w'inyuma, umudagi Shkodran Mustafi w'imyaka 27, ariko umurwi Roma umurondera ukaba utaramusaba.  (Romanews, via Star) Uwujejwe ukwinonora imitsi mu murwi Bayern Munich usanzwe ufise igikombe c'Ubudagi, Hasan Salihamidzic, avuga ko Manchester City ikwiye gusabwa imbabazi inyuma y'aho umumenyereza Niko Kovac atangarije ko uyo murwi wari witguye kugura umukinyi Leroy Sane, umudagi w'imyaka 23. (Sport Bild - in German) Ubu rero uwo murwi wanditse umenyesha ko wipfuza kugura Sane, ukaba mbere wanamushikirije urwandiko rumwereka ibijanye n'ivyo Bayern yipfuza kuri uyo mukinyi. (Bild+) Umurwi Zenit St Petersburg witeze gutangaza ko waguze umukinyi wo kuruhande wa, Barcelona, umunya Brezili Malcolm w'imyaka 22, inyuma y'aho  iyo mirwi yompi yumvikanye  ku kiguzi cimiliyoni hafi 36,5 y'amapawundi. (Goal) Manchester United iriteguye guhangana na Barcelona muri rino ci mu kurondera umukinyi w'imbere w'umufaransa Isaac Lihadji w'imyaka 17. (La Provence, via Mail) Manchester United yashitse ku masezerano y'ugushobora kugura umukinyi wo hagati muri Monaco, umufaransa Hannibal Mejbri w'imyaka 16, ku giciro c'imiliyoni icenda z'amapawundi. (Mail) Everton ni umwe mu mirwi isanzwe iriko irondera ko yotizwa umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, Fikayo Tomori w'imyaka 2. (Evening Standard) Marco Verratti  asanzwe akinana na Neymar mu murwi Paris St-Germain avuga ko uyo murwi ukwiye kugurisha uyo mukinyi mugenziwe w'umunya Brezili w'imyaka 27 mu gihe vyoboneka ko atipfuza kubandanya awukinira, n'aho umumenyereza wawo Thomas Tuchel yipfuza ko Neymar aguma muri uwo murwi. (Express) Uwahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Barcelona, Carles Puyol w'imyaka 41, avuga ko umurwi Real Madrid wamurondeye incuro zibiri zose ariko akanka. (AS in Spanish) Umumenyereza w'umurwi Rangers, Steven Gerrard, aremeza ko utwigoro tw'ukurondera umukinyi wo ku ruhande wa Liverpool Ryan Kent w'imyaka 22 ataco twashitseko kandi ko udafise ubushobozi bwo gushobora kumugura burundu. (Daily Record) Biragaragara ko umukinyi Danny Drinkwater yiteguye kuguma muri Chelsea mw'ihiganwa ryimirije mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 29 atararonka umurwi umwipfuza. (Evening Standard)

column2: Qatar World Cup 2022: Paris mu bindi bisagara bitazerekana inkino
column3: I﻿gisagara ca Paris kibaye ica vuba mu Bufaransa kimenyesheje ko kitazoshira imboneshakure nini abafana borabirako umupira mu gihe himirije inkino z'isi zizobera mu gihugu ca Qatar. I﻿co gisagara kivuga ko bitewe n'imvo z'agateka ka zina muntu hamwe n'ibidukikije mu gihugu kizakira iryo higanwa. I﻿bisagara vya Lille, Marseille, Bordeaux, Strasbourg na Reims  na vyo biramaze kumenyesha ko bitazerekana izo nkino bifatiye kuri izo mpamvu nyene. P﻿ierre Rabadan ajejwe igisata ca Sport mu gisagara ca Paris, avuga ko no kuba izo nkino zateguwe kuba mu gihe c'ubukonje na vyo vyatumye hafatwa iyo ngingo. I﻿vyo vyatanguye ku musi wa gatandatu aho umukuru w'igisagara ca Lille wo mu mugambwe w'aba socialiste, Martine Aubry, avugiye ko inkino z'igikombe c'isi muri Qatar "ata gaciro zifise uravye agateka ka zina muntu, ibidukikije na Sport". C﻿o kimwe n'abandi bakuru b'ibisagara, ariyamiriza uko uburenganzira bw'abakozi bwubahirizwa muri Qatar; ibivugwa ko hari igitigiri kinini c'abapfuye  mu bakozi b'abanyamahanga; hamwe n'ingaruka y'ibibuga vyubatswe ku bidukikije, vyose bifise ubuhinga bwo gutanga akayaga hanze yavyo. I﻿ Marseille, harabaye imigambi yo gushiraho imboneshakure nini mu gihe Ubufaransa bwoshika mu rukino rwa nyuma, ariko ubu ivyo bikaba vyahagaritswe. U﻿mukuru w'ico gisagara w'umu socialiste, Benoit Payan, yavuze ko iryo higanwa "ryagiye rihinduka buhoro buhoro iryo gusinzikaza agateka ka muntu no kutubahiriza ibidukikije, ibitajanye n'inyifato twari twiteze muri Sport - na cane cane mu mupira w'amaguru - dukwiye guteza imbere". N﻿tibiramenyekana igitigiri c'ibisagara vyo mu Bufaransa biriko birategura ikibanza aho abakunzi b'umupira bashobora gukurikiranira umugwi w'Ubufaransa, ufise igikombe c'inkino zabereye mu Burusiya mu 2018.

column2: Burundi: Abarongoye Islam bavuga ko ata ngorane ihari hagari ya Islam na reta
column3: Abakuru b'idini rya Islam bavuga ko biyamiriza amajambo yashikirijwe na Ndikumana Rashid, umusilamu aherutse kwifatira mu gahanga umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, iterambere rusangi n'umutekano. Mw'itangazo ryasohowe n'ihuriro ry'imisigiti riri kumwe n'ihuriro ry'aba-Imam mu Burundi, bamenyesha ko ivyo Ndikumana yavuze yabivuze ku gatwe kiwe bitega aya mahuriro canke "umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi". Ndikumana arapfunzwe inyuma y'uko yumvikanye ahamagarira umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati n'umutekano, Ndirakobuca Gervais, gusaba ikigongwe, hari mu musigiti wa Madina uri muri zone Buterere mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. Umwe mu bakuru b'idini rya Islam mu Burundi yabwiye BBC ko gushika ubu nta kibabuza gusenga uko bamye basenga na mbere. Abakuriye Islam mu Burundi mw'itangazo ryabo, bamenyesha abanywanyi babo ko "ata matati ari hagati y'umuryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi" na reta y'igihugu. Zuberi Mohamed, Umukuru w'inama ya bose mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi, yabwiye BBC ko bakira nk'abandi bose ivyashikirijwe na Ndirakobuca, kuko "vyaraba bose ntivyaraba aba Islam gusa". Avuga ko ivyo yavuze bitababuza gusenga uko bahora basenga. Ati: "Nta tegeko na rimwe rirasohoka ritubuza gusenga canke ritubuza guhamagarira abantu kuja gusenga. "Twebwe dufata y'uko yariko ashikiriza amakenga yoba afise canke uko abona ibintu". Zuberi avuga ko iyo habaye ingorane hagati ya reta no mu muryango w'aba Islam mu Burundi "hariho inzira bicamwo kugira ngo tuvugane, nk'uko biri mu yandi madini". Abajijwe niba ivyasabwe n'umushikiranganji Ndirakobuca bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano, Rashidi abona ko ata ngorane bishobora gutera. Ati: "Abatovyi mu mpande zose ntibabuze, ariko twebwe turazi ko aba Islam bahagaze neza, kandi ko ata ngorane zihava ziva muri ivyo gushika kuri uno munota nta kibazo kihari hagati ya reta n'aba Islam mu Burundi".

column2: Abanganga bateye ifyigo ry'ingurube ku muntu umubiri wiwe ntiwaryanka
column3: Abanganga babaga muri Amerika bavuga ko bashoboye guha ifyigo ry'ingurube umuntu mu gikorwa gikomeye co gutera umuntu ingingo zikomotse ahandi bizigiye ko kizofasha gutorera inyishu ubukene bw'ingingo zikekenewe na benshi. Uwo yatewe iryo fyigo ubwonko bwiwe bwari bwamaze gupfa, bisigura ko bifashisha imashini zo kugumiza ibice bimwe kubandanya ari bizima ariko ata mahirwe y'uko umuntu wese yari gusubira kuba muzima. Iryo fyigo ryavuye mu ngurube yahinduriwe bimwe muri kamere kayo (génétiquement modifié/genetically modified) kugira babuze ko "rimenyekana nk'irinyamahanga" hanyuma ngo umubiri uryanke. Ico gikorwa ntikirihwezwa n'abandi baganga canke ngo gisohoke ku mugaragaro ariko bitegekanijwe ko ivyo bikorwa. Abahinga bavuga ko ariryo gerageza rya mbere riteye imbere cane muri ico gisata gushika ubu. Ibipimo nk'ivyo vyari bimaze gukorwa ku bikoko bitari abantu, ariko gushika ubu nta muntu yari bwageragerezweko. Ariko gukoresha  ingingo zivuye ku ngurube si icuyumviro gishasha. Uduce tw'umutima twitwa valves dusanzwe dukoreshwa cane ku bantu. Kandi ingingo z'ingurube zirahura neza cane n'izo abantu ku vyerekeye ubunini. Ico gikorwa co kubaga camaze amasaha abiri n'inusu mu kigo c'ubuvuzi ca kaminuza ya New York University Langone. Abo baganga bafatanije iryo fyigo ry'ingurube n'inzira z'amaraso z'uwo muntu yari yamaze gupfa ubwonko kugira barabe ko ryokora hamwe boritera umuntu canke ko umubiri woryanka. Ku minsi ibiri n'igice ikurikira baciye bakurikiranira hafi iryo fyigo, basuzuma cane banakora ibipimo vyinshi. Umushakashatsi yari arongoye abandi Dr Robert Montgomery yabwiye BBC ati: "Twabonye ifyigo ahanini ryakoze nk'ifyigo ryatewe rivuye mu wundi muntu, ivyo vyagaragaye nk'ibihuye co kimwe n'uko vyagenze no ku bindi vyose vyokorwa n'ifyigo ry'umuntu risanzwe. "Ryarakoze uko bisanzwe, kandi ntavyabonetse ko umubiri waryanka". Abo baganga babaga bateye kandi agace k'iyindi ngingo y'ingurube yitwa glande thymus hamwe n'iryo fyigo. Bibaza ko iyo ngingo ishobora gufasha guhagarika ko umubiri w'umuntu amaherezo wokwanka iryo fyigo mu gukukumba uturemangingo two kwigwanira twoba twagiye ku ruhande ubundi  dushobora kurwanya iyo ngingo ivuye ku ngurube. Umuntu nawe asanzwe yaratewe uwundi mutima, Dr Montgomery avuga ko hakenewe vyihuta ko haboneka uburyo bwo kurondera ingingo zo guha abantu bari ku rutonde rwo kurindira kuzironka, n'ubwo yemera ko igikorwa ciwe kidahurizwako. "Ic'uko nk'uko vyamye kuva kera hari uwubanza gupfa kugira uwundi muntu abeho ntikizokwigera gitanga inyishu ikwiye. "Nta nkeka ko numva impungenge, kandi ico novuga ni uko gushika ubu 40% abantu barindiriye guterwa ingingo bapfa batarazironka. "Ingurube turazirya, turakoresha ingurube mu buvuzi - ku duce tw'umutima bita valve, ku miti. Nibaza ko no kuri ivyo bidatandukanye cane." Yavuze ko ubushakashatsi bukiri mu ntango ko rero hakenewe gukorwa ibindi vyigwa vyinshi, ariko yongerako ati: "Biduha, uko ndavyibaza, icizere ko ata kibazo mu minsi tubijanye  mu bitaro". Umuryango w'uwo yagiriweko ibipimo, yari asanzwe yarifuje ko yotanga ingingo, waratanze uruhusha rw'uko abo baganga bakora ico gikorwa. Urwego rwa Amerika rugenzura bene ivyo bikorwa FDA narwo rwaremeye ko hakoreshwa ingingo y'ingurube yahinduriwe kamere  mu  bushakashatsi nk'ubwo. Dr Montgomery yizeye ko mu myaka cumi,  izindi ngingo z'ingurube - imitima, amahaha n'ibitigu (imyijima) - bishobora kuzohabwa abantu bakeneye  guterwa ingingo. Dr Maryam Khosravi, umuganga w'amafyigo no gukurikirana abantu bategerezwa kwitabwo cane mu bitaro (intensive care) akorera urwego ruvuza abantru mu Bwongereza, NHS, avuga ati: "Gutera abantu ingingo z'ibikoko n'ibintu tumaze imyaka myinshi twiga, kandi ni vyiza kubona abo bantu bateye iyindi ntambwe imbere muri iyo nzira." Ariko ku karangumutima k'ibirekurwa n'umwugwa gukorwa avuga ati: " Kuba twobishobora ntibisigura ko dutegerezwa kubikora. Nibaza ko umuryango w'abakora muri ico gisata ariwo utegerezwa kwishura ivyo bibazo." Umuvugizi w'igisata c'amaraso n'ugutera ingingo zivuye ahandi, avuga ko gutanga ingingo zivuye ku bandi bantu arivyo bishirwa imbere gushika ubu. "Haracari inzira ndende imbere y'uko ingingo bene izo zija mu buzima bwa minsi yose. "Mu gihe abashakashatsi n'abavura tubandanya dukora ibishoboka vyose kugira twongereze amahirwe y'abarwayi bakeneye kuronka ingingo, turacakeneye ko umwe umwe wese mu batanga ingingo afata icemezo co kubikora hanyuma akamenyesha umuryango wiwe ico yifuza ko coba hamwe ibihe vyo gutanga ingingo vyoshoboka."

column2: Guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi n'ica Afrika vyahinduwe amatariki
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru muri Afrika (Caf) ryahinduye amatariki y'inkino zo muri Afrika zo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi mu 2022 hamwe n'igikombe ca Afrika co mu 2021. Ibi bikurikiye ingingo y'ejo kuwa gatatu yo kwimurira mu kwezi kwa mbere n'ukwa kabiri ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika co mu 2021 muri Kameruni, ryobaye mu kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi. Inkino zo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Afrika zotanguye mu kwezi kw'umunani, ariko zimuriwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu. Guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi 2022 vyimuriwe mu kwezi kwa cumi kugira bijane n'ivyo bindi vyahinduwe. Ingunga zibiri z'inkino zo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe ca Afrika zizoba mu kwezi kwa gatatu, ingunga imwe ishirwe mu kwa gatandatu imbere y'uko haba inkino za nyuma zo kuva itariki 31 z'ukwa munani gushika itariki 8 z'ukwa cenda. Amakipe 24 azoja mu gikombe ca Afrika niyamara kumenyekana, guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi bizoca bitangura mu kwezi kwa cumi - iyindi ngunga ibe mu kwezi gukurikira. Umwe mu bamenyereza batashimishijwe n'ayo mahinduka ni umumenyereza wa Gambiya, Tom Saintfiet. Yabwiye BBC Sport ati: "Ntivyari bikenewe guhindagura kuko biduteje ibibazo vyinshi mu gihe twari tumaze gutunganya inkino za kivukanyi kandi twaragiranye amasezerano n'abazitunganya. "Twari twateguye kugerageza abakinyi bamwe mu kwezi kwa gatatu n'ukwa gatandatu kuko nshaka kwubaka ikipe, ariko ubu ivyo ntibigishoboka imbere y'urukino na Gabon (rwo guhiganirwa igikombe ca Afrika 2021)." Gutomboza imigwi igize amakipe yo guhiganirwa kuja mu gikombe c'isi 2022 vyashizwe kw'itariki 21 z'ukwa mbere. Ku wa gatatu hafashwe ingingo y'uko igikombe ca Afrika kizotangura itariki 9 z'ukwa mbere kubera ikibazo c'ikirere muri Kameruni mu kwezi kwa gatandatu n'ukw'indwi, igihe hashobora kuba hari imvura nyinshi. Gusubiza iryo higanwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika mu kwezi kwa mbere bizoca bituma ridahurirana n'ihiganwa ry'igikombe c'isi c'amakipe, rizobera mu Bushinwa mu kwa gatandatu 2021.

column2: Sudan y'Epfo:''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju''
column3: Umu Karidinari ari mu kiruhuko c'izabukuru muri Ekleziya Katorika yaneguye ubushobozi bwa bamwe mu ndongozi za Ekleziya muri Sudan y'Epfo. Kardinari   Gabriel Zubeir Wako yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Khartoum yavuze ati: ''Sinshaka abapatiri b'ibijuju mw'isengero'', aho hari mu rugendo yagize mu gisagara ca Wau kiri mu buraruko bushira uburengero. Yavuze kuri uyu wa mungu ati: ''Mu minsi maze ngaha i Wau, hariho abapatiri twabonanye ndumva ko benshi batazi indinganizo n'inyigisho zo mw'isengero,  bigisha ibintu bidafashe. Bakeneye gusumvya aho bageza ubu ". Uwo mu karidinari azokwiza imyaka 80 y'amavuko mu kwezi kuza, , arubashwe kandi arazwi cane mu kuba yarashigikiye amashure. Yaratewe iteka na reta ya Sudan y'Epfo mu 2016 kubera uruhara rwiwe mu gushigikira indero y'abana bangana na miriyoni zibiri bari barateshejwe izabo n'intanbara muri Sudan y'Epfo. Yaranarungitse abapitiri kubandanya ivyigwa i Roma no muri Kenya , kugira bace impamyabushobozi za masters na doctorat. Mu bo yarungitse kubandanya ivyigwa harimwo uwamusubuiriye Musenyeri Mukuru Dr Michael Didi, ubu arongoye diyosezi ya Khartoum , n'uwurongoye diyosezi nkuru ya Juba, Dr Stephen Ameyu.

column2: Russia: habonetse abantu ba mbere banduye umugera H5N8 w’akamangu k’inkoko
column3: Uburusiya bumenyesha ko abantu ba mbere banduye umugera wa H5N8 utera indwara y'akamangu (ibicurane) k'inkoko. Abategetsi bavuga ko abantu indwi bakora mw'iyororero ry'inkoko riri mu bumanuko bw'ico gihugu banduye uwu mugera wadutse mu kwa cumi na kabiri kw'umwaka uheze. "Aba bantu bose indwi …bameze neza", ibi bikavugwa n'umuganga akaba n'umuhanuzi mu vyo amagara y'abantu mu Burusiya, Anna Popova. Avuga ko haciye hafatwa ingingo zikenewe kugira ngo ntihagire abandi bantu bandura. Umupfasoni Popova avuga ko ata kintu na kimwe cerekana ko iyo ndwara yashobora kwinjira mu bantu, akavuga ko bamaze kubimenyesha mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO. Arashimira laboratoire Vektor yo muri ico gihugu yashoboye gutora uwo mugera muri abo bakozi. Popova ati: "Kubona uwu mugera watowe hakiri kare utarashobora kugira ububasha bwo kuva mu muntu uja mu wundi, biduha, twese kw'isi yose, akaryo ko kwitegura neza kugira ngo dushobore guhangana nawo". Avuga ko abahinga b'Uburusiya ubu baca batangura kwiga ingene bashobora gupima abantu. Hari ubundi bwoko bw'ibicurane vy'inkoko bwandukira abantu rimwe na rimwe mbere abapfa bagapfa - ariko ubu nibwo bwa mbere uwu mugera wa H5N8 wasimvye ukinjira mu kiremwa muntu.

column2: Bob Marley: Kwibuka imyaka 40 iheze iyo mboneza ipfuye
column3: Imyaka 40 iraheze kuva umuririmvyi wa reggae yasize izina Bob Marley yishwe na cancer i Miami, ku myaka 36, hari ku wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatanu mu 1981. Uwo munyamuziki n'umwe mu bakundwa kandi bemewe cane muri kahise k'umuziki, ku ndirimbo nyinshi zabiciye bigacika nka No Woman No Cry, One Love, na Redemption Song. Indirimbo yiwe Buffalo Soldier niyo yabaye rurangiranwa kurusha izindi mu Bwongereza, aho yagiye mu kibanza ca kane mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 1983. Album [urukurikirane rw'indirimbo] yo mu 1977 Exodus yiswe Album y'Ikinjana n'ikinyamakuru Time Magazine. Marley yavutse mu 1945, kuri se w'umuzungu na nyina w'umwirabure, muri Jamaica. Nk'umwana yakuriye mu bukene kandi nta migenderanire myinshi bari bafitaniye na se, uwo akaba yari asanzwe ari umusirikare wo mu mazi yakorera reta y'Ubwongereza. Yavuye iwabo ku myaka 14 aja gutangura umwuga w'umuziki i Kingston. Mu  1972, Marley yashitse mu Bwongereza n'umugwi wiwe The Wailers kuremesha ibiteramo na Johnny Nash mu ntumbero yo kugerageza kumenyekana ku rubuga mpuzamakungu. Mu mwaka ukurikira, The Wailers basohoye album yabo Catch a Fire baca bakora igiteramo cabo ca mbere kuri television kuri BBC. Ico giteramo cagize ingaruka nini cane gica kibazanira abakunzi benshi ku bo bari basanganywe. Inyuma y'urundi rugendo rw'ibiteramo mu 1975, yafashe amajwi ikibiriraho indirimbo No Woman No Cry kuri The Lyceum, i Londres, ica isohoka yonyene (single) ibera Bob Marley indirimbo yiwe mbere yagiye ku rutonde rw'izikundwa cane mu Bwongereza. Uwo muririmvyi yaciye aja mu murongo w'abaririmvyi bakomeye kw'isi aca aba izina rizwi mu aho uciye hose. Marley yari azwi ku kwemera kwiwe gushingiye kuri  Rastafarism, hamwe n'umugore wiwe, Rita, idini rikaba ryaragaragara mu ndirimbo ziwe. Uwo muririmvyi yarakunda kandi cane umupira w'amaguru, vyari bizwi ko acishamwo akaja gukina iyo afashe akaruhuko mu gihe co gutegura indirimbo (muri studio) canke imbere yo kuremesha igiteramo. Mu kiganiro mu 1980 yavuze ati: "Nkunda umuziki imbere yo gukunda umupira." "Gukina umupira w'amaguru no kuririmba n'ibintu bibangamye kuko umupira urimwo kubabazanya. Ndirimba amahoro, urukundo n'ibindi nk'ivyo, urabona uriko urakina ntawuzi igishobora gushika, "Umuntu aguteze akakubabaza umenga ibaye intambara." Igiteramo c'ikibiriraho ca nyuma ca Bob Marley mu Bwongereza cabaye itariki 13 ukwezi kw'indwi mu 1980 muri New Bingley Hall, Stafford. Marley yaciye apfa mu mwaka ukurikira ahitanywe n'indwara ya melanone acral-lentigineux yari yatowe mu 1977. Yashinguwe aho yavukiye muri Jamaica mu kigwati ca Nine Mile. Amafoto yose n'aya nyeneyo.

column2: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ku rutonde rwa Forbes
column3: Umunyarwandakazi Isabelle Kamariza ari ku rutonde rw'ikinyamakuru co muri Amerika, gitanga udushimwe, Forbes. Ni urutonde rw'abagore 8 ba mbere muri Afrika, baranzwe n'ibikorwa bihindura ubuzima bw'abandi cane cane abari mu bibazo bakeneye gufashwa. Isabelle Kamariza yashimwe kubera ikigo ciwe 'SolidAfrica', kigemurira abarwayi badashobora kwifungurira mu bitaro bine mu Rwanda. Yavuganye na Florentine Kwizera, atangura amubaza uko yakiriye ako gashimwe (umviriza aho hejuru).

column2: Iron Biby: umunya Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw’isi mu guterura ikibuye kiremereye yakiriwe nk’intwari
column3: Kuri uyu wa mbere, umunonotsi wa Burkina Faso yanditse amateka kw'isi yose mw'ihiganwa ryo guterura ibibuye biremereye ku wa gatandatu yakiriwe nk'intwari ku kibuga c'indege ca Ouagadougou, nk'uko iradiyo y'abafaransa RFI ibitangaza. Sheick Ahmed al-Hassan Sanou - azwi kw'izina rya Iron Biby - yiremetse ikibuye  gipima ibiro 229 (229Kg) yikoreye ku mutwe mu rukino rwa nyuma wa Giants Live World Tour Final muri Ecosse/Scotland, akaba yarushije uw'imbere y'aho yari yiremetse icapima 228kg. N'akamwemwe kenshi, Iron Biby igikombe ciwe yagituye Burkina Faso, akaba asubirwamwo na RFI avuga ko intsinzi yiwe itanga ubutumwa bw'umwizero. Ati: "Ni ikintu gikomeye kuri jewe, kubera namye ngerageza kwandika aya mateka kuva mu 2018". RFI isubiramwo amajambo asa n'aya nyene y'umushikiranganji w'inkino Dominique Nana. "Ibendera rya Burkina Faso ryatsinze."

column2: Germany: uyu musi ni amatora yo kurangiza imyaka 16 y’ubutegetsi bwa Angela Merkel
column3: Ubutegetsi bwari bumaze imyaka 16 yose bugiye kurangira mu Budagi. Abadagi bari mu matora y'inama nshingamateka mu rugamba rutoroshe rwo kurondera umusubirizi w'umushikiranganji wa mbere yari amaze igihe kinini ku butegetsi. Kuri uyu wa Mungu, igenekerezo rya 26 z'ukw'icenda, Abadagi bari mu matora arangiza ubutegetsi bwa reta yari irongowe na Angela Merkel. Amatora yatanguye isaha zibiri z'igitondo (8:00) bikaba vyitezwe ko arangira isaha icumi na zibiri z'umugoroba (18:00). Hari vyinshi biteye inkeke ku vyerekeye ibizova mu matora,  ariko ikizwi coco ni kimwe: uwuzotsinda amatora uwo ari we wese, ni ngombwa ko ashinga reta ihuriwemwo na bose. Vyitezwe ko imigambwe ishika itatu ari yo ishobora kuronka ibibanza bikwiye mu nama nshingamateka y'Ubudagi, izwi nka Bundestag, ari nayo ishobora kuzotora umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha (chancelier/chancellor). Dutahuzanye mu majambo make kandi aciriye hagufi ingene amatora agenda mu Budagi n'ingene bigenda gushika hashingwe reta nshasha. Abadagi baja mu matora kugira ngo batore abashingamateka mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, Bundestag. N'aho kuri uyu musi buri muntu yitaba ku biro vy'itora kugira ngo atange ijwi ryiwe, itora hakoreshejwe amabahasha riza ryaramaze gutangura. Abadagi bashika imiriyoni 60.4 bakwije imyaka 18 ni bo bashobora gutora. Bundestag igizwe n'imiburiburi n'abashingamateka 598, ariko akenshi bararenga. N'aho mw'ijoro ry'uyu musi umugambwe uzotahukana intsinzi uza kumenyekana, gushinga reta nshasha bizofata umwanya utari muto kuko bisaba ko umugambwe watsinze amatora uzobanza kurondera iyindi migambwe igiranira urunani na wo kugira ngo ushobore kugira ubwiganze mu nama nshingamateka. Ibi bizotuma habanza guca igihe kitari gito kugira ngo izina ry'umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha azosubirira Angela Merkel rimenyekane. Mu bisanzwe, umugambwe ufise intebe nyinshi mu yigize urunani ni wo ugena umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko gushinga urunani birafata umwanya kuko imigambwe yose irugize itegerezwa kubanza kwumvikana igashika ku masezerano y'ingene abashikiranganji bazogenwa. Bamaze kwumvikana ku bintu vyose, niho rero abagize inama nshingamateka baca bakorana kugira ngo bemeze umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha. Iyo Abadagi bagiye mu matora, batora ibintu bibiri. Ica mbere, batora umushingamateka w'akarere. Hari uburere bw'amatora (circonscriptions électorales/ electoral districts) bushika ku  299 ; ibi bivuga ko umushingamateka umwe aserukira hafi abantu 250.000. Umukandida yaronse amajwi menshi ni we atsindira intebe mu nama nshingamateka. Aya yitwa "amatora ya mbere". Mu matora agira kabiri, azwi nk' "amatora ya kabiri", abatora batora intonde z'imigambwe muri buri reta. Rero ibi bibanza 299 bisigaye bigenda bigabaganywa bivanye n'amajwi muri mugambwe wagiye uronka. Rero umukandida ari ku rutonde aronka ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka hakurikijwe urutonde rwatanzwe n'umugambwe wiwe. Uku rero niko Bundestag ishingwa. Kugira ngo umugambwe uronke ikibanza mu nama nshingamateka utegerezwa kuronka n'imiburiburi amajwi 5% mu matora agira kabiri. Ibi vyateguwe uku kugira ngo imigambwe mito mito, akenshi usanga igendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze ntije mu yigize ubutegetsi. Rero, ufatiye ku kungene amatora ateguwe mu Budagi, inama nshingamateka ishingiye ahanini ku vyavuye mu matora agira kabiri. Kuri ivyo rero, amatora agira niyo yerekana ibibanza buri mugambwe ushobora kugira muri Bundestag hamwe n'amahirwe ushobora kugira muri reta. Iki ni igice kitoroshe gutahura. Igitigiri c'intebe mu nama nshingamateka kirashobora kwiyongera iyo hari ubusumbane hagati y'ivyavuye mu matora ku mugambwe umwe umwe muri ano matora abiri. Aha rero, aho kugirwa n'abashingamateka 598, ishobora kugirwa n'abashingamateka 709. Inama nshingamateka ya kino gihe yari igizwe n'abashingamateka 730. Dufatire ku karorero k'ibishobora gushika mu mugambwe kanaka: Nk'akarorero, umugambwe CDU uronse intebe 110 mu matora ya mbere yo mu burere, hanyuma ugaca uronka intebe 100 mu matora agira kabiri y'intonde z'imigambwe. Muri iki gihe, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 irengeje ku zo yategerezwa kuronka, ufatiye ku matora agira kabiri, ari yo akomeye cane. Rimwe na rimwe, abatora barashobora gushima umukandida, ari na we atorwa mu ya mbre, ariko ugasanga ntibashimye umugambwe wiwe ntibawutore mu matora agira kabiri. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, vyumvikana ko CDU izogumana izi ntebe 10 zirenzeko, zizwi nka Überhangmandate, canke "intebe z'inyongera". Kuri ivyo, CDU izosanga ifise intebe 10 zirenze ku zo yategerezwa kugira nk'umugambwe, bikayiha akarusho gasa n'uko umengo irenganije iyindi. Rero kugira no ntihabe nkunzi, iyindi migambwe ica ironswa icitwa Ausgleichsmandate, canke "intebe z'indishi y'akababaro". Ibi bica bituma ibitigiri vy'abashingamateka bava mu yindi migambwe vyiyongera bivanye n'amajwi baronse. Dufatiye kuri aka karorero, ibibanza bitegerezwa kwiyongera ku rugero rwa 10% vy'ivyavuye mu matora kugira ngo bakosore ubu busumbane. Abatsinze n'abatsinzwe baza kumenyekana inyuma y'amasaha make ibiro vy'amatora vyugaye. Ni nako vyagenze mu matora y'inama nshingamateka aheruka mu 2017, igihe Angela Merkel ashikiriza ijambo ritaryoshe yerekana ko umugambwe wiwe waronse amajwi make. Ariko gushinga reta bishobora kurangwamwo impari nyinshi bigatuma ibiganiro bifata indwi zitari nke kugira ngo bashike ku masezerano. Ni nako vyagenze mu 2017, igihe umugambwe CDU, umugambwe L'Alliance 90/Les Verts ukunze kwitwa The Greens,  hamwe n'uumgambwe FDP inaniriwe no gushinga urunani.

column2: Russia igiye gukura ingabo zayo hafi ya Ukraine
column3: Inyuma y'indwi zitari nke zaranzwe n'uruhagarara rwatewe n'ingingo y'Uburusiya yo kurungika ingabo ku rubibe iki gihugu gihana na Ukraine, umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi w'Uburusiya Sergei Shoigu yategetse ingabo zitari nke gusubira ku birindiro vyazo. Umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vy'Uburayi uvuga ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zirenga 100.000 ari zo zari zegeranirijwe ku rubibe no mu karere ka Crimée/Crimea kigarurirwe n'Uburusiya mu 2014. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ari muri Crimea, umushikiranganji Shoigu yavuze ko ingabo ziri mu myimenyerezo muri ako karere zigiye gusubira ku birindiro vyazo. Yongeyeko ko ico bashaka bagishitseko. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky - mu ntango yari yatumyeko Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya kugira babonanire mu karere karimwo imishamirano - yakirije yompi iyi ngingo yo "kugabanya" icuka kibi kirangwa ku rubibe. Umushikiranganji w'ukwivuna abansi w'Uburusiya avuga ati: "Ingabo zarerekanye ubushobozi nyabwo zifise bwo gukingira igihugu". Avuga kandi ko yategetse abarongoye imirwi y' ingabo zirwaniha hasi hamwe n'iyindi y'ingabo zirwanira mu kirere gutangura gusubira ku birindiro kuva kuri uyu wa gatanu gushika ku wa gatandatu w'indwi iza, hazoba ari igenekerezo rya 01 z'ukwa gatanu. Mu ndwi iheze, Perezida Zelensky yari yashikirije iki kibazo abategetsi ba Buraya. Umukuru w'ingabo za Ukraine yavuze ko ingabo z'Uburusiya zariko zigana mu turere twa Rostov, Bryansk na Voronezh hamwe no muri Crimea, mu gihe izindi nazo zari zegeranirijwe ku rubibe. Inyuma y'ivyatangajwe na Shoigu, ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vyo mu burengero ry'ukwivunira umwansi hamwe, OTAN/NATO ryavuze ko ingingo iyo ari yo yose yohagarika uruhagarara izoba ari "kirumara kandi nkenerwa". Rivuga kandi ko ingabo z'iri shirahamwe ryo mu burengero zibandanya zirikanuye. Abategetsi bahurikiye muri OTAN basaba ikoraniro mu kwa gatandatu aho ikibazo c'Uburusiya kizoba muri bikuru bikuru vyo kwihweza. N'aho Uburusiya buhakana ko uku kwegeranya ingabo yari imyiteguro yo kwishura ku bikorwa "biteye amakenga" vya OTAN, amakuru avuga ko buriko butegura  kuzibira uturere turi hafi y'Ikiyaba Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) kugira ntihagire ubwato mvamakungu buzosubira kwinjira muri iki kiyaga. Ukraine ifise ubwoba ko ibivuko vyayo bishobora kuhagirira ingorane. Uburusiya bwamye buvuga ko ata bindi vyinyegeje inyuma uretse ko ari imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare. Ariko Moscou yari izi neza ko uku kwegeraniriza ingabo hafi ya Ukraine no mu karere ka Crimea kigaruriwe n'Uburusiya vyateye ubwoba abantu benshi: Muri Ukraine, i Buraya no muri America. Iyi ni yo ngorane. Moscou yoba yakoresheje ibi bikorwa vyo kwegeranya izi ngabo kugira ngo ihe ubutumwa Kyiv (umugwa mukuru wa Ukraine), Bruxelles (umugwa mukuru w'Ububirigi kandi icicaro c'umuryango w'ibihugu vya Buraya), hamwe kandi na Washington  cane cane , ko Uburusiya ari igihugu gikomeye gitegerezwa kwitwararikwa. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika yarumvise aka kamo. Mu ndwi iheze, yahamagaye kuri telefone Perezida Putin amusaba ko bohura bakaganira. Hanyuma kandi yaciye afatira Uburusiya ibihano bikomeye cane "ku bikorwa vyabwo bibi", ariko hagati mu gihugu, Abarusiya babona ko ari ibihano bisanzwe. Ariko kandi, n'aho uruhagarara rwogabanuka, si ukuvuga ko rurangiye. Umushikiranganni w'Uburusiya ajejwe kwivuna abansi aratomora neza ko "Uburusiya bufata ingingo kugira buhangane n'ibikorwa biteye amakenga vya OTAN". Akarorero, Moscou itegekanya kuzibira uturere two ku kiyaga Cirabura (Mer Noire/Black Sea) mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu kugira ibuze ubwato mvamakungu kwinjira muri iki kiyaga. Mw'ijambo yashikirije igihugu ku wa gatatu, Perezida Putin yaragasbishije ibihugu vyo mu burengero ko bitohirahira ngo "birenge umurongo utukura". Avugana n'abanyamakuru inyuma y'aho ingabo zitegetswe gusubira ku birindiro vyazo, Perezida Putin yavuze ati: "Ku bijanye n'imigenderanire hagati y'ibi bihugu vyompi, turiteguye kwakira umukuru w'igihugu ca Ukraine umwanya uwo ari wo wose umworohereza, ariko i Moscou". Hagati aho, ashimangira ko, nimba Perezida Zelensky ashaka kuganira ku kibazo c'ubuseruko bwa Ukraine, ategerezwa kubanza kuvugana n'abategetsi bo muri ako karere. Intambara mu buseruko bwa Ukraine yadutse mu 2014, inyuma y'aho Crimea yonkorewe kuri Ukraine. Inyeshamba zishigikiwe n'Uburusiya zarigaruriye uturere tutari duto tw'intara za Luhansk na Donetsk. Mu ndwi nkeya ziheze, harabaye ihonyangwa ry'amasezerano y'uguhagarika intambara. Ibibombe vyatewe ku wa kane vyarakomerekeje cane umusirikare wa Ukraine, mu co ingabo za Ukraine zivuga ko ari uguhonyanga aya masezerano kwakozwe n'ibigirankana. Kuva iyi ntambara yaduka, abantu bagera kuri 14.000 baramaze kuhasiga ubuzima.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru i Bulaya 06/08/2019: Zaha, Eriksen, Rooney, Pogba, Koscielny
column3: Everton yegeranije imiliyoni 100 z'amapawundi kugira ngo ishobore kugura umukinyi Wilfried Zaha w'imyaka 26 asanzwe akinira Crystal Palace, ishizeko abakinyi Cenk Tosun, umunya Turukiya akina imbere, be na James McCarthy, umunya Ireland akina hagati, bompi bafise imyaka 28. (Sun) Uyo mukinyi mpuzamakungu Zaha wa Côte d'Ivoire yitezwe muri Everton mu mpera z'ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi, Palace ikaba yitezwe kwemera kumutanga  ku miliyoni 65 z'amapawundi.  (Independent) Juventus iriko itegura gutanga abakinyi batatu ikabaguza n'umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester United Paul Pogba w'imyaka 26 asanzwe anakinira n'umurwi w'Ubufaransa. (Mirror) Manchester United iri hafi yo gushika ku masezerano n'umukinyi Christian Eriksen wa Tottenham akomoka muri Danemark, inyuma y'aho umunya Portugali Bruno Fernandes w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akina muri Sporting Lisbon - uwundi yariko aronderwa na Man United - amenyeshereje ko yipfuza kwinjira muri Tottenham. (AS) Tottenham iriko yitegurira ko imirwi y'i Bulaya itanga ibiciro vyo hasi ku mukinyi wo hagati Eriksen mu gihe uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 27 atoshobora kugurishwa imbere yo ku munsi wa kane aho ikiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi muri Premier League kizoba kirangiye.  (Telegraph) Burnley iriko irondera umukinyi yahoze akina muri Man United kandi yabaye na kizigenza w'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza Wayne Rooney asanzwe akina muri DC United muri Amerika. Uyo mukinyi w'imbere w'imyaka 33 aherutse kugiriranira ibiganiro na Derby County imurondera nk'umukinyi n'umumenyereza. (Burnley Express) Leicester City ntizoshobora kugura umukinyi w'inyuma Nathan Aké w'imyaka 24 muri kino kiringo c'igura n'igurishwa ry'abakinyi, mu gihe Bournemouth imushakako igiciro c'imiliyoni 75 z'amapawundi. (Sky Sports) Arsenal yagerageje kwumvikana na kizigenza wayo Laurent Koscielny, ariko uyo mukinyi w'inyuma w'imyaka 33 yanse kujana na Arsenal mu nkino z'imyiteguro, yaranse ibiganiro. (Mirror) Arsenal  ishobora kuronderera muri RB Leipzig  ku mukinyi w'inyuma w'Umufaransa Dayot Upamecano w'imyaka 20, mu kibanza c'umukinyi wa Juventus Daniele Rugani - ariko intambamyi ikaba ari igiciro c'imiliyoni 50 z'amapawundi imuronderako.  (Mirror) Wolves imaze gutanga igiciro c'imiliyoni 30 z'amapawundi isaba uyo mukinyi w'umutaliyano Rugani. (Times) Norwich City  iripfuza umukinyi w'Umwongereza Danny Drinkwater w'imyaka 29 asanzwe akinira Chelsea, aboneka nk'umuzigo i Stamford Bridge. (Mail) Bournemouth  iri hafi gushika ku masezerano n'umurwi Liverpool, kugira ngo ushobore kuyitiza umukinyi wo ku ruhande Harry Wilson w'imyaka 22 akomoka muri Pays des Galles. (Mail) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Tottenham Jan Vertonghen w'imyaka 32 akomoka mu Bubiligi, ashimangira ko yishimiye kuguma muri uyo murwi w'i Londres, mu gihe asigaje umwaka umwe gusa ngo amasezerano afitaniye nawo arangire. (Goal.com) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Manchester City, Fernandinho w'imyaka 34 akomoka muri Brezili, aremeza ko ashobora kuzokinishwa ku ruhande rw'inyuma mu nkino zimwe zimwe, inyuma y'aho haziye umukinyi Rodri w'imyaka 23 akomoka muri Espanye avuye muri Atletico Madrid. (Manchester Evening News)

column2: Lady Gaga n'umufana bituye hasi bavuye hejuru ku butambiro i Las Vegas, batanguza imitwe
column3: Lady Gaga yaraguye atanguza umutwe amaguru aja hejuru agwa mu barorerezi mu giteramo giheruka mu muji wa Las Vegas. Uwo 'musani' yari yahamagaye umufana wiwe azwi nka Jack ngo aze ku butambiro, aca asimbira mu maboko yiwe - ariko uwo mufana abura intege bose baca batembera hasi. Umwe mu bariko bararorera igiteramo yanditse agira ati "n'ukuri twari tuzi yuko apfuye". Ahubwo Gaga yaciye agaruka ku butambiro aririmba indirimbo Million Reasons na Jack amuri impande. Yagize ati "Birahimbaye. Turakundana cane ku buryo twaguye twese tuva ku butambiro." "Twagwanye mu maboko. Turi nka Jack na Rose bo muri Titanic. "Ndibaza ko tuza gusangira icayi nyuma y'aha." Abafana bari bagize ubwoba bibaza ko Gaga yababaye kuko asanzwe afise uburwayi buzwi nka fibromyalgia, uburwayi amaranye igihe butuma ababara umubiri wose. Ubwo burwayi bushobora kandi gutuma ababa birengeje, akaruha, inyama z'umubiri zikagumirwa, kwibuka bikamugora kandi akabura itiro. Mu 2013, yahagaritse ibiteramo vy'urukurikirane Born This Way amaze kuvunika ikiyunguyungu. Ariko uwo muririmvyi kugwa kw'ejo kuwa kane ntaco kwamutwaye, ahumuriza abarorerezi hamwe n'abajejwe umutekano bamufashije guhaguruka. Kanda ngaha urabe ingene Lady Gaga n'umufana baguye Yagize ati: "Vyose ni sawa. Ikintu kimwe kitagenda ni uko dukeneye ingazi kuri ubu butambiro kugira nsubire hejuru." Uwo 'musani' yanahojeje Jack, yari yarenzwe n'umwosori kubera ivyari bihejeje kuba. Gaga yagize ati: "Ntugire ingorane, vyose ni sawa. Si ikosa ryawe. Urashobora kunyemerera ikintu? Urashobora kwibabarira ubu nyene kubera ibihejeje gushika?" Nyuma muri ico giteramo, Gaga yarerekanye yuko ukwo kugwa ata na kimwe kwamutwaye aca akora ikarasisi rikomeye ariko araririmba indirimbo yiwe ikunzwe, Bad Romance.

column2: Burundi: BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu ico gihugu
column3: Radiyo BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, nk'uko bihejeje gutangazwa n'urwego rw'Uburundi rujejwe gucungera ibimenyeshamakuru, Conseil National de la Communication (CNC). Uwurongoye urwego CNC, Madame Vestine  Nahimana, yabimenyesheje mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru inyuma y'inama y'abagize urwo rwego. BBC yari imaze neza na neza imyaka itatu yafatiwe ingingo yo guhagarikwa mu Burundi. Ingingo yari yafashwe itariki 29 ukwezi kwa gatatu mu 2019. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko mu rwego CNC baronse ikete rya BBC isaba gusubira gukorera mu Burundi  baca basanga "nta kindi gisigaye atari ukuyakira kugira ngo isubire gushira ahabona ibiganiro vyayo". CNC yari yatse BBC uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi iyagiriza kurenga amategeko agenga umwuga  wo kumenyesha amakuru muri ico gihugu  hamwe n'inyafato itajanye n'umwuga. Nta biganiro yari irekuriwe gushikiriza mu Burundi, nta n'umunyamakuru yari yemerewe kuyikorera canke kuyiha inkuru mu buryo ubwaribwo bwose muri ico gihugu kuva ico gihe. BBC yari yatswe uruhusha rwo gukorera mu Burundi yagirizwa  gutosekaza izina rya reta yari irongowe ico gihe na prezida Pierre Nkurunziza. Na cane cane inyanduruko yavuye ku matohoza ku vyavugwa ko ari ibibanza abantu bapfungirwamwo mu kinyegero  kandi bakaborezwamwo igufa mu ntumbero yo gucecekesha abatavuga rumwe na reta, ivyo reta yiyamirije nk'"inkuru z'ibinyoma". Ico gihe BBC yumvirizwa n'abantu bangana na miriyoni 1.3 mu Burundi. Hemerewe ibinyamakuru bishasha vyinshi Ibinyamakuru bitari bike birimwo n'Ijwi rya Amerika (VOA),  Iwacu, radiyo Bonesha FM, Ikiriho n'ibindi vyarafatiwe ibihano mu bihe n'imvo bitandukanye vy'inyuma y'intureka za poritike zo mu 2015. Ivyo bihano vyari vyiyamirijwe n'amashirahamwe haranira uburenganzira bwa zina muntu nka Amnesty International yavuze ko vyari ingingo "zeruye z'abategetsi b'Uburundi mu gucecekesha ibimenyeshamakuru". Kuva presida Evariste Ndaishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi inyuma y'amatora yo mu 2020,  imwe mu ntumbero yashize imbere n'ukunagura imigendeneranire myiza n'ibihugu canke amashirahamwe atarabana ryiza na reta y'Uburundi kuva mu 2015. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ishirahamwe rya  Buraya biherutse gufuta ingingo z'ibihano  vyari vyarafatiye Uburundi. Bimwe bimwe nka Iwacu, Ikiriho na Bonesha FM  haheze igihe vyarahawe uruhusha rwo gusubira gukora. Madame Nahimana yavuze ko CNC yumviye akamo k'umukuru w'igihugu yasavye urwo rwego kuvugana n'ibinyamakuru vyari vyarafatiwe ibihano kugirango bisubire guhabwa impusha zo gukora. Muri iyo nama yemereye BBC gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, CNC yemereye kandi ama radiyo n'ama television mashasha: Dosiye y'iyindi radiyo, Radio Voix de Developpement Communautaire de Bubanza yasubijwe inyuma  kugira ije guhinyanyura ivyo  CNC yayisavye. Atangaza ko BBC yemerewe gusubira gukorera mu Burundi, umukuru wa CNC yagize ati:  "Twizeye ko tugiye kubandanya dukorana n'iyo radiyo mu ntumbero yo kubandanya twubahiriza umwuga w'abamenyeshamakuru n'ibimenyeshamakuru."

column2: Africa – Covid-19: Menya ibihugu bimaze gutangura gutanga incanco
column3: U Rwanda, Kenya na Nigeria vyatanguje ku munsi umwe ku wa gatanu  isekeza ryo gutanga incanco za Covid zavuye muri Covax, umugambi wa ONU wo gusabikanya neza kw'isi inanco zo gukinga indwara ya Covid-19. Kenya n'u Rwanda  bibaye ibihugu vya mbere vyo mw'ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Africa y'Ubuseruko (EAC) bitanguje iryo sekeza. Mu Rwanda gukingira Covid-19 vyatanguye ku mugaragaro mu bitaro bitandukanye haciye umunsi umwe incanco za mbere zishitse mu gihugu. Abakingiwe bemeje inyandiko ko atawe bazokurikirana ku ngaruka urukingo rushobora kubagirako. U Rwanda rwaronse ku wa gatatu incanco zirenga ibihumbi 300 za AstraZeneca na Pfizer zitanzwe muri uwo mugambi wa Covax. Hari n'izindi ncanco 50.000 rwaronse zitanzwe n'Ubuhindi. Intego y'ico gihugu n'ugukingira 30% by'abanyagihugu uyu mwaka na 60% gushika mu 2022. Muri  Kenya, umutegetsi wo mu bushikiranganji bw'amagara, Patrick Amoth, ni we yabaye uwa mbere mu guterwa urwo rucanco. Ku wa gatatu niho Kenya yaronka incanco zirenga gato umuriyoni za AstraZeneca zakozwe n'ikigo co mu Buhindi, Serum Institute of India, nazo nyene zitanzwe n'umugambi Covax. Co kimwe n'u Rwanda na Kenya, Nigeria nayo yatanguje isekeza ryo gucanca ku wa gatanu. Muri ivyo bihugu uko ari bitatu, abakozi bo kwa muganga bari mu baza imbere mu kubanza kuronswa urucanco. Ghana na Côte d'Ivoire navyo nyene vyatanguye gutanga incanco muri iyi ndwi. Ikindi gihugu ca EAC kimaze kuronka incanco ni Uganda. Ku wa gatanu Uganda niho yakira incanco za  mbere zirenga ibihumbi 860 nazo zivuye muri uwo mugabmbi wa Covax. Ibindi bihugu bitatu vya EAC, Uburundi, Tanzania na Sudan y'Epfo, gahunda zavyo zo kuronka incanco no gutangura kuzitanga ntiziramenyekana. Abategetsi ba Tanzania bo basanzwe baramenyesheje ko ata mugambi w'incanco bihutira. Ibindi bihugu bimaze kuronka incanco muri uwo muganbi mpuzanakungu ni  Angola, DR Congo na Gambia. Afrika y'Epfo  yo yatanguye gutanga incanco haraheze indwi zibiri, ni naco gihugu cabaye ica mbere mu gukoresha urucanco rwa Johnson & Johnson. Izashitse ubwa mbere zari ibihumbi 80 ariko ngo izitezwe zishika umuriyoni. Urwa AstraZeneca ico gihugu cari  cabanje kuronka cararetse kurukoresha kuko rwoba rudakinga neza ubwoko bushasha bwa coronavirus bwatowe ubwa mbere aho muri Africa y'Epfo. Afrika y'Epfo, igihugu ca mbere kirimwo abanduye corona benshi kuruta ibindi muri Afrika, yizigiye kuronka incanco zikwiye 10 kw'ijana y'abanyagihugu baco biciye mu mugambi Covax, kikaba cahawe isango ryo kuzironka hagati y'ukwezi kwa kane n'ukwa gatandatu. Senegal nayo nyene imaze  hafi indwi zibiri itanguye gutanga incanco za Sinopharm yahawe n'igihugu c'Ubushinwa. Yiteze kuronka kandi izirenga umuriyoni zitanzwe mu mugambi wa Covax.

column2: Kenya: Umupasitori yishe umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero
column3: Umupasitori wo muri Kenya yatangaje abakirisu igihe yacumita umugore wiwe nawe aca ariyica bari gusenga ejo ku wa Mungu, mu rusengero bafatanije gushinga mu gisagara ca Mombasa. Abakirisu bari muri urwo rusengero babwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko Elisha Misiko yari yicaye mu kibanza c'imbere, igihe umugore wiwe nawe, Ann Mghoi, yari kuri arutari ariko arasigura. Niho umugabo wiwe Misiko yamusangayo n'imbugita yari yanyegeje mw'ishati yari yambaye amucumita mu mugongo. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bapfa uburongozi bw'urwo rusengero rwitwa 3 G (Grounds for God's Gospel). Umwe mu bakirisu basengera muri urwo rusengero ati: "Twebwe twibaza ko cari ikintu yari agiye kumubwira, kumbe yari agiye kumucumita imbugita". Uwundi ati: "Uyu mugabo yari yarubakanye n'uyu mupfasoni arongoye uru rusengero, ariko bari barahukanye. Yari amaze kumutera ubwoba incuro nyinshi, kandi yari yanavuze ko azokora ivyo yakoze uno munsi". Ahejeje kumucumitaniho  nawe yaca yicumita mu nda, agerageza no kwikata izosi, mu gihe abakirisu bari bagiye gutabara. Uyo mugabo yaciye apfa ubwo nyene, mu gihe umugore wiwe yagiye gupfira mu bitaro. Uyo mugabo n'umugore bari baratandukanye bapfuye uburongozi bw'urusengero, aho umwe wese yashaka kuba ari we mukuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikinyamakuru Daily Nation. Rwari rusigaye ruyobowe n'umugore, ivyo Pasitori Misiko, umugabo wiwe, atashaka kwumva.
