column2: Boeing na Airbus zigabisha US ku ngorane zishobora guterwa na 5G
column3: Abakuru b'ikompanyi zibiri za mbere rutura mu gukora indege basavye reta ya Amerika gutevya gutangura gukoresha ubuhinga bushasha bw'ama terefone bwa 5G. Mw'ikete, abategetsi ba Boeing na Airbus bagabisha ko ubwo buhinga bushobora kugira "ingaruka mbi ku bikorwa vy'indege." Amakenga yari amaze gushikirizwa ko ubuhinga bwa 5G bushobora guhungabanya ivyuma vy'ubuhinga bwa electronic vyo mu ndege. Ibihangange vya telecoms (ubuhinga bwo gutumatumanako)  muri Amerika AT&T na Verizon  vyitezwe gutanguza ikoreshwa rya 5G itariki 5 za Nzero (ukwezi kwa  mbere). Abakuru ba Boeing na Airbus Dave Calhoun na Jeffrey Knittel, mw'ikete barungikiye hamwe uwujejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu muri reta ya Amerika Pete Buttigieg, bamubwiye bati: "Uguhungabanya kwa 5G gushobora kugira ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bw'indege bwo gukora mu mutekano". Iryo kete ryishingiye ku bushakashatsi bwakozwe n'umugwi w'ubucuruzi Airlines for Amerika rwatoye ko iyo amategeko y'urwego rwa Amerika rujejwe indege (FAA)  aba yagiye mu ngiro mu 2019, hafi ingendo 345.000 z'indege z'ingenzi  na 5.400 zitwara imizigo ziba zaracerewe, zarahinduriwe inzira canke zitabaye zikiba. Igisata c'indege n'urwego rwa Amerika rw'indege (FAA) barashikirije amakenga ko 5G ishobora guhungabanya ivyuma  vyo mu ndege nk'amaradiyo y'ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere. Itangazo rya Airbus rivuga ko "Airbus na Boeing bakoranye n'abandi bafise uruhara mu gisata c'indege muri Amerika kugira batahure ihungabana rishobora guterwa na 5G ku vyuma bifata ibipimo vy'aho indege igeze mu kirere (altmeters)". "Iinteguro y'ingene ingorane zishoboka zoba nke cane ku ndege yarashikirijwe igisata ca Amerika kijejwe gutwara abantu n'ibintu kugira yigwe." Uku kwezi, urwego FAA rwaragabishije ko uguhungabanya ibindi vyuma guturutse kuri 5G gushobora gutuma indege zihushishwa inzira, ruvuga ko ruzotanga amakuru menshi imbere y'uko ubwo buhinga butangura gukoreshwa itariki 5 Nzero. Muri Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11), kompanyi za AT&T na Verizon  zarasibije gutanguza urudandazwa rwa 5G ikiringo c'ukwexzi gushika itariki 5 Nzero zica zifata ingingo zo kwiyubara zo kugabanya ko haba ihungabanya. Amakompanyi yo mu gisata c'indege avuga ko izo ngingo zidahagije, Boeing na Airbus zikavuga ko zaciye zitanga integuro yazo yo kugabanya imishwarara iturutse ku bikoresho vyo gutumatumanako imbere no mu micungararo y'ibibuga vy'indege no mu bindi bibanza nkoramutima. Ku ndwi iheze, umukuru wa United Airlines Scott Kirby yavuze ko ingingo za FAA zerekeye 5G zizobuza ikoreshwa z'ibipimo z'aho indege igeze mu kirere ku bibuga bishika 40 mu vya mbere binini muri Amerika. Kompanyi ya Amerika y'ubuhinga budaciye mu ntsinga CTIA ivuga ko 5G ata ngorane n'imwe iteye akagiriza igisata c'indege gutera ubwoba no kwerekana ukutariko uko ibintu  bimeze. Umukuru wa CTIA  Meredith Attwell Baker yavuze mu kwezi guheze ati: "Kuducereza bizogira ingaruka mbi ikomeye. Kurindira uwundi mwaka bizotuma habura miriyaridi 500 z'amadorari mw'izamuka ry'ubutunzi, mu gihe igihugu cacu kiriko kirivyukiranya  congera ciyubaka inyuma y'ingaruka za Covid".

column2: Covid-19: Amerika ihanura kwirinda kuja muri 80% vy'ibihugu
column3: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe imigenderanire muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bugiye guha inama Abanyamerika yo kwirinda 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi kubera ikiza ca coronavírus. Mu rwandiko rugenewe ibimenyeshamakuru ku mpanuro zijanye n'igihe ku vyerekeye ingendo hanze, ubwo bushikiranganji bwavuze ko ico kiza gikomeje ''gutera ingeramizi zitari bwigere zibaho ku bantu bafata ingendo". Gushika ubu impanuro yo kwirinda ibihugu bimwe bimwe  yari yerekeye ibihugu 34 ku bihugu 200. Covid-19 ubu imaze kwica abantu barenga miriyoni 3 kw'isi - abarenga ica kabiri c'umuriyoni muri abo bakaba ari abo muri Amerika. Ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi (OMS) ryagabishije ko isi iriko ''iregereza urugero rwa mbere runini rwo kwandura" gushika ubu, n'ubwo hatangujwe umugambi w'isi wo gutanga incanco. Ubuhindi - muri iki gihe bwugarijwe n'umurindi ugira kabiri - bugiye gutangura gutanga urucanco ku bantu bose barenza imyaka 18 mu ntumbero yo guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'ibitigiri vy'abandura. Ubushikiranganji bwa Amerika bujejwe imigenderanire buvuga ko ingingo yo gusubiramwo iyo nama yabwo ari ukugira bujane n'iyigirwa n'ibigo vyo kurwanya no kugenzura indwara (CDC) ''bitavuze ko ari  ugusubiramwo kuraba ingene ibintu vyifashe mu bijanye n'amagara y'abantu  mu gihugu kanaka". Ariko, buvuga ko iyi ngingo "izotuma hiyongera ibihugu biri ku rugero rwa 4 (Level4): Do Not Travel (ntimufate ingendo),  kuri hafi 80% vy'ibihugu vyo kw'isi". Ibibanza bitatu vyonyene kw'isi ni vyo bifatwa nk'ibiri hasi cane y'ibindi ku ngero zine z'ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire - "Mwiyubare bisanzwe". Ni Macau, Taiwan na Nouvelle Zelande. Na ho na Antarctic iri ku rugero rwa kabiri -Mwiyubare cane" - mu gihe Ubwongereza buri ku rugero rwa gatatu- "Subiramwo umugambi wanyu w'urugendo" - hakongerako kwongereza kwiyubara kubera igishobora gushika bivuye kw'iterabwoba. CDC zigira inama abanyamerika kwirinda kugira ingendo hagati mu gihugu gushika bahejeje kuronka incanco zose, zikanagabisha ko ingendo mpuzamakungu zongereza ukugeramirwa no ku baba baracandazwe. N'ubwo hari  incanco miriyoni 860 za coronavirus zimaze guterwa mu bihugu 165 kw'isi, ibihugu vyinshi biracahanzwe no gushobora guhagarika  ukwiyongera kw'abandura uwo mugera. Brezil imaze gufata ikibanza ca gatatu ku bantu benshi banduye, na ho ku bantu 368.749, ikaza ubugira kabiri ku bantu benshi bamaze gupfa. Canada na yo  muri iyi misi yaragize iyongerekana ry'abandura, na yo Papouasie Nouvelle Guinee ikaba igihugu giteye impungenge. Mu gihe ibihugu -  nk'Ubwongereza  na Israel- bimaze guha incanco abanyagihugu bavyo benshi, ibindi bihugu vyinshi biracarindiriye incanco vyatumyeko ko zishika. Ivyo bituma haba ukugabisha  kw'iyongerekana ry'ubusumbasumbane mu kwicandagisha - incanco zidasabikanywa neza hagati y'ibihugu bitunze n'ibikenye.

column2: Red Flo Bio ya John Chris yamuronkeje ikidari c'inzahabu k'inzoga iryoshe cane ya 2021
column3: Mw'ihiganwa ry'inzoga nziza riba buri mwaka ritegurwa n'ikigo Monde Selection, muri iyi ndwi inzoga yengwa n'umurundi John Chris Kavakure yatahukanye ikidari c'inzahabu c'inzoga ya mbere iryoshe cane muri uyu mwaka. Iyo nzoga yitwa Red Flo Bio yahiganishijwe n'ubundi bwoko bw'inzoga 3,100 zivuye mu bihugu 90 vyo mu mihingo itandukanye y'isi muri iri higanwa ryaba ku ncuro ya 60. Inzoga ziza muri iryo higanwa ziba zifise urugero rwo gukara rwa 7.5 Ihiganwa Monde Selection ni iry'ikompanyi yitwa International Quality Institute yo mu Bubiligi, ivuga ko ifise uburambe mu kuraba no kumva neza ibikorwa bifise akanovera kandi vyiza mu guteka, kwenga, amagara, eka n'ubwiza bw'imico kw'isi. John Chris Kavakure umubiligi kandi w'umurundi ashima ico kidari ngo kuko cerekanye ko abanye Afrika muri rusangi n'abarundi vy'umwihariko bashoboye. Yagize ati:"Kuba ndonse ico kidari ndi umurundi, avuka mu Bwiza, biha inguvu urundi rwaruka ko mu bikorwa bakora, ko ejo hashobora kuboneka umu John Chris mu burimyi, mu gushona, mu kworora." Kavakure amaze gukora ubwoko burenga 20 bw'inzoga mw'ihinguriro ryiwe rya Les Brasseries de Flobecq riri mu Bubiligi, akaba ashobora gukora ama 'hectolitres' 30.000 ku mwaka. John Chris avuga ko umwuga wo kwenga inzoga yawukundishijwe na nakuru wiwe. Ati:"Nyokuru ni we yatumye nkunda kwenga inzoga kuko namubona ariko arenga impeke ngaca nkurikirana ingene abigenza n'ivyo ashiramwo." Ivyo vyatumye agira ishaka ryo kwiga ubuhinga bwo kugana inzoga ziryoshe muri kaminuza aho yaronkeye impapuro z'imitsindo. Avuga ko umwambiro akoresha kugira inzoga iryohe ari ibanga ryiwe, ariko ko hariho iyo akura muri Afrika. John Chris ntakora inzoga gusa, aranubaka amahinguriro y'inzoga, aho hirya no hino kw'isi amaze gufasha kwubaka ayashika umunani harimwo n'ihinguriro ry'inzoga rigira kabiri mu Burundi riri mu ntara ya Ngozi muburaruko ryitwa Burundi Brewery rikora inzoga zitwa Soma Burundi. Ibindi bihugu birimwo amahinguriro yubatse ni nko muri Amerika, Ubuhinde, Ubudagi, Ubutaliyano no mu Bubiligi aho asanzwe aba nk'uko abivuga. Ikindi kidari c'inzahabu yaheruka kukironka mu 2018 ku nzoga yahinguye yitwa Flo58.

column2: Ukraine: ikivuko ca Odesa catewe amabombe inyuma y’amasaha make habaye amasezerano
column3: Ibibombe vyanyiganyije ikivuko gikomeye ca Ukraine inyuma y’umusi umwe gusa Kyiv na Moscou bashitse ku masezerano yotumye intete za Ukraine zisubira gushorwa hanze. Ibisasu bibiri vya misire vyatewe mu gisagara ca Odesa gifise ikivuko mu masaha yo mu gaturuturu ko kuri uno wa gatandatu, nk’uko igisirikare ca Ukraine kibimenyesha. Nk’uko biri muri ano masezerano yaraye ashitsweko, Uburusiya bwemeye kudatera ibivuko bizoba bifise intete ziriko zishorwa hanze. Ishirahamwe ONU  rivuga ko ano masezerano ari “ikimenyetso c’umwizero” inyuma y’intambara imaze amezi. Mu butumwa bwacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ibiro vya gisirikare mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine bivuga ko ibisasu bibiri vya misire zo mu bwoko bwa Kalibr vyaguye kuri iki kivuko, mu gihe ibindi bibiri navyo vyakorowe n’igisata kirwanira mu kirere. Oleksiy Honcharenko, umushingamateka w’akarere, yanditse kuri Telegram ko iki gitero catumye haduka umuriro mu kivuko c’iki gisagara. "Iyi mihimbiri itera igikumu ku masezerano n’ukuboko kumwe mu gihe ukundi nako gutera misire”, niko Honcharenko yanditse. "Nico gituma dukeneye indege kugira ngo dusenyure amato y’intambara yose y’Uburusiya ari mu Nyanja yirabura. Iyi ni yo nzira yonyene yo gushobora gushora hanze intete”. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba hari abapfuye n’abakomeretse, canke nimba hari ibintu vyononekaye. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Kyiv na Moscou barateye igikumu ku masezerano yotumye imiriyoni n’imiriyoni z’amatoni y’intete zugaraniwe muri Ukraine zishobora gushorwa hanze. Nk’uko bivugwa n’abaserukizi b’ibihugu, bimwe mu vyo bemeranije ni uko Uburusiya budatera ibivuko mu gihe bizoba biriko birasohora ibidandazwa hanyuma Ukraine nayo ikaba yemeye guherekeza imizigo mu mazi yuzuye ama mines. Aya masezerano – akaba yafashe amezi abiri kugira ashikweko – yiteze kubandanya mu kiringo c’imisi 120, akazoba ahagarariwe kandi akurikiranirwa hagufi n’ibiro bizoshingwa i Istanbul muri Turukiya, bikazoreramwo abategetsi ba ONU, Turukiya, Ukraine n’ab’Uburusiya. Arashobora kwongerezwa ikiringo mu gihe impande zompi zovyumvikanako. Andriy Yermak, umukuru w’ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu Volodymyr Zelensky, ariyamiriza iki gitero akagiriza Uburusiya ko “bubandanya buteza ikibazo c’imfungurwa”. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bwa Ukraine bujejwe imigenderanire, Oleh Nikolenko yongeyeko ati: "Iyi misire y’Uburusiya ni amate Vladimir Putin aciriye ku munyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe ONU, António Guterres no kuri Perezida Recep Erdogan wa Turukiya, bitanze uko bashoboye kwose habe aya masezerano, mbere Ukraine ikaba ibashimira cane”. Iki gitero kibaye mu gihe abategetsi bo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza bavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya mu ntara ya Kherson zishobora kubura ingene zironswa ivya nkenerwa kubera amayira ashobora gukatwa n’ingabo za Ukraine. Kyiv yaratanguje igitero gikomeye co kwivuna mu bumanuko bw’igihugu, kandi ingabo zayo zarakoresheje inkoho zirasa kure ibisasu vya misire zatanzwe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika  mu gutera ikiraro ca Antonovsky i Kherson. Mu gihe iki kiraro cobomorwa, Uburusiya ntibwokworoherwa gushikira ingabo zabwo.

column2: Britney Spears yagiriza nyina "gutabagaza ubuzima bwiwe"mu kubushira mu minwe y'uwundi muntu
column3: Britney Spears avuga ko nyina ariwe yatumye ubuzima bw'uwo muririmvyi buja mu minwe y'uwundi muntu mu kiringo c'imyaka 13. Jamie, se w'ico camamare, niwe yamaze iyo myaka yose ariwe ajejwe mu mategeko ibijanye n'ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, bisigura ko ico gihe cose yari afise ijambo rito  cane ku biraba ubuzima bwiwe bwite n'amafaranga yiwe. Ariko ku vyo yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro, uwo muririmvyi avuga ko ico ciyumviro cazanywe na nyina wiwe, Lynne. Ati: "Ico abantu batazi `n'uko mama ariwe yamuhaye ico ciyumviro. Iyo myaka sinzokwigera nsubira kuyironka ... yaratabagaje ubuzima bwanje mu mpisho." Muri ivyo yari yanditse kuri Instagram ariko ubu vyafuswe, abandanya ati: "Urazi neza ivyo wakoze. Data nta bwenge afise bwo gupfa yariyumviriye ibintu nk'ivyo vyo gushira ubuzima bwanje mu minwe y'uwundi muntu, ariko muri iri joro, ndaja kumwenyura kuko nzi ko nimirije ubuzima bushasha." Ivyo Spears yanditse bisa n'uko vyoba vyatewe n'uko se yasavye ko hahagarara "ubwo nyene" kandi "ata gisabwe" ivy'uko ariwe abazwa ivy'ubuzima bwiwe. Uko vyari bitunganijwe  kwari nk'uguhabwa uwukujejwe mu mategeko ku bisanzwe bikorerwa abantu badashoboye kwifatira ingingo, nk'ababa bafise indwara zo mu mutwe. Mu nyandiko zo muri sentare BBC yaronse, abashingwamanza biwe bavuze bati:  "Jamie arakunda  kandi arashigikira umukobwa wiwe ata gisabwe. Nta kindi." "Icabaye n'uko mu myaka 13 iheze, ugushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe y'uwundi muntu vyari bikenewe kugira Britney akingirwe  mu nsiguro zose iryo jambo rishobora kugira. Ubuzima bwiwe bwari  mu rudubi kandi yari yugarijwe n'ibibazo bikomeye ku mubiri, mu mutwe, mu kibabarwe no mu mafaranga". "Hamaze kujaho uwubazwa ubuzima bwiwe, Britney yarashoboye kugaruka mu nzira yo kugira amaragamo muri ivyo bisata vyose vy'ubuzima. Ico gikorwa cagenze neza cane, ubu rero hakaba hageze ko Britney asubira gufata ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe." Abunganizi ba Spears bavuga ko ivyo yabisavye atawe abanje kubimenyesha kandi ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ivyo yahora akora vyo  kubazwa ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe, avuga ko ata "na kimwe" afise "co kunyegeza". Mu vyo yanditse kuri Instagram ku wa kabiri, Britney yanadomye urutoke ku wahora atunganya imirimo yiwe Lou Taylor avuga ko yagize uruhara mu vyo gushira ubuzima bwiwe mu minwe  y'uwundi muntu. Yaba we yaba na Lynne Spears nta n'umwe aragira ico abivuzeko. Ubuzima bwa Britney Spears  bwabazwa se wiwe kuva mu 2008 igihe ibibazo vy'amagara yiwe yo mu mutwe vyatuma se asaba sentare ububasha bw'amategeko bwo kugenzura ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe. Inyuma y'imyaka y'agacerre , uwo muririmyi amaherezo  yahavuye ashira ku mugaragaro ico avyibazako mu majambo akomeye cane yavuze mu minota 23 imbere ya sentare y'i Los Angeles mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Uwo mukobwa w'imyaka 39 yavuze ko  ubwo buzima bwo kugenzurwa bwabaye "ihohotera" kuko ngo yahawe ibiyayuramutwe, akanahatirwa  kuririmba atabishaka kandi akankirwa kuvyara abana. Yabwiye umucamanza Brenda Penny kuri terefone ati : "Ubu nshaka gusubizwa ubuzima bwanje". Se wiwe mu kwezi kw'icenda niho yashikiriza inyandiko zisaba ko ivy'uko abazwa  ubuzima bw'umukobwa wiwe bihagarara, ariko ntiyavuze umwanya  vyofata kugira ivyo bikorwe intambwe ku yundi. Uko kwezi,  umucamanza Penny yaciye aba aramuhagaritse vy'igihe  mu kuba ariwe abazwa ubutunzi bwa Britney (nta bintu vyiwe yabazwa kuva mu 2019). Intahe ikurikira muri urwo rubanza itegekanijwe kuba ku wa 12 uku kwezi kwa 11. Ariko n'aho uwo muririmvyi w'icamamare yokurwako ivy'uko ubuzima bwiwe bubazwa uwundi muntu, ibibazo vyiwe n'ubucamanza bishobora kutazoba birangiye. Umushingwamanza wiwe  Mathew Rosengart yagirije se wiwe  ko yitwaye nabi ku bijanye n'amafaranga kandi ko "yononye miriyoni z'ama dorari z'ubutunzi bw'umukobwa wiwe." Mu kwezi kw'icenda yabwiye abamenyeshamakuru ko afise "ibibazo bikomeye" ku "bishobora kuba vyarabaye ukwitwara nabi , hamwe n'ibikorwa vy'inyungu zidashbora kubangabanganwa, gukoresha nabi ububasha bwo kubazwa ubuzima bw'uwundi hamwe no kwonona bigaragara ubutunzi bwa Britney Spears" aca arahira ko " azokwihweza gushika mu mizi" inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kibazo. Mu nyandiko yashikirije sentare muri iyi ndwi,  Rosengart yagirije kandi se wa Britney kugerageza kwirengagiza kwishura ibibazo ku bivugwa ko uwo muririmvyi yacungwa gushika no mu nzu iwe imbere mu buryo bwo kumufata amajwi canke kumwumviriza. Uwo mushingwamanza asaba ivyoba vyarafashwe vyose n'ibikoresho vyakoreshejwe. Jamie Spears  arahakana ivyo yagirizwa vyose, akavuga ko yamye akora mu nyungu z'umukobwa wiwe. Ivyo we nyene yashikirije sentare  vyerekana ko azotanga inyandiko zose zijanye n'ico kobazo.

column2: Ivyo tuzi gushika ubu kw'igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu wa Haiti
column3: Umukuru w'igihugu ca Haiti Jovenel Moïse yagandaguwe n'abicanyi bateye ku muhana iwe ku mugwa mukuru , Port-au-Prince, ku wa 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Ng'ibi ibizwi gushika ubu. Akarwi k'abantu bitwaje inkoho karateye ku muhana wa Perezida Moïse uri muri karitiye Pelerin, hari isaha indwi z'ijoro mu masaha yo muri ico gihugu, aho hakaba hari isaha imwe mu gatondo mu masaha yo mu Burundi no mu Rwanda, ku wa gatatu 07 z'uku kw'indwi. Barashe uyu mukuru w'igihugu amasasu 12 yose. Perezida Moïse basanze agaramye hasi, ishati yiwe yuzuye amaraso, ijisho ryiwe ry'ibubamfu barinokoye, nk'uko bivugwa n'umucamanza.  Yari afise ibikomere vy'amasasu mu ruhanga, n'ayandi menshi yarashwe mu gikiriza no mu nda. Yapfiriye aho nyene. Umutambukanyi wiwe, Martine Moïse, na we nyene yararashwe ariko ntiyacikana. Yaciye anyarukanwa n'indege kuvurirwa muri Florida, muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, kandi amakuru avuga ko yoba ameze neza. Umukobwa wabo mukuru, Jomarlie Moïse, yinyegeje munsi y'igitanda ca musazawe kandi ntaco yabaye. We na basazawe babiri bari "ahantu bacungerewe umutekano" nk'uko bivugwa n'abategetsi. Ireresi itaremezwa neza n'uruhande rwigenga ariko ivugwa ko yafashwe igihe abo bicanyi binjira muri uwo muhana, yerekana umurwi w'abantu bafise inkoho bashika bari mu mamodoka yera yo mu bwoko bwa  SUV . Hari umugabo aboneka ko yategetswe kuryama hasi yubitse inda, mu gihe hari uwundi nawe yumvikana avuga cane mu congereza akoresheje ivyuma vyongereza amajwi ati "Ni igikorwa ca DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration}, mwese hasi!" DEA [US Drug Enforcement Administration} rero ni igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe. Uwuserukira Haiti muri Amerika, Bocchit Edmond, avuga ko n'aho abateye bari bambaye impuzu z'abajejwe kurwanya ibiyayuramutwe ba Amerika, yemera ko ata kuntu boba koko ari abanyamerika. Abategetsi bavuga ko ikibanza kiri hagati ya bariyeri y'inzu yiwe cari cuzuye ibirombora vy'amasasu, ivyerekana ko hari amasasu menshi cane yarashwe, Abo bakoze ico gitero baraboshe babiri mu bakozi bo mu nzu, mu gihe babandanya bavuza induru bavuga ngo "DEA operation" (igikorwa ca DEA). Barasahuye ibiro vya Perezida Moïse baca biba n'igitabo ca banki (carnet de chèques) carimwo amazina yiwe n'umugore wiwe, banatwara kandi imashini z'ububiko nyabwonko (serveurs) zarimwo amasanamu ya kamera zikoreshwa mu gucungera urugo (camera de surveillance). Abategetsi babiri b'igisata kijejwe gucungera umutekano wa Perezida Moïse bariko barakorwako amatohoza, bikaba bitegekanijwe ko bumvirizwa na sentare ku magenekerezo ya 13 na 14 z'uku kw'indwi. Gushika ubu, hari amakuru make cane ku vyerekeye amasaha yakurikiye ico gitero. Umukuru w'igiporisi ca Haiti yatangaje haciye amasaha 24  Moïse agandaguwe ko hari ukurasana gukomeye muri karitiye Pelerin . Léon Charles ati: "Twarazibiye [abakoze iki gitero]  bariko barasubira inyuma bahejeje gukora iri shano. Kuva ico gihe, turacarasana nabo". Uyu mukuru w'igiporisi avuga kandi ko bashoboye kurokora abaporisi batatu bari bafashwe mpiri n'abagirizwa gukora iki gitero. Mu ntango yavuze ko bane muri abo bicanyi bishwe muri uko kurasana, ariko ico gitigiri caragabanijwe gushika kuri batatu. Hari amakuru yavuze ko 11 mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero bahungiye mu rupangu rw'ibiro vy'ubuserukizi bwa i Port-au-Prince. Abategetsi ba Taiwan bavuga ko igiporisi ca Haiti cabamenyesheje ko abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje muri urwo rupangu ku wa 08 z'uku kw'indwi, inyuma y'amasaha 24 bakoze ico gitero. Taiwan yarahaye uburenganzira igiporisi kwinjira muri urwo rupangu maze gihagarika "ata ngorane" abo bantu bose 11 bikekwa bari binyegejeyo. Babiri muri abo bagirizwa ubu bwicanyi bari binyegeje mu kabande barafashwe n'abanyagihugu bariko barafasha abajejwe umutekano guhiga izo nkorabara. Ikiziga c'umwe mu bikekwa ko ari bo bakoze ico gitero cagiye gutorwa mu gisenge c'inzu, aho yari yinyegeje maze akavirirana gushika n'aho apfa. Abandi babiri muri bo basanze bapfiriye hafi y'umuhana wa Perezida  Moïse. None ni bande bakoze ico gitero? Igiporisi ca Haiti kivuga ko: Umukuru w'igiporisi Charles avuga ko 26 ari abanya Colombia, abandi babiri nabo bakaba ari Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti. Abo banyamerika bakomoka muri Haiti bamenyekanye ku mazina ya James Solages w'imyaka 35, na Joseph Vincent w'imyaka 55. Bompi barapfunzwe. Umucamanza ariko akora amatohoza avuga ko aba babiri babwiye abajejwe amatohoza ko bahawe akazi nk'abakarimani ku rubuga rwa internet. Aba babiri bavuga ko batari bazi ko hari integuro yo kwica umukuru w'igihugu, ariko bemera ko bari gukora nk'abakarimani igihe bafatwa. Indimi zivugwa muri Haiti ni igi Creole n'igifaransa, mu gihe aba bicanyi bo muri Colombia bobo bavuga iki Espanyole. Aba banya Colombia bahagaritswe, barerekanywe imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru aho abategetsi ba Haiti banerekanye ibitabo vyabo vy'inzira hamwe n'ibirwanisho bari babafatanye. Colombia yemeje ko n'imiburiburi batandatu muri abo bantu bayo bafashwe bahoze mu gisirikare c'igihugu. Aba banya Colombia babiri basanze bapfiriye hafi y'urugo rwa Perezida bamenyekanye ku mazina ya Mauricio Javier Romeo Medina na Duberney Capador Giraldo. Ikinyamakuru ca  Colombia El Tiempo kivuga ko bompi bahoze ari abasereja (sergeants), bafise imyaka 45 na 40. Abategetsi ba Haiti bavuga ko umwe mu bafashwe yavuze ko uyu murwi wari umaze "amezi atatu" muri Haiti, ariko amatohoza yakozwe na El Tiempo yerekana ko bamwe muri bo bari binjiye muri Haiti ku wa 06 z'ukwa gatandatu, bajabuka urubibe bavuye muri République Dominicaine/Dominican Republic ihana urubibe na Haiti. Nk'uko bivugwa n'ico kinyamakuru, bamaze imisi ibiri muri République Dominicaine, aho mbere banagendeye n'imiburiburi ikibanza kimwe c'iratiro. Amasanamu yashizwe ku mbuga hwaniro zabo aberekana bariko bifotoreza ku cibutso c'umurondezi Christopher Columbus. Abategetsi ba Haiti baremeza neza ko aba bantu bahagaritswe ari abacangero kandi ko bari bahawe amafaranga ngo bice umukuru w'igihugu. Bavuga ko igikorwa nyamukuru ari ukumenya "abateguye" iri gandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Umushikiranganji wa mbere mfatakibanza Claude Joseph avuga ko Perezida Moïse aterekwa ''bamwe mu bashaka kurengera inzego mu gihugu, kandi turemeza ko ibintu nk'ibi bidashobora kubura ingaruka mbi". Gusa ntavuga vyinshi kuri ibi yikeka. Nta gukekeranya ko Perezida Moïse, yari asanzwe ashorera hanze ibitoke imbere y'uguhabwa ayo mabanga, yagize abansi benshi mu gihe yari umukuru w'igihugu. Abamunegura bamwagiriza gusesagura itunga ry'igihugu no gukoresha ututrwi tw'inkorabara mu gutera ubwoba abatavuga rumwe nawe, ivyo yagumye yiyamiriza. Mu 2018, harabaye imyiyerekano mu gihugu igihe ashakiye kuduza igiciro c'igitoro, mu ntango z'uno mwaka naho haraba impari zikomeye zishingiye ku kiringo c'ubutegetsi bwiwe zatumye abanyaporitike bakomeye bamusaba gutanga imihoho. Kubona ubutegetsi bwiwe bwari bushingiye ku mategeko wenyene yasohora (décrets) mu kiringo c'umwaka wose n'igice inyuma y'aho igihugu kinaniriwe no gutegura amatora y'abashingamateka yari ategekanijwe mu kw'icumi 2019, vyatumye yagirizwa ko yariko ategura intwaro y'igikenye. Umugambi wiwe wo gutegura amatora ya kamarampaka kw'ibwirizwashingiro wabandanije utera inzigo abo bamwagiriza ko yashaka kwongereza ububasha bw'umukuru w'igihugu. Ariko igihe mu kwa kabiri amenyeshereje ko hari umugambi wo kumwica no gutembagaza reta yiwe waburijwemwo, benshi baranse kuvyemera bavuga ko ari amayeri yo kurondera ingene ahendahenda abanya Haiti benshi bari bashavuye. Ariko gusa, n'aho Haiti yagiye ica mu bibazo vya poritike, umukuru w'igihugu yaheruka kwicwa ari ku butegetsi yihswe mu 1915, hari haciye imyaka irenga ijana.

column2: Covid-19: Hydroxychloroquine ifise kuba isongera isibe hagukiza, ubushakashatsi
column3: Umuti Perezida Donald Trump wa Amerika avuga ko ariko arafata mu kurwanya Covid-19  ushobora kuba ahubwo usongera isibe, nk'uko ivyigwa bivyerekana. Ubushakashatsi bwakozwe buvuga ko ata karusho bizana mu kuvura coronavirus hakoreshejwe uwo muti uvura malaria witwa hydroxychloroquine. Bwana Trump avuga ko yariko arafata uwo muti n'aho abajejwe amagara y'abantu bagabishije ko ushobora gutera ingorane z'umutima. Uyo mu perezida abandanya ahimiriza ikoreshwa ry'uwo muti, mu gihe abajejwe amagara y'abantu bavyamirira kure. Hydroxychloroquine ni nziza mu kuvura malaria, na zimwe nka za lupus na arthrite, ariko gushika ubu ntibiremezwa nimba Hydroxychloroquine ishobora kuvura coronavirus. Ico cigwa cakozwe n'ikigo Lancet gikoresheje abarwayi 96000, muri bo hafi 15.000 bakaba bahawe Hydroxychloroquine - canke umuti wo mu bwoko bwa chloroquine. Tugereranije n'abandi barwayi, ubwo bushakashatsi bwasanze ko abo bahawe Hydroxychloroquine bari bafise igihamana kibi co gupfira mu bitaro canke bakagira ibibazo vy'itera ry'umutima. Turavye ingene abarwayi bagiye bapfa, ni uko ibice 18% vy'abahawe Hydroxychloroquine ari bo bapfuye, abahawe Chloroquine isanzwe bakaba bapfuye ku rugero rwa 16.4%, nayo abandi bobo batahawe iyo miti bapfuye ku rugero rwa 9%. Abashakashatsi bakoze ico cigwa bagabisha ko Hydroxychloroquine itokoreshwa mu gihe atari mu magerageza y'imiti. Bwana Trump wewe yivugira ko gushika ubu atarigera yandura Covid-19, kandi ko abandanya afata uwo muti kuko yizera ko "ufise akarusho". Hari ibikorwa vyo kugerageza uwo muti usanzwe uvura malaria nimba ushobora gukoreshwa mu kuvura Covid-19. Abakozi bo mu gisata c'ubuvuzi barenga ibihumbi 40 ku migabane ya Bulaya, Afrika, Aziya, Amerika y'Epfo basanzwe bariko bavura abanduye Covid-19, bari mu bazohabwa uwo muti mu gikorwa co kuwugerageza. Dr Marcos Espinal, arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Amerika y'Epfo (Organisation panaméricaine de la santé) risanzwe rikorana n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi OMS, ashimangira ko ata vyigwa na bimwe vy'ubuvuzi birigera vyemeza ko hydroxychloroquine yokoreshwa mu kuvura coronavirus.

column2: Ukraine: Mbega OTAN/NATO ni iki, kubera iki Russia itayizeye?
column3: Ibihugu bihurikiye muri OTAN/NATO biriko biriga urugero bashobora gushikako mu gufasha Ukraine guhangana n'igitero kivugwa ko gishobora gukorwa n'Uburusiya. Iri shirahamwe - rihurikiyemwo ibihugu nka Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubwongereza, Ubufaransa, n'Ubudagi - ririko rifasha Ukraine kwitegura gisirikare riyiha n'izindi mfashanyo. OTAN/NATO - bisigura ngo Organisation du Traité de l'Atlantique Nord/North Atlantic Treaty Organisation - ni ishirahamwe rya gisirikare ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe, ryashinzwe mu 1949 n'ibihugu 12, harimwo Amerika, Canada, Ubwongereza n'Ubufaransa. Ibihugu birihurikiyemwo vyiyemeza gutabarana mu gihe hoba igihugu na kimwe kiri muri iri shirahamwe coramuka gitewe. Mu ntango, intumbero kwari uguhangana n'akaga k'ingendo y'Uburusiya yo kwiyagurira akarere ku mugabane wa Bulaya inyuma y'intambara ya kabiri y'isi yose. Mu 1955 Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet, yari izwi nka URSS/USSR, nayo yaciye yihora mu gushinga ishirahamwe ryayo rya gisirikare ryari rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vya gikomunista vya Bulaya y'Ubuseruko, ishirahamwe ryari rizwi nk'Amasezerano ya Varsovie (Pacte de Varsovie/Warsaw Pact). Ibihugu vyariteyeko igikumu rigitangura vyari URSS, Albanie, Pologne, Tchechoslovakie, Hongrie, Roumanie, n'icahoze ari République Démocratique Allemande. Inyuma y'aho URSS isambukiye mu 1991, ibihugu bitari bike vyari bihurikiye muri aya Masezerano ya Varsovie vyaciye bihindukira vyinjira muri OTAN. Ubu, iri shirahamwe rihurikiyemwo ibihugu 30. None ni ikibazo nyabaki kiri hagati y'Uburusiya na OTAN ku vyerekeye Ukraine? Ukraine ni igihugu kiri mu vyahoze bigize Reta Zunze Ubumwe z'aba Soviet gihana imbibe n'Uburusiya hamwe n'Ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Bulaya (UE/EU). Nti kiri mw'ishirahamwe OTAN, ariko ni "incuti yaryo" -  ibi bigasigura ko hari umwumvikano izi mpande zompi zagiriraniye ko iki gihugu gishobora kwemererwa kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe vryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe muri kzoza. Uburusiya bushaka ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero bibwemerera ko ibi bitazokwigera biba. Hagati aho, Amerika ntishaka kubuza Ukraine kwinjira muri OTAN, ikavuga ko nk'igihugu cigenga gifise uburenganzira bwo gufata ingingo gishatse co nyene ku bijanye n'umutekano waco. Uwuserukira Ukraine mu Bwongereza, Vadym Prystaik, aherutse kuvuga ko Ukraine yari ifise ishaka ryo "kugenza buhoro" ku ntumbero yayo yo kwinjira muri iri shirahamwe rya gisirikare rihurikiyemwo ibihugu vyo mu burengero. Hagati aho, umuvugizi w'umukuru w'igihugu Volodymyr Zelensky yaramuvuguruje, mu kuvuga ko Ukraine vyanka bikunda itegerezwa kwinjira muri OTAN no mw'ishirahamwe UE/EU nk'uko biri mw'isbirizwashingiro. Ukraine ifise abanyagihugu benshi bavuga ikirusiya kandi ifitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi n'Uburusiyamu vyo imico n'imigenzo. Mu migambi yayo, Kremlin (ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu w'Uburusiya) ibona Ukraine nk'agace k'Uburusiya kari inyuma. Perezida Vladimir Putin avuga ko ibihugu vy'Uburengero biriko vyiheka inyuma y'iri shirahamwe ryo kwivunira umwansi hamwe kugira ngo bikikuze Uburusiya, kandi agashaka ko OTAN ihagarika ibikorwa vya gisirikare mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Kuva kera yamwe avuga ko Amerika yarenze ku vyo yiyemeje mu 1990 ko OTAN  itari kubandanya yiyagurira akarere amaja mu buseruko. OTAN iriyamiriza ibivugwa n'Uburusiya, ikavuga ko ibihugu biri ku rushi birihurikiyemwo ari vyo bisangiye imbibe n'Uburusiya, kandi ko ari ishirahamwe ryo kwivuna gusa. Abenshi babona ko irundarunda ry'ingabo z'Uburusiya ririko riraba ku rubibe buhana na Ukraine ari ukugerageza gutera igitsure ibihugu vy'Uburengero gufata nka nkama ivyo Ubursiya busaba. Igihe abanya Ukraine basenyura ubutegetsi bw'umukuru w'igihugu yari yegamiye ku Burusiya mu ntango za 2014, Uburusiya bwaciye bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea kari mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine. Bwaciye kandi bufata mu mugongo inyeshamba zikorana nabwo zigaruriye uturere tutari duto two mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. OTAN ntiyagiye gutabara, ariko yaciye inyanyagiza ingabo mu bihugu bitari bike vy'ubuseruko bwa Bulaya ku ncuro ya mbere. Ifise ibirindiro bine vy'ingabo zababa ibatayo (bataillon) ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye muri Estonie/Estonia, Lettonie/Latvia, Lituanie/Lithuania na Pologne/Poland hamwe n'ingabo zitari nke muri Roumanie/Romania ziva mu bihugu bitandukanye. OTAN kandi yaraguye poritike yayo yerekeye ibirere gushika mu bihugu bihurikiye ku nyanja ya Baltique (mer Baltique/Baltic Sea) bizwi nka Etats Baltes/Baltic states, hamwe no mu buseruko bwa Bulaya kugira ngo rishobore kurwanya indege iyo ari yo yose y'Uburusiya yohava ivogera imbibe z'ibihugu vyaryo. Uburusiya buvuga ko bushaka ko izi ngabo zisubira inyuma. Perezida Joe Biden wa Amerika avuga ko Uburusiya "bushobora kubona ingaruka mbi zikomeye" mu gihe bworamuka buteye Ukraine kandi ariko ararungika izindi ngabo i Bulaya. Amerika iriko irarungika izindi ngabo hafi 3000 muri Pologne na Roumanie kugira ngo zishigikire inzego zo kwivuna abansi z'ibihugu vyo mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Yaramaze gutegura izindi ngabo 8500 azibwira ko zokwama zimeze magabo. Pentagon (ibiro vy'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bwa amerika) ivuga ko izi ngabo zishobora kurungikwa gusa mu gihe OTAN yofata ingingo yo kwishura ivyo Uburusiya bworamuka bukoze. Yongerako y'uko ata migambi ihari yo kurungika ingabo na zimwe muri Ukraine ari yonyene. Umushikiranganji w'imigenderaire w'Ubudagi Annalena Baerbock  aragabisha ko mu gihe ibintu vyokwunyuka mu bijanye na gisirikare "vyogira ingaruka mbi cane ku butegetsi bw'Uburusiya - mu vyo ubutunzi, poritike n'imigambi". Downing Street (ahari ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza) ivuga ko Ubwongereza bwemera ko "ibihugu bifatanije nabwo bitegerezwa gutegura ingingo ruhasha harimwo ibihano Uburusiya butari bwigere bubona". Perezida Biden avuga ko hari "umwumvikano wose" n'abategetsi ba Bulaya ku kibazo ca Ukraine, ariko ko hari ukutumvikana ku bijanye n'ico buri gihugu cemera gutanga. Amerika ivuga ko yarungitse ibirwanisho bifise agaciro k'imiriyoni 200 z'amadorari harimwo za misire zo mu bwoko bwa Javelin zirasa vya bimodoka vy'intambara (missiles anti-chars)  hamwe n'izindi zo mu bwoko bwa Stinger zikorora indege, kandi yaremereye ibindi bihugu vya OTAN guha Ukrane ibirwanisho vyakorewe muri Amerika. Ubwongereza bwarahaye Ukraine misire 2000 zirasa vya bimodoka vyintambara (missiles anti-chars) kandi bwaranarungitse abahinga ba gisirikare kwigisha igisirikare ca Ukraine ingene bazikoresha. Bufise kandi ingabo zirenga 1000 mu buseruko bwa Bulaya, muri Estonie na Pologne. Buriko kandi burarungika izindi 350 muri Pologne, kandi buriko busaba OTAN kwongereza ingabo zayo zishika 900 muri Estonie. Buriko kadi burihweza ingene bworungika indege z'intambara zindi mu bumanuko bwa Bulaya no kurungika amato y'intambara mu buseruko bw'inyanja ya Mediterrannee. Bwarategetse kandi ingabo 1000 ko zokwama zimeze magabo kugira ngo zije gufasha mu gihe hogira  ibibazo vy'ubutabazi vyokwaduka bitewe n'igitero cokorwa n'Uburusiya. Umunyamabanga w'Ubwongereza ajejwe imigenderanire Liz Truss avuga ko "hari igihamana gito cane" co kurungika ingabo zoja kurwana muri Ukraine. Ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya OTAN harimwo Danemark, Espagne, Ubufaransa n'Ubuholande, vyarungitse indege n'amato vy'intambara mu buseruko bwa Bulaya mu gikomeza inzego zo kwivuna abansi mu karere. Abashikiranganji b'ibihugu vya OTAN bariko bariga ingene borungika izindi ngabo 4000 mu buseruko bwa Bulaya. Ariko, Ubudagi bwaranse ibisabwa na Ukraine yabusaba ibirwanisho vyo kwivuna, kubera poritike yabwo yo kutarungika ibirwanisho vyica mu turere turangwamwo intambara. ahubwo, buzorungika imfashanyi mu vyo ubuvuzi hamwe n'inkofero (casques/helmets) 5000. Perezida Macron w'Ubufaransa asaba ko hoba ibiganiro n'Uburusiya kugira ngo iki cuka kibi kirangire.

column2: Igisirikare c’Ubushinwa cavogereye  Taiwan, niko reta yayo ivuga
column3: Na Raffi Berg BBC News Ubushinwa  bwavogereye ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho amazi n’ibirere  vya Taiwan, nk’uko reta yayo ibivuga. Ivuga ko indege 71 z’igisirikare kirwanira mu kirere, harimwo iz’intambara na zimwe zitagira abadereva (drones), zinjiye mu citwa akarere ka Taiwan ko gucungereramwo ikirere. Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko iki gikorwa ca gisirikare c’Ubushinwa ari ico “guhungabanya” kandi gitosekaza “amahoro n’umutekano mu karere”. Taiwan irigenga – ariko Ubushinwa buyifata nk’intara ishaka kwiyonkora, kandi ko impera n’imperuka izosubizwa mu ruhongore. Muri ano mezi ya vuba, icuka kibi cariyongereye hagati y’izi mpande zibiri. Muri Myandagaro (8), Pékin/Beijing (umugwa mukuru w’Ubushinwa) yararakajwe n’urugendo umukuru w’inama nshingamateka ya Amerika Nancy Pelosi yakoze muri iryo zinga, umutegetsi wa mbere mukuru wa Amerika yari agendeye Taiwan mu myaka 25. Mu kwihora kuri urwo rugendo, Ubushinwa bwakoze imyimenyerezo ya gisirikare ya mbere ikomeye mu mazi akikuje Taiwan, yongera ihagarika n’ubudandaji bumwe bumwe n’iryo zinga. Umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe imigenderanire Joseph Wu yariyamirije ico gikorwa c’Ubushinwa ico gihe, aho yavuze ko ari agasotoro ko ku rwego rwo hejuru. Ubushinwa ntiburigera buvuga ko butazohava bukoresha inguvu kugira ngo bwigarurire Taiwan. Ejo ku wa mbere, umushikiranganji wa Taiwan ajejwe kvivuna abansi yavuze ko indege 43 zajabutse umurongo wo hagati, akarere kigenga kagabura impande zibiri. Ubushinwa buvuga ko bwakoze “imyimenyerezo yo kurasa” mu micungararo ya Taiwan ku wa Mungu mu kwihora ico buvuga ko kari agasomborotso k’iryo zinga na Amerika. Umutegetsi wa Maison Blanche/White House ari mu Nama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano avuga ko Amerika irajwe ishinga n’ibi bintu biherutse kuba, akongerako y’uko “izobandanya ifasha Taiwan mu gukomeza ubushobozi bwayo bwo kwirwanako”. Washington yamye na ntaryo yinengesera kuri kino kibazo ca Taiwan. Ku ruhande rumwe, irashigikira poritike y’igihugu kimwe c’Ubushinwa, inkingi y’ubucuti na Pékin. Muri ino poritike, Amerika iremera ko hari reta imwe y’Ubushinwa, kandi ikaba ifitaniye ubucuti buzwi na Pékin hakubugiriranira na Taiwan. Hagati aho, ibandanya ifitaniye ubucuti bwa hafi cane na Taiwan, mbere ikanayigurishako ibirwanisho mu masezerano yiswe Taiwan Relations Act ( mu Kirundi twogereranya na ‘Itegeko rigenga imigenderanire na Taiwan’), akaba avuga ko Amerika itegerezwa guha iryo zinga uburyo bwo kwivuna umwansi.

column2: Haribonekeza ubukene bwa Amstel ndende na bock mu Burundi
column3: Haraciye igihe mu Burundi hibonekeza ubukene bw'ikinyobwa ca Amstel ndende, hamwe na Amstel ngufi bita bock nk'uko abakunzi b'izi nzoga babivuga. Abihereza ivyo binyobwa bavuga ko bisigaye ari umuzi w'ibuye, bikaba ngombwa ko bihereza Primus canke Royal badakunda, canke bakanywa za skol bavuga ko ziva mu gihugu c'u Rwanda, zigurishwa ku giciro kiri hejuru. Umwe ati: "Si benshi bashoboye kwigurira skol kuko zirazimvye". Hampande y'inzoga za Amstel, haranavugwa kandi n'ikena ry'amafanta yo mu bwoko bwa coca. Ikompanyi Brarudi iremera ko izo nyobwa zikenye, ariko ko ikibazo kiri ahanini ku bakiriya b'umurengera muri kino gihe. Aho ni mu gihe hari abibaza ko vyoba bitumwa n'ikena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro. Remy Ndayishimiye ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mw'ihinguriro ry'inzoga Brarudi, aremeza ko iyo ngorane iriho ariko ko bakora ibishoboka kugira ngo bayitorere umuti. Ati: "Mu gihe nk'iki, turonka abanywanyi b'umurengera, ariko Brarudi iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo ishobore gushimisha abakiriya bayo". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu biteye imbere bimwe vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco. Ibanki y'isi ivuga ko mu 2015 ubutunzi bw'Uburundi bwagabanutse ku rugero rwa -3.9%, mu 2016 bukagabanuka ku rugero rwa -0.6%, mu 2017, ariko bukaduga kuri 0.5% nayo mu 2018 bukaduga kuri 1,6%. Iyi banki ariko ivuga ko iri duga ryo mu myaka ibiri iheze ari rito cane ugereranyije n'ivyo igihugu gikenera, ikena rikomeye ry'amafaranga y'agaciro, ihagarikwa ry'intererano z'amakungu ivyo bikagira ingaruka mbi ku rudandazwa rw'ibiva hanze.

column2: Musenyeri mukuru wa Anglican muri UK arasaba imbabazi ku ruhara rw'Ishengero mu bucakara
column3: Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury yasavye imbabazi inyuma y’aho amatohoza yerekaniye ko ikigega c’imitahe y’Ishengero rya anglicane mu Bwongereza gifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Aya matohoza yakozwe asabwe n’ishami ry’iri shengero, Church Commissioners, rijejwe amatungo yaryo, yerekana ko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 100 iki kigega cashize amafaranga menshi cane mw’ikompanyi yari ijejwe gutwara abantu mu bucakara. Ico kigega cari kizwi mu kinjana ca 18 kw’izina rya Queen Anne’s Bounty, cahavuye gihinduka ikigo c’imitahe ishika ku miriyaridi 10,1 z’amapawundi. Musenyeri mukuru Justin Welby avuga ko yababaye cane kwumva ishengero arongoye rifitaniye isano n’ubucakara. Ikigega Queen Anne's Bounty cashinzwe mu 1704 mu ntumbero yo gufasha abakozi b’Imana bari bakenye. Itohoza ku makonte yaco mu 1739 ryerekana ko umutahe  w’amapawundi 204.000 (ubu yababa imiriyoni 443 y’amapawundi nyene) washowe mw’ikompanyi South Sea Company yagurisha abacakara b'abanye-Afrika. South Sea Company yari ifise amasezerano yihariye yo kuvana abacakara muri Afrika ibatwara mu bihugu vyatwarwa na Espagne muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko mu kiringo c’imyaka irenga 30 kuva mu myaka ya 1710. Yatwaye ibihumbi mirongo vy’abacakara, amatohoza akerekana ko hafi 15% yabo bapfiriye mu nzira. Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza ryabandanije rishora imitahe muri South Sea Company gushika mu kinjana ca 19. Uyu musenyeri mukuru avuga ati: “Uru rudandaza rw’agahomerabunwa rwafashe abagabo, abagore n’abana baremwe mw’ishusho y’Imana rubaka agateka kabo n’ubwigenge bwabo. “Birateye isoni kubona hari bamwe mw’Ishengero bashigikiye bikomeye bakegeranya amatungo muri uru rudandaza. “Inzira yonyene yo gukira koko kunywanisha – ari yo Yezu Kristu/Yesu Kristo aduhamagarira gufata – ni uko duhangana n’uku kuri kubabaje hanyuma tugafata ingingo”. Ku ruhande rumwe, Ishengero ry’Ubwongereza ririshimira uruhara ryagize mu guhagarika ubucakara, rigafatira ku ruhara umuvugabutumwa wa Anglicane, William Wilberforce, yagize. Ku rundi ruhande, ni ngombwa ko ryemera ko ryagiye ryungukira mu bucakara. Mu myaka iheze, Ishengero rya Anglicane mu Bwongereza riherutse gusaba imbabazi ku bakozi baryo batari bake babonetse ko bari bafise abacakara. Ryasavye imbabazi kubera ishami ryaryo rijejwe ubutumwa, The Society for the Propagation of the Gospel (twogereranya mu kirundi tuti “Umuryango wo gukwiragiza Inkuru nziza”), ryari rifise itongo ahitwa Barbados, maze rishira ikimenyetso ku bacakara ryakoresha mu gikiriza cavuga ngo SOCIETY (twogereranya n’ijambo UMURYANGO). Ubu rero, ku matohoza yaryo ryo nyene, ryemeye ko mu kiringo c’imyaka mirongo ikigega caryo cashoye imitahe y’amafaranga hafi yaryo yose – hampande y’ayo ryakoresheje mu kugura amatongo – mw’ikompanyi yari ifise uruhara yiharije rwo gutwara abacakara muri Amerika y’Ubumanuko. Mu gihe abarenga inusu y’abanywanyi b’Ishengero rya Anglicane kw’isi yose bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, iyi nkuru ishobora kutorosha ibintu. Ishengero rya Anglican mu Bwongereza ryatanguje aya matohoza mu ntumbero yo gushira ahabona kahise karyo rikavuga ko hagiye gutumwako umurwi wo kwiga inyishu ikwiriye. Ariko umuvugizi ntazi nimba ibi bisigura ko hagiye kuba ayandi matangazo n’amasengesho, canke nimba hashobora kubamwo n’ibiganiro ku bijanye n’indishi y’akababaro mu buryo bw’amafaranga. Aya matohoza yerekana kandi ko iki kigega cahawe intererano z’abantu bungukiye canke bafitaniye isano n’ubu bucakara bwabaye hagati y’imigabane hamwe n’ibikorwa vy’ubutunzi bwari bushingiye ku burimyi muri uru rudandaza rw’abantu. Uyu musenyeri mukuru yongerako ati: “Ndasabiye abo bose bakozweko n’iyi nkuru kandi nibaza ko dushobora gukorera hamwe tukihweza iyindi nzira twofata”.

column2: South Africa: ingene abanyagihugu bashavuriye abanyamahanga
column3: Igipolisi ca Afrika y'Epfo kirameze magabo mu gihe horamuka hasubiye kwaduka imishamirano mu karere ka Alexandra no ku bandariza ku mabarabara mu gisagara ca Johannesburg. Alexandra ni kamwe mu turere dukenye cane mu gihugu ariko ababa mu tuzu twako bashobora kubona amazu maremare cane ya  Sandton, kamwe mu turere tw'ubucuruzi dutunze cane ku mugabane wose, ku birometero bikeya gusa. Ibi rero bituma abanyagihugu bava mu turere dutandukanye twa Afrika y'Epfo no mu bihugu bibanyi bisukira ku bwinshi muri aka karere kurondererayo ubuzima. Hari imihari ibiri itabonwa kumwe ifise intumbero yo kurwanya abanyamahanga badafise vya ngombwa iherutse kuvuka - uwa mbere witwa Alexandra Dudula Movement uwa kabiri nawo Operation Dudula -  kandi ikaba igenda ishigikirwa cane n'abanya Afrika y'Epfo babona ko bakumiriwe. Hari ubwoba ko ibikorwa vyayo bishobora gutuma haduka izindi ndyane zo kurwanya abanyamahanga muri ico gihugu. Ubukene nibwo ntandaro y'icuka kibi kubera abanya Afrika y'Epfo bazi ko - biba vyo canke atari vyo -  abanyamahanga ari bo batumye baba mu ngorane. Dudula ni ijambo ryo mu rurimi rw'ikizulu risigura "gusubiza inyuma"  - ibi birerekana ico bashaka neza na neza. N'aho iyi mirwi itandukanye, yose iharanira ikintu kimwe - yose yibaza ko ishobora gusubiza abanyamahanga b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga iwabo. Yibaza ko mu gukora ibi ishobora gutuma ubuzi n'ibikorwa vy'ubudandaji bishobora kuja mu minwe y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo. Umuhari Alexandra Dudula Movement washinzwe mu mwaka uheze. Abanywanyi bawo bavuga ko abanyamahanga babaye mu mazu ya reta mu buryo budaciye mu mategeko mu karere ka Alexandra, gafatwa ko ari aka ba nyarucari. Ariko iri sekeza ryarageze kure gushika aho babuza abimukira b'abanyafrika badafise ibibaranga gukora urudandazwa muri Alexandra. Mu kwezi guheze, uyu muhari warugaye utuzu tw'idandarizo twose twegukira abanyamahanga batashoboye kwerekana impapuro z'ukuri zibaha uburenganzira bwo kudandaza kandi bakaba bafise igitabo c'inzira kitarata igihe. Baciye bafata utu tuzu baduha abanya Afrika y'Epfo, nka Wendy Sithole aba aho nyene i Alexandra, yaciye atangura kudandaza imboga aho abanyamahanga baburijwe kuhadandariza. Uyu mugore yabwiye BBC ati: "Twebwe nk'abanya Afrika y'Epfo turashomye kandi turashonje. Ico dushaka kandi ni uko turonka ubuzi. None bashaka tubeho gute mu gihugu cacu?" Ivyo uyu murwi ukora vyose ntibiciye mu mategeko, abategetsi bakaba bariko barakora amatohoza ajanye n'utugeza imvururu n'ugutera ubwoba. Umuhari Operation Dudula ufise icicaro mu karere ka Soweto muri Johannesburg  - ku birometero birenga 25 ku rundi ruhande rw'igisagara. Inyuma yo gushingwa na Nhlanhla Lux Dlamini w'imyaka 33, uyu muhari wagiye kumenyekana cane mu ka gatandatu kw'umwaka uheze igihe abanyagihugu baba i Soweto bagira imyiyerekano muri aka karere basaba ico bita ibikorwa vyo "gukura umwanda". Barwanya abikekwa kudandaza ibiyayuramutwe hamwe n'abantu baba mu nyubakwa za reta bidaciye mu mategeko. Ariko nk'uko vyagenze i Alexandra, uyu muhari nawo nyene warageze kure mu  vyo uharanira. Abanywanyi bawo ubu bashaka ko abanyamahanga bafise amaduka muri Afrika y'Epfo kandi bakaba ari benshi bugara kandi bakava mu gihugu. Bashaka kandi ko abadandaza bato bato, nk'abacuruza mu mazu y'uburiro n'amaduka, bakoresha abanya Afrika y'Epfo gusa. Ibi bitumwa n'uko bene gukora uru rudandazwa binuba abanya Afrika y'Epfo, bagashima gukoresha abanyamahanga badafise ivya ngombwa kubera bashobora kubaha agahembo kari musi y'ako bategerezwa kubahemba. Abategetsi bavuga ko atari ikibazo gikwiye mu gihugu cose, ko ahubwo ari ikibazo gishobora kuba cibonekeza mu turere tumwe tumwe. Iyi mihari yose irahakana ivyo yagirizwa ko yanka abanyamahanga, ko ahubwo ishaka gusa gukingira imibereho y'abanya Afrika y'Epfo, ibakavuga ko reta y'umugambwe African National Congress (ANC) iriko irananirwa kubikora. Yompi ivuga ko ata mugambwe n'umwe yegamiye. Abanyamahanga bobo bavuga ko bahamwa bahorwa ibibazo vyinshi. Sam Manane, umunya Mozambike amaze imyaka cumi acuruza imfungurwa muri Alexandra yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta kazi k'umuntu n'umwe twiba, vyose turavyironderera, nta munya Afrika y'Epfo tubuza gukora nk'ivyo dukora". "Baraduhohotera gusa". Reta y'ico gihugu ntaco iragira ariko umukuru w'intara ya Gauteng, ari nayo igisagara ca Johannesburg kirimwo, David Makhura wo mu mugambwe ANC, avuga ko ahagaritswe umutima n'iyi migumuko yo kurwanya abanyamahanga i Alexandra. Asaba amashirahamwe adaharanira ivyicaro vya poritike gukorana na reta mu gutsimbataza amahoro no gukomeza ukwihanganiranira. Ariko imigambwe imwe imwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi iriko igerageza gukamisha iki kibazo. Uumugambwe utavyorosha na gato ni uwuherutse gushingwa witwa Patriotic Alliance (PA) urongowe n'uwahoze ari impfungwa, Gayton McKenzie. Uyu mugambwe PA usanzwe ufise abahanuzi mu nama mpanuzwajambo y'akarere ariko ukaba utaritoza ku rwego rw'igihugu, ushaka ko abimukira bose badafise ivya ngombwa bava mu gihugu. Mu ntango z'uno mwaka, abanywanyi b'umugambwe Economic Freedom Fighters utavuga rumwe n'uruwi ku butegetsi waragendeye giturumbuka amazu y'uburiro muri Johannesburg kugira urabe abanyamahanga bayakoramwo wongere utere igitsure abadandaji guha akazi abanya-Afrika y'Epfo benshi. Ku kijanye n'indangamuntu, reta ivuga ko iriko irakora uko ishoboye kugira ngo abantu bagire ivya ngombwa vy'ukuri - ariko ibi bizofata igihe kitari gito. Si bwo bwa mbere haduka urwanko ku banyamahanga muri Afrika y'Epfo. Mu 2008, harabaye ibitero bitari bike mu gihugu cose ku mpunzi no ku bimukira - aho abarenga 60 bavugwa ko bishwe, ibihumbi n'ibihumbi nabo barata baromoka. Mu 2015 harabaye ibi bitero ku banyamahanga, cane cane mu bisagara vya  Durban na Johannesburg, ivyatumye reta igomora ingabo kugira ngo zibuze ntihaduke iyindi migumuko. Haraciye imyaka itatu kandi habaye ibindi bitero ku banyamahanga vyatumye abanya Nigeria amajana n'amajana bava mu gihugu. Ntibiramenyekana igitumye iki kibazo gisubira kuvyuka ariko ibibazo indiri n'indiri vy'ubutunzi muri Afrika y'Epfo vyarunyuwe n'ingingo zo kuzibira ikiza ca Covid-19 zatumye abantu badaharurwa batakaza ubuzi maze ubuzima nabwo buca burushirizaho kuzimba.

column2: Theodore McCarrick yahoze ari kardinali muri US arahakana ivyo gufata ku nguvu yagirizwa
column3: Uwahoze ari kardinali wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arahakana ivyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu umwana w'umuhungu w'imyaka 16 mu myaka ya 1970. Theodore McCarrick, 91, yarengutse imbere ya sentare i Massachusetts kugira yisigure ku vyaha vyo gufata ku nguvu no gukubagura (coups et blessures) yagirizwa ko yakoze mu 1974. Uyu mu kardinali yahoze ari musenyeri mukuru wa Washington DC azwi ko ari we mutegetsi wo ku rwego rwo hejuru wa Ekleziya Katorika muri Amerika yagirijwe ivyaha vy'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina. Imbere y'aho yahora avuga ko atibuka ko hoba hari ivyo guhohotera yoba yarakoze. Mu rubanza rwashinzwe mu kw'indwi, McCarrick yaragirijwe ivyo gukwegakwegera uyo mwana w'umuhungu - ariko atavuzwe izina -  mu buhumbu, mu kiringo c'imyaka itari mike. Uyu mugabo avuga ko yakorewe aya mabi yavuze ko igihe kimwe vyabaye mu gihe yari mu bugeni bwa mwenewabo kuri kaminuza ya Wellesley muri Massachusetts mu 1974. Nyene gukorerwa aya mabi avuga ko McCarrick yamukwegeye mu cumba kimwe co muri iyo kaminuza aca atangura kumukuyakuya. Inyuma yaho, uyo mupatiri avugwa ko yaciye abwira uyu mugabo kuvuga ibisabisho kugira ngo akire "ibicumuro". Muri sentare ku wa gatanu, McCarrick yategetswe kutavugana n'uyu nyene guhohoterwa canke n'umwana n'umwe. Yasabwe gutanga ingwati y'ibihumbi 5000 vy'amadorari y'abanyamerika, mu gihe bitegekanijwe ko asubira kwumvirizwa ku wa 28 z'ukw'icumi. Buri caha gishobora guhanishwa umunyororo wo gushika ku myaka itanu, kandi agategerezwa kwandikwa ku nguvu nk'umusambanyi (délinquant sexuel/sex offender) McCarrick ni umwe mu bategetsi ba Ekleziya Katorika bagirizwa gushurashuza abana mu kiringo c'imyaka mirongo. Mu 2019, yarakuwe mu mabanga inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na Vaticano ku vyaha yagirizwa vyo gufata ku nguvu mu myaka itari mike. Yaragirijwe kandi ko yafashe ku nguvu umuyabaga i New York hagati mu myaka ya 1970, yongera ahatira abagabo kuryamana nawe mu rugo i New Jersey mu gihe bariko bigira ubupatiri. Icegeranyo c'impapuro 450 ca Vaticano casanze Papa Yohani Paulo wa kabiri yarabwiwe ivyerekeye ibi vyagirizwa McCarrick, ariko agahitamwo kwizera abepiskopi ba Amerika bamukingiye ikibaba. Casanze kandi Papa Benoit/Benedict XVI - yatanze imihoho mu 2013 - ashobora kuba yaranse iciyumviro co gukora amatohoza kubera ata "vyemezo vyari bihari" ku vyo yagirizwa.
